original:
Hello again 101. It’s time you were introduced to Patient 1103, or as he likes to refer to himself - ‘Berzerker’. A habit we grew weary of trying to snap him out of. Speaking of snapping he has a habit of breaking our other patients literally in half whenever allowed back into general population. I’m sure you two will get along just fine, though if I were you I’d avoid the dark. He hates the dark. He hates the light too come to think of it.

Keep up the good show.

The Warden.
translation:
又见面了，101。是时候向你介绍1103号病人了，或者按他自己喜欢的称呼--“狂战士”。我们早已厌倦了试图纠正他这一习惯。说到“纠正”，每当他被放回普通病房时，他总是会把其他病人硬生生地打成两半。我相信你们会相处得很好的，不过我要是你的话，就会尽量避开黑暗。他讨厌黑暗。话说回来，他也同样讨厌光明。

继续你的出色表现。

典狱长

original: Word has reached us that one of our pre-war POW holding facilities has fallen into the hands of an unidentified mob who have managed to severely spook the locals with their occult-ish behavior. Your team are to investigate the site, neutralize any threats and make sure nothing remains in that place that can reveal our plans or strategic assets. Burn the whole place to the ground if need be.
translation: 我们收到消息，一个战前的战俘羁押设施落入了不明暴徒之手，他们凭借类似邪教的举动把当地居民吓得够呛。你们的任务是调查这个地方，消除一切威胁，并确保那里不会留下任何可能泄露我们计划或战略资产的东西。如有必要，把整个地方烧成灰烬。
国会大厦研究诊所密码
国会大厦研究领班密码
国会大厦研究日志 2070年2月11日

original:
11 Feb 2070

This facility will go a long way towards serving the greater good. The conversions needed will take time but there is plenty of useful tech for us here. Most of the radio equipment will have to go. That which is not of direct benefit to our troops will be dismantled for parts. Better off scrapped than falling into the hands of another Red propaganda expert.

How this broadcast station was permitted to function for so long on our own doorstep I have no idea. I can only assume the president was keen on showing a balanced perspective, but how balanced can a person be to suggest that "maybe all people should be treated equally". What a ridiculous thing to suggest in these times. As for the shock-jock lunatic responsible I've cooked up something special as his punishment.

He's been bricked up in part of his own studio with basically nothing but a toilet and a TV. The best part is that he still gets to voice his opinions because the whole thing is being filmed and broadcast as a warning to others, heavily censored of course. I can't wait to hear his opinions on starvation and a 24 hour bombardment of re-educational programming.
translation:
2070年2月11日

这个设施将极大地为更大的利益服务。所需的改造虽然需要时间，但这里有很多对我们有用的技术。大部分的无线电设备都得撤走。那些对我们部队没有直接益处的设备，将被拆解成零件。与其落入另一个红色宣传专家的手中，不如直接报废。

这个广播站是如何在我们的眼皮子底下运作了这么久，我一无所知。我只能猜测，总统可能是想展示一个平衡的观点，但一个人怎么能平衡到建议“也许所有人都应该被平等对待”。在这个时代，这是多么荒谬的建议。至于那个制造震惊言论的疯子主持人，我已经为他准备了一个特别的惩罚。

他被囚禁在自己工作室的一部分区域，里面除了一个厕所和一台电视，什么都没有。最好的部分是，他仍然可以发表他的观点，因为整个过程都在拍摄和广播，作为对其他人的警告，当然，这是经过严格审查的。我迫不及待地想听他对饥饿和24小时轰炸再教育节目的看法。
国会大厦研究日志 2070年5月27日

original: 27 May 2070\n\nWork on the final backup reactor is complete. All systems are online and are working correctly with the exception of the new card readers. This tech looks like it was handed down from some first generation power station. We've had numerous reports of unexplainable system shutdowns and recently one of our guards testing the fault was able to gain access to a third tier location using a similar card from outside of our network. Obviously this is unacceptable. For now I recommend a complete shutdown and overhaul of the pass-card entry system and a doubling of the local guards until we have everything back online. Interior restructuring is nearing completion. Halls have been extended to allow for extra guards and steel bars now block entry to Operations and beyond.
translation: 2070年5月27日\n\n最终备用反应堆的工作已经完成。所有系统都已上线并正常运行，除了新的读卡器。这项技术看起来像是从某个第一代发电站传承下来的。我们收到了许多关于系统无故关闭的报告，最近，我们的一名警卫在测试故障时，竟然能够使用我们网络之外的一张类似卡片进入第三层区域。这显然是无法接受的。目前，我建议完全关闭并彻底检修通行证进入系统，同时将当地的警卫人数增加一倍，直到我们让一切恢复正常。内部重组工作即将完成。大厅已经扩建，以容纳更多的警卫，钢条现在阻挡了进入操作区域及更深处的道路。

original:
Not all muties around here are dumb as the others.

Spell checker? Dumb is spelt with a b huh...

Damn, I guess I got so used to talking to the grunts, I've started to type like them...

Masher has lived here for many years and told me a lot about this place and himself. Soldiers were still stationed here after the war. Masher's group took the place over, crushing any who fought back. Most soldiers were killed though some fled. Masher thinks one of the local ghouls who has attacked his gang lots of times is from this group. They can never catch him. I doubt it's the same person after all this time. Ghouls break too easily.

Looks like lots of Enclave stuff about. If it was the Enclave stationed here then they got what was coming to them. Mutant murdering bastards, I hate them. Masher seems to hate all normals, even ghouls. I don't blame him.
translation:
并非所有的变种人都一样蠢。

检查下拼音？ 赤乌...温，哎。

妈的，我猜我是习惯了和那些口齿不清的家伙相处了。现在说话都和他们一样了。

“砸砸”已经在这住了很多年了，他告诉我许多有关于这个地方和他的事。他告诉了我很多关于这个地方和他自己的事情。战后还有士兵驻扎在这里。砸砸的团伙占领了这个地方，镇压了任何反抗的人。大多数士兵被杀，有些逃跑了。砸砸认为，一个多次攻击他团伙的当地尸鬼就是这个士兵团伙的一员。他们永远也抓不到他。我怀疑过了这么久，这不可能是同一个人。尸鬼的精神太容易崩溃了。

看起来这有很多英克雷的东西。如果这曾是英克雷驻扎地的话，那他们还真是现世报。一群杀变种人的混蛋，我讨厌他们。砸砸似乎讨厌所有的正常人，甚至包括尸鬼。这怪不了他。
葛洛格的日记，第三部分

original:
Lots of fighting today. Talon mercs trying to breach from the upper floors.

Someone thought it would be a good idea to release Johnny, our local dwarf-behemoth. Johnny's not a big behemoth by their standards, not like that huge monster Crusha who often stomps around outside. That beast would never have gotten inside. Johnny was still too much for the upper floors though and the movie room floor collapsed.

Johnny was impaled and killed but he managed to take a load of Talons down with him so he'd have been happy with that. They were so shit scared they were still shooting at his twitching corpse as we mopped up the last of 'em.

Accessing the top floors is gonna be tricky and more dangerous from now on. I'll leave that to the grunts.
translation:
今天没少打架。鹰爪公司的佣兵试图从上几层突破。

有人觉得把我们的小巨兽“乔尼”放出来比较好。乔尼以巨兽的标准来说还是小了点，不像那个在外面到处跺脚的“碾碾”一样。那大怪物可进不来楼里。话说回来，乔尼也不太适合住在楼里，就算影院塌了，对他来说还是太挤。

乔尼穿刺而亡。死前带走不少有鹰爪佣兵，我猜他应该还蛮满意的。那些鹰爪佣兵被他下的屁滚尿流，一直在对乔尼抽搐的尸体开枪，这让我们有机可乘把他们都收拾了。

往楼上去得更加机灵点，楼上现在要更加危险了。让变种人先去处理他们。
葛洛格的日记，第二部分

original:
Some of the bone heads on the second floor have gotten themselves spooked. They think the place is haunted and say they can hear voices whenever it gets quiet. Masher sent me to investigate before they start tearing the building apart looking for evil spirits.

I spent a few nights up there with some recording tech and just picked up a few different radio signals. They almost always have a radio on around there to drown out the noise so I'm guessing one of them was too scared to shut everything off for me.

The beatings they got from Big Eric should help give them a bit more perspective on real world threats.
translation:
二楼的一些笨蛋自己吓自己。他们认为这个地方闹鬼，说每当安静下来时，就能听到声音。砸砸派我去调查，免得他们开始拆楼寻找恶灵。

我在那里待了几个晚上，用了一些录音设备，只收到了几个不同的无线电信号。他们几乎总是开着收音机来掩盖噪音，所以我猜是其中一个人因为害怕，不敢为我关掉所有东西。

大埃里克揍了他们一顿，好让他们更清楚地认识现实世界中的威胁。
葛洛格的日记，第四部分

original: I think I was wrong. They are all idiots. Masher was so angry about the attack and Johnny's death that he has become more of a tyrant than ever. He has scouts out patrolling and on salvage missions for days. Now he wants me to pull my weight more. After all I have done for him these last few months he tells me I have to risk my brains out there on the front lines.\nEven my homebrew does not seem to cheer him up anymore. Me either now that I think of it. I'll have to try and increase it's strength. Damn mutant DNA must be adapting or something. If I can fix the brew maybe it'll put a smile back on his face again and stop this madness.
translation: 我错了。他们都是一群蠢货。砸砸对这场袭击和乔尼的死愤怒不已，他现在是个彻头彻尾的暴君。他这几天一直在派出斥候进行搜刮任务。现在他更希望我能更有用点。我为了他做了这么多，现在我还得脑袋别在裤腰上给他上前线。\n我的家酿也不能让他们高兴起来了。现在想想我也不怎么开心。我必须试着给酒加点猛料提提劲。该死的变种人DNA一定在适应要么就变异了。如果我能改进酿造方法，或许还能让他们脸上笑一笑，也还能阻止这场乱局。
葛洛格的日记，第五部分

translation: 安息吧，葛洛格\n尼虽然是个混蛋，但是尼给我们郝喝的酒还让我们晓。我们在你斯的地方流下一些尼的小东西，这样我们能一直寄主尼了。

original: ...reports of increased Deathclaw activity in Olney ruins. Looks like someone or something has stirred them up ....<unreadable>....pecting some sort of nest in the area. Obviously having these mutants breeding and tearing up the local population is in no ones best ....<unreadable>....   et in there and eliminate this threat at the source....
translation: 报告，奥尔尼废墟附近死亡爪活动增多。看起来某人或者某物一直在激怒他们。（无法阅读）预计该地区有它们的巢穴。显然，让这些变种人繁殖并摧毁当地人口并不符合任何人的利益..........（无法阅读）..........进入该地区，从源头上消除这一威胁......

original:
One of our wealthier clients has been constantly badgering me for a stuffed Deathclaw corpse. Obviously given the state of our ranks after our last encounter with the B.O.S. we cannot afford to dispatch a full team to anywhere which is why I'm going to have to entrust this task to you and Doomfist alone.

Usually I would not risk two of my most trusted friends with such a task but the offer has risen to 9000 caps and we need the extra funds right now. We need to re-arm fast and if the Talon's smell weakness they'll more than likely disregard the local truce and force a hostile takeover.

We picked up scattered B.O.S. distress frequencies emanating from Old Olney suggesting there has been some kind of Deathclaw outbreak around there. It's best to go in the daylight. Stealthboy or not I hear Deathclaws have keen night vision and can spot you before you spot them, especially in the dark. Take my rifle and pick them off from a distance where possible, as usual try not to severely damage the goods, especially the face. Doom can carry the thing back.

If the B.O.S. are still present in the area, try not to engage and complete the mission using stealth where possible.

Good luck,

-Taxidermist.
translation:
我们的一位富有的客户一直缠着我，想要一个填充好的死亡爪尸体。显然，在我们上次与兄弟会交手后，我们的队伍已经无力再派遣一整支团队去任何地方，所以我只能将这项任务单独交给你和末日铁拳去完成。

通常我不会让两个最得力的助手去冒这样的风险，但出价已经涨到了9000个瓶盖，我们现在急需这笔资金。我们需要尽快重新武装，如果鹰爪公司察觉到我们的虚弱，他们很可能会不顾当地的停战协议，强行进行敌对接管。

我们截获了从老奥尔尼发出的兄弟会求救信号，表明那里发生了死亡爪的爆发。最好在白天行动。我听说死亡爪的夜视能力很强，可以在你发现它们之前就发现你，尤其是在黑暗中。带上我的步枪，尽可能从远处射杀它们，像往常一样，尽量不要严重损坏尸体，尤其是面部。末日铁拳负责把它运回来。

如果兄弟会仍然在该地区活动，尽量避免与他们交战，并尽可能隐秘地完成任务。

祝你好运，

-剥制师

original:
King of the fucking hill baby!

Thought you could kill me didn’t you Henley, but who’s the fucking king now? 
ME THAT’S WHO!

The last man standing, the best man in Crystal City. The only man in Crystal City...

Fuck it. I’ll see you all again in hell.

I need a drink...
translation:
山顶之王，懂吗，宝贝！

你以为你能杀了我，对吧，亨利，但现在谁是王？
是我！

水晶城最后站着的人，水晶城最棒的人。水晶城唯一的人...

去死吧。我会在地狱里再见到你们。

我得去喝一杯...

original: This is not what we asked for at all. No one wants to look at this grim imagery. Get your workers to fix it now or we'll have someone else put in charge of the project.
translation: 这根本不是我们要求的内容。没人想看这种阴郁的画面。让你的员工现在就修改好，否则我们就换人来负责这个项目。
斯坦利·道森的日记，第一部分

original:
DAY 1:

We are exiting Sector A tomorrow. It will be the first time anyone has left in over sixty years so I thought I’d keep a diary of what happens and what we find out there.

There are only seven of us left now but even so we only have enough food for another few weeks so we are gonna have to see if anything is left in the rest of the city.

All the elders are dead now. Mr Alverez passed away last week. Before he died he told us everything we needed to know to survive and Fowler has been training us in various combat techniques, should there still be anyone dangerous still lurking outside.

We have more than enough meds and weapons down here to tackle any threat though. I’m sure glad our parents chose to shack up in the Storage sector.
translation:
第一天：

我们明天就要离开A区了。这是六十多年来第一次有人离开，所以我想记录下接下来发生的事情和我们在外面的发现。

现在只剩下我们七个人了，而且我们的食物也只够再维持几周，所以我们得看看城市的其他地方是否还有剩余的食物。

所有的长辈都已经去世了。阿尔瓦雷斯先生上周去世了。他临终前告诉了我们所有需要知道的生存知识，福勒也一直在训练我们各种战斗技巧，以防外面还有危险的人。

不过还好，我们这里有足够的药物和武器来应对任何威胁。我很高兴我们的父母选择在储藏区安家。
斯坦利·道森的日记，第二部分

original: DAY 2:\n\nBad things. So many dead. I feel sick.
translation: 第二天：\n\n发生了糟糕的事情。死了好多人。我感觉很恶心。
斯坦利·道森的日记，第三部分

original:
DAY 3:

We have encountered no survivors, only piles of dead bodies. The smell is intolerable. We have to wear chemical suits when scavenging so Fowler and Medina have started piling up the corpses in the old Monorail.

We found very little edible food outside. So much was rotten or infested with bugs. It will all have to be destroyed.
translation:
第三天：

我们没有遇到任何幸存者，只看到成堆的尸体。气味让人难以忍受。我们在搜寻时必须穿上化学防护服，所以福勒和梅迪纳开始把尸体堆放在旧单轨铁路上。

我们在外面找到的食物几乎都不能吃。大部分都腐烂了或是被虫子咬了。所有这些食物都只能被销毁。
斯坦利·道森的日记，第四部分

original: DAY 4:\n\nThree more people showed up today. They exited from Block D after they spotted us on one of the old security cameras. I’d heard all the other blocks were destroyed but the security areas held out under lock down and three people managed to survive in there from shit they found in the pipes. They don’t look so good and none of us are doctors or medically trained. I’m not sure how long they will last.
translation: 第四天：\n\n今天又有三个人出现了。他们在旧的安全摄像头上看到我们后，从D区走了出来。我听说其他所有区域都已被摧毁，但安全区域在封锁下坚持了下来，这三个人靠从管道里找到的东西活了下来。他们看起来状态不太好，而我们中没有人是医生或接受过医疗培训。我不确定他们还能撑多久。
斯坦利·道森的日记，第五部分

original: DAY 5:\n\nThe Anti-Rad meds seem to be working well on the sick group, or maybe it was just having a good cooked meal. One of them is a scientist or something. He found some tools they were using to scan the rubble for density and weaknesses, so Clay is out there now trying to get it all to work properly.
translation: 第五天：\n\n抗辐射药物似乎对生病的那群人起到了很好的效果，或者可能只是因为他们吃了一顿热腾腾的饭菜。其中一人好像是科学家之类的身份。他发现了一些他们用来扫描废墟密度和弱点的工具，所以现在克莱正在外面尝试让这些工具正常运转。
斯坦利·道森的日记，第六部分

original:
DAY 6:

Southbound to Olney, here we go. Apparently that was the easiest route out after all.
So many lives may have been lost all for nothing...

The tunnel is almost completely out of action but there is an emergency exit in a clear spot about a quarter of a mile in. Everyone says it will take months if not years but I still think we can do it.

We found a load of booze stashed in the old bar, so a few of us got a bit drunk earlier to celebrate. I thought Fowler would be mad but he said we could all do with a break before the hard work begins.
translation:
第六天：

我们要向奥尔尼南行了。显然，这是最容易的路线。

这么多生命可能白白牺牲了......

隧道几乎完全瘫痪了，但大约四分之一英里处有一个清晰的紧急出口。大家都说，如果不花上几个月甚至几年的时间，我们是无法完成这个任务的，但我仍然觉得我们可以办到。

我们在旧酒吧里发现了很多藏酒，所以我们中的一些人早些时候喝醉了来庆祝。我以为福勒会生气，但他说在艰难的工作开始之前，我们都需要放松一下。
斯坦利·道森的日记，第七部分

original:
DAY 8:

The tunnel is looking better already.

We’re working in shifts and using old fashioned pulley rigs to get the job done, but it is getting done even if it is only one rock at a time.
translation:
第八天：

隧道的情况看起来已经好多了。

我们正在轮流作业，使用老式的滑轮装置来完成工作，即使一次只能移动一块石头，工作也在持续进行中。
斯坦利·道森的日记，第八部分

original: DAY 19:\n\nMrs Hodge died today. She was very sick and had not been able to move in days. None of the meds seemed to work so I guess she had a disease. She was in the group from Sector D so I never got to know her. I wish that I had had the time.
translation: 第十九天：\n\n霍奇太太今天去世了。她病得很重，已经好几天无法动弹了。似乎任何药物对她都无效，所以我想她可能是染上了一种疾病。她是D区的人，所以我从未有机会了解她。我希望我曾有过这样的机会。
斯坦利·道森的日记，第九部分

original:
DAY whatever:

We caused a rubble avalanche today which nearly killed me and Medina. One of the rocks we moved put pressure on an old load bearing girder which buckled and sent down a cascade of rocks and dirt. We had a flat cart on the tracks which we dived onto and the others yanked us out of there before the worst of it came down.

Clay did some audio scans once everything had settled. He says he can hear something moving around on the other side of the rubble. We don’t know what it is or what they are but they sound big. Fowler has canceled the entire dig until we can find out more about what we are dealing with.

Clay and Davenport are out there now setting up the rest of the scanners...

They’re calling for me again. Gotta go...
translation:
第随便哪天：

我们今天引发了一场碎石滑坡，差点要了我和梅迪纳的命。我们移动的一块碎石对一根老旧承重梁产生了压力，导致其弯曲，进而引发了一系列碎石和泥土的滑落。当时我们有一辆平板车停在轨道上，我们赶紧跳了上去，其他人在最危险的情况发生前把我们拉了出来。

克莱在一切稳定后进行了音频扫描。他说他能听到废墟另一侧有东西在移动。我们不知道那是什么，但它们听起来体型庞大。福勒已经取消了所有的挖掘工作，直到我们能更多地了解我们正在面对的情况。

克莱和达文波特现在正在那里设置其余的扫描仪......

他们又在叫我了。我得走了......
斯坦利·道森的日记，第十部分

original:
Final Diary Entry:

Those things are in here everywhere. They tunneled through to us! What the hell are they? Nothing kills them...

The others are all dead...

Clay and Davenport both torn to shreds before our eyes...

Fowler blew himself up with his own damn frag. What the fuck!

I don’t know if the Sector Security doors will stop these things or how long I can hide down here...

God damn it we tried our best.
translation:
最后的日记条目：

那些怪物无处不在。它们挖隧道来到了我们这里！它们到底是什么？没有任何东西能杀死它们......

其他人都死了......

克莱和达文波特在我们的眼前被撕成了碎片......

福勒居然用他自己的破片手雷把自己炸死了。这他妈到底是怎么回事！

我不知道安全区的门能不能挡住这些怪物，也不知道我还能在这里躲多久......

老天啊，我们尽力了。

original:
All remaining troops are being called back to HQ for immediate reassignment. That includes what's left of your people and the entire medical team. The Capitol is lost. Anyone left in the asylum will have to fend for themselves.

The lives lost to this civilian uprising are a damn shame but we just do not have the resources to deal with that right now and we need you all elsewhere.

The radstorms in your area are intensifying. With any luck that will take care of the hostile locals for us in time.

Get out of there now, that's an order!
translation:
所有剩余的部队都被召回总部进行重新部署，包括你剩下的成员和整个医疗团队。国会大厦已经失守，留在疯人院里的任何人都得自求多福。

平民起义导致的伤亡令人痛心疾首，但我们现在没有资源处理此事，我们需要你们前往其他地方支援。

你们地区的辐射风暴正在加剧，但愿这能为我们及时清除那些敌对的当地人。

立刻离开那里，这是命令！

洛克希勒
帕尔默
默多克
索普队长
剥制师的老奥尔尼信息

original: Look out for a human male called Chelk and a Super Mutant called Doomfist. I need to know if they are OK or need help. When I last heard from them they were watching the Olney ruins from a distance not far from the Fire Station. The B.O.S. were battling the local Deathclaw population at the time and they were waiting for a break in the combat to sneak in a steal a Deathclaw corpse undetected. Apparently the B.O.S. were testing some new Power Armor that did not help by any accounts.
translation: 留意一个名叫查克的人类男性和一个名叫毁灭拳的超级变种人。我想知道他们是否安全，或者是否需要帮助。我最后一次得到他们的消息时，他们正在消防站附近远处观察奥尔尼废墟。当时兄弟会正在与当地的死亡爪交战，他们打算等战斗间隙偷偷溜进去，神不知鬼不觉地偷走一具死亡爪的尸体。据说兄弟会在测试一些新的动力装甲，但似乎没有任何效果。

original:
Nov 7th 2077

It’s been two weeks since the last explosion outside and we have still had no luck accessing any of the local networks. 

This terminal is ancient tech and will only be sufficient for recording data logs. At least this way though if we do re-establish a link with Vault-Tec then they cannot arrest us for hacking around their read-only software.

Crystal City has become sealed off by unimaginably severe cave-ins in all its exit tunnels. The main entrance in particular seems to have been near a point of impact and the area has become severely irradiated. The Military alongside the Civ-Def have set up blockades on the upper level but many people seem oblivious to the risks and are still desperate to tunnel out.
It does not help that the Station was at full capacity when the nukes went off.

There are hundreds more people down here than we have food and accommodation for. Even though the city was built to withstand a local blast, by my estimations we still only have enough supplies in cold storage to last us all four months at best. With all the exits sealed it may only serve to prolong our suffering.
translation:
2277年11月7日

自从上次外面的爆炸已经过去两周了，但我们仍然无法访问任何本地网络。

这台终端是古董技术，只能用来记录数据日志。但至少这样，如果我们重新与避难所科技建立联系，他们也不能因为我们破解他们的只读软件而逮捕我们。

水晶城的所有出口隧道都因难以想象的严重塌方而被封闭。特别是主入口，似乎靠近爆炸点，该区域受到了严重辐射。军方和民防部队已在上层设置了路障，但许多人似乎没有意识到风险，仍然迫切地想挖地道逃出去。

核弹爆炸时，车站已经人满为患，这无济于事。

这里的人数超出了我们的食物和住宿容量数百人。尽管这座城市是为了抵御局部爆炸而建造的，但据我估计，我们冷藏库中的物资最多只能维持我们所有人四个月。随着所有出口的封闭，这可能只会延长我们的遭罪的日子。

original:
Nov 9th 2077

The local civilian population are distressed and confused. Many even seem to blame us as the only Vault-Tec representatives around here, and the situation is nearing the breaking point.
They are demanding to know why adequate safety measures were not incorporated into the tunnel designs, at least as far as the nearest emergency exit. I sure as hell don’t have the answers and neither does Leonard or Sabrina. We’re just admins for fuck's sake, not architects.

There’s a guy from HQ with us now too, Billy. Barely out of his teens, he just used to work the phones but when they spotted his name tag several people grouped together and started threatening him. Apparently one of the gang used to work here at Besnik’s before we took it over and was branding us as thieves and murderers. 

We have had to stick to hiding in our office with the doors locked. A Sgt Alvarez, one of the DC Police Troopers who got trapped down here has been looking out for us and bringing us the supplies we need. It was his suggestion that we stay hidden for now until things calm down a bit, though I can’t see that happening anytime soon.

This office sure as hell was not meant to house this many personnel for this long either. We’ve only been stuck in here two days and it already smells so bad I want to puke but Leonard did that earlier and now I think we all secretly want to kill him.
translation:
2277年11月9日

当地的平民感到焦虑和困惑。许多人甚至责怪我们，因为我们是这里唯一的避难所科技代表，局势正濒临崩溃。

他们要求知道为什么隧道设计中没有包含足够的安全措施，至少到最近的紧急出口。我当然不知道答案，伦纳德和萨布丽娜也不知道。我们只他妈的是管理人员，不是建筑师。

现在还有一个总部的人跟我们一起，叫比利。他刚成年不久，以前只是接电话的。但当他们看到他的名牌时，几个人聚在一起开始威胁他。显然，其中一个团伙在我们接管之前在贝斯尼克的这里工作过，并把我们称为小偷和杀人犯。

我们不得不躲在办公室里，锁上门。一位被困在这里的特区警察阿尔瓦雷斯中士一直在照顾我们，给我们提供所需的物资。他建议我们现在先躲起来，直到事情平息下来，但我看不出这很快就会发生。

这个办公室显然也不是为了容纳这么多人员这么长时间而设计的。我们被困在这里才两天，但这里的气味已经让人难以忍受，臭的我想吐，伦纳德之前已经吐过了，现在我想我们大家都有点想杀了他。

original:
Nov 17th 2077

I was able to get out of the office for the first time in days. We have to take it in turns with a Civ-Def or Police escort wherever we go. It looks like tunneling operations have focused on the Northern line. From what I hear that’s not such a good idea being a long way from a suitable exit but according to scans it has the sparsest damage. I asked who was doing the scans but no-one I talked to seemed sure. Apparently someone was crushed trying to move a girder strut to the South on the Olney line so they were not getting as many volunteers as they needed. I would not be surprised if the scans were made up to promote the work effort again, not that I’m complaining I guess.

Other than the opportunity to get out and see a few new faces there was not much to do. This is hardly the hive of activity it once was. Now people lay huddled, grouped together up in corners, sharing whispers and what little remains of their dwindling supplies whilst watching the fitter and healthier people moving rocks from one place to another, or arguing for one reason or another.

The club is still open despite its proximity to the irradiated entrance. I was advised to avoid it. Not long ago someone was killed in a bar brawl but since most of the people involved were Civ-Def arguing drunkenly over safety arrangements it’s unlikely the place will be shut down. Now it only seems to attract the rowdy types. As we walked below, several of them attempted to spit and pour drinks on us so I was escorted back to the office.
translation:
2277年11月17日

我几天来第一次能够离开办公室。无论我们去哪里，都必须由民防或警察轮流护送。看来挖掘工作主要集中在北线。据我所知，离合适的出口这么远并不是个好主意，但扫描结果显示，那里的损坏最小。我问是谁在做扫描，但和我交谈的人似乎都不确定。显然，在奥尔尼线南部，有人在试图移动一根横梁支柱时被压死了，所以他们没有得到所需的那么多志愿者。如果扫描是为了再次推动挖掘工作而编造的，我也不会感到惊讶，不过我想我也不会抱怨。

除了有机会出去看看一些新面孔外，没有什么可做的。这里已经不再是以前那样热闹了。现在人们蜷缩在一起，聚集在角落里，低声交谈，分享着他们日益减少的物资，同时看着更健康的人把石头从一个地方搬到另一个地方，或者因为某种原因而争吵。

尽管俱乐部靠近被辐射的入口，但它仍然营业。有人建议我避开那里。不久前，有人在酒吧斗殴中被杀，但由于大多数参与者都是民防人员，他们醉醺醺地争论安全安排，所以这个地方不太可能被关闭。现在它似乎只吸引那些吵闹的人。当我们走过时，他们中的一些人试图向我们吐口水和倒饮料，所以我被护送回了办公室。

original:
Dec 4th 2077

Food Riots began last night. They seem to be fighting in the lower levels right now. I can feel the dull thump of explosives through the walls. Somehow the office has remained secure throughout, though we lost Leonard to the initial onslaught. Someone in the crowd accused us of hiding supplies and a large gang of them attacked our Police guard. Leonard tried to help and someone cracked his skull open with a hammer. As soon as the Civ-Def spotted what was happening they started shooting, people in the crowd shot back and pretty soon everyone was fighting or fleeing.

The remainder or the Police and Military joined together to try and break everything up but even some of the Civs joined the counter attack on them and now they’re all just fighting each other. In the madness they seem to have forgotten about us. I have no idea how long that will last though and we have very little to defend ourselves with if they come for us.
translation:
2277年12月4日

昨晚爆发了缺粮暴动。他们现在似乎正在低层激战。我能感觉到爆炸的沉闷震动透过墙壁传来。不知何故，办公室在整个过程中一直保持安全，尽管我们在暴动的初期就失去了伦纳德。人群中有人指责我们藏匿物资，一大群人攻击了我们的警察守卫。伦纳德试图帮忙，但有人用锤子砸破了他的头。当民防人员发现暴动后，他们开始射击，人群中的人开枪还击，很快所有人都开始战斗或逃跑。

剩下的警察和军人联合起来试图平息暴乱，但即使是一些平民也加入了反击他们的行列，现在他们陷入了混战。在混乱中，他们似乎忘记了我们。我不知道这种情况会持续多久，如果他们来找我们，我们几乎没有东西可以自卫。

original: This is still not enough firepower. Whoever those sick bastards are they are gonna pay for what they did to our crew. I want that whole damn Asylum razed to the ground!
translation: 这火力还是不够。不管那些混蛋是谁，他们都要为对我们的人所做的事付出代价。我要把整个疯人院彻底摧毁！

original:
June 17th

Raiders and robots to the south but it's quiet around here... No people, no animals, nothing... Strange. No heavy radiation or pollutants nearby despite several warning signs to the contrary. I wonder what happened here...

June 18th

Can't sleep, I keep hearing screams... No gunfire, no bombs or even people in the area... just spine chilling screams... sometimes voices too. I think someone is watching me. In fact I'm getting out of here right now.
translation:
6月17日

南方有劫掠者和机器人出没，但这里却很安静......没有人，没有动物，什么都没有......很奇怪。尽管周围有几个警告标志，但附近并没有严重的辐射或污染物。我想知道这里到底发生了什么......

6月18日

无法入睡，我一直听到尖叫声......这个地区没有枪声、炸弹爆炸声，甚至都没有人的踪迹......只有令人毛骨悚然的尖叫声......有时还能听到说话声。我觉得有人在监视我。事实上，我现在就要离开这里。

original: More people went missing last night including one of Plumber's kids. Some of the other boys admitted they bet him he couldn't tag the old asylum. Many people think the place is haunted. Our remaining fighters are preparing to attack the building in case the others are there too. I don't know what we'll do if they don't return. We should never have settled here...
translation: 昨晚又有许多人失踪了，其中还包括一个水管工的孩子。别的男孩承认他们打赌他不敢去那个老疯人院，不少人认为那闹鬼。我们剩下的斗士们正在准备攻打下那座建筑以防里面还有别人。如果他们回不来那怎么办？我不知道。我们就不该在这安营扎寨。

original:
Hello there stranger!

I have great news for you!

You have found one of many boxes I have personally Air-Dropped to help out all the good folks out there struggling to get by in this horror infested wasteland.

Where did I get all this loot you may well wonder? I’ll tell you because I’m such a good guy. I got it all from a place called Fort Detrick. It's an old Military Bunker hidden underground. The whole place had been un-looted since the war and contains enough supplies to feed the entire state along with a stash of hundreds of weapons. I thought rather than letting it all go to waste or hoarding it personally, I would share the treasures with the rest of the wasteland.

In this box along with weapons, medicine, food and ammo you should find a Keycard which will gain you access to the Fort itself. Meet me there and I will personally give you and your friends as many supplies as you need for as long as you need.

I hope to see you soon,

Peace!

Zeus.
translation:
嘿，陌生人！

我有个好消息要告诉你！

你找到了我亲自空投的众多补给箱中的一个，这些箱子是为了帮助那些在这个恐怖肆虐的废土上艰难求生的人们。

你可能会好奇，我从哪里弄到这么多物资的？我告诉你吧，因为我是个好人。这些东西都来自一个叫德特里克堡的地方。它是一个隐藏在地下的旧军事掩体。自从战争爆发以来，整个地方都未被掠夺过，里面的物资足够养活整个州的人，还有数百件武器的储备。我认为，与其让这些物资白白浪费或被我私自囤积，不如与废土上的其他人分享这些宝藏。

在这个箱子里，除了武器、药品、食物和弹药外，你还应该找到一张可以进入堡垒的门禁卡。在那里见我，我会亲自给你和你的朋友们提供你们所需的任何物资。

希望尽快见到你，

和平！

宙斯。

original:
Carlsmith found a couple of treasure boxes full of weapons, ammo and meds in the wastes north of here last night. They both had a note and a key inside. The note says some guy called Zeus cracked open an un-looted pre-war Fort near here. Now this Zeus character says we can all share in the Fort’s supplies, all we need to do is head over there and take what we need.

Something about this feels totally wrong, like a trap... but why would someone just throw away weapons and valuable chems unless they actually wanted to help? It still seems naive though. He will almost certainly be attacked by all sorts of Raiders and other organizations if he keeps this up. Maybe he has good defenses, I don’t know.

We’re heading over there later today but we’re going in prepared. We sold the stuff we didn’t need from the box to buy better armor and more ammo. If this is some kind of trap we’ll make this Zeus character or whoever is responsible regret it.
translation:
卡尔史密斯昨晚在北方的废墟里找到了两个宝箱，里面装满了武器、弹药和药品。它们里面都有一张纸条和一把钥匙。纸条上说一个叫宙斯的人打开了附近一个战前未被掠夺的堡垒。现在这个叫宙斯的人说我们可以分享堡垒里的物资，只需要去那里拿我们需要的东西。

这件事感觉非常不对劲，像是个陷阱......但为什么会有人扔掉武器和珍贵的化学品，除非他们真的想帮忙？不过，这看起来还是很天真。如果他继续这样做，他肯定会遭到各种劫掠者和其他组织的攻击。也许他有很好的防御措施，我不清楚。

我们今天晚些时候要去那里，但我们会做好准备。我们把箱子里不需要的东西卖掉，买了更好的盔甲和更多的弹药。如果这是个陷阱，我们会让这个叫宙斯的人或任何幕后黑手后悔莫及。
费尔福克斯掠夺者的笔记

original: Found some mad shit on a rich bastard near Red Racer. A bunch of Vid-Discs like I've never seen before. One has footage of Talon Mercs getting torn apart by Super Mutants in some vast Cavern, the other shows some Outcast chumps getting slashed to bits by Mirelurks. It was awesome. Where the hell can I get more of this shit?
translation: 在红赛车手附近的一个有钱人那里找到了一些疯狂的东西。一堆我以前从未见过的视频光盘。其中一个光盘上有鹰爪佣兵在一个巨大的洞穴里被超级变种人撕成碎片的震撼画面，另一个光盘则记录了一些流放者被泥沼蟹砍成碎片的惨烈场景。这简直太刺激了。我究竟上哪儿才能找到更多这样的视频呢？

original: Here’s the full package you ordered. Thank you for your interest and discretion. As you requested we’ll be in contact when the next Disc is ready. Do not attempt to contact us in the meantime.
translation: 这是您订购的完整包裹。感谢您的关注和谨慎行事。按照您的要求，我们将在下一个光盘制作完成后与您联系。在此期间，请不要尝试联系我们。

original: Here we go again! That Ghoul Rumble was great! We kicked some serious irradiated ass in there. The Sarge might be pissed that the Fort was near useless and we nearly ended up in a trap but at least we showed those cowards behind the cameras who is boss. I guess whomever is behind this party never expected a full squad of battle hardened Talon Mercs with robot backup to show. Now we know what we are up against and we have a ton of extra gear for the next location. We can’t lose!
translation: 又来了！那场尸鬼摔角大赛真是太精彩了！我们狠狠地教训了那些被辐射的混蛋一顿。中士可能会因为堡垒几乎没用，而我们差点落入陷阱而生气，但至少我们向那些躲在摄像头后面的胆小鬼展示了谁是老大。我猜，举办这场活动的人从未想过会有一支全副武装的鹰爪佣兵小队，还有机器人支援会出现。现在我们已经知道了对手是谁，而且为下一个地点准备了大量的额外装备。我们不会输的！

original:
We found another of one those crates on patrol yesterday. Those things must be everywhere and are most likely the cause of all the extra disappearances over the last few weeks. The Fort mentioned in the notes is most likely a trap. We’ll have to leave that place alone until we know better what we are dealing with here.

A local drunk, popular with some of the DC patrols, reported lots of activity in the old Rosenhan Brewery area. Though his information was hazy and badly remembered it seemed to check out.

For several days he says he heard construction sounds coming from inside and occasionally robots would head in and out carrying materials. The place has been locked up tight since, though apparently a gang of rowdy Raiders headed over there one night armed to the teeth and never emerged again.

We think the Brewery and The Fort may be linked somehow. Maybe the people responsible are hiding there. We need you to check the place out. Force an entry if you have to but try not to get spotted or engage the enemy. We need info right now, not another war if we can help it.
translation:
我们昨天在巡逻时又发现了一个这样的箱子。这些东西可能随处可见，很可能是过去几周失踪事件频发的原因。笔记中提到的堡垒很可能是一个陷阱。在我们弄清楚正在面对什么情况之前，必须避开那个地方。

一名颇受DC巡逻队欢迎的当地醉汉报告说，罗森汉啤酒厂旧址附近有很多活动。虽然他的信息模糊不清，记忆也不准确，但似乎可以确认。

他说，他连续几天都听到里面有施工的声音，偶尔还会有机器人进出搬运材料。从那以后，那个地方就被严密封锁了。不过，显然有一伙吵闹的劫掠者在一个晚上全副武装地前往那里，之后就再也没有出现过。

我们认为啤酒厂和堡垒可能以某种方式相连。也许负责的人就藏在那里。我们需要你去那里调查一下。如果需要的话，就强行进入，但尽量不要被发现或与敌人交战。我们现在需要的是信息，如果我们能避免的话，而不是另一场战争。

original: The War has been over nearly a year and nothing has changed. We just finished clearing out the last of the Special Affairs squad. They were totally unprepared for an attack so close to their own warehouse. The plan to infiltrate Mama Dolces worked better than even I had expected and from there the rest was easy.\n\nCapatin Zheng is maintaining strict discipline within the ranks. I’m not sure how much longer I can take this. I have killed so many Americans and Chinese I can’t remember which side I’m meant to be on anymore. Zheng’s country may not exist anymore and yet he still struts around like he’s the Emperor himself. Meanwhile my own country lies in tatters, any proof I was once working as a spy is most likely destroyed, leaving me in very much on the wrong side and well behind enemy lines.
translation: 战争已经结束将近一年了，但一切都没有改变。我们刚刚清理完最后一支特别事务小队。他们完全没有准备好应对如此接近自己仓库的攻击。渗透进妈妈多莉丝的计划比我预期的还要成功，从那之后，剩下的行动就简单多了。\n\n郑队长在队伍中维持着严格的纪律。我不知道自己还能坚持多久。我杀了太多美国人和中国人，已经不记得自己究竟该站在哪一边了。郑的祖国可能已经不复存在了，但他仍然像皇帝一样四处招摇。与此同时，我自己的祖国却一片混乱，任何证明我曾是间谍的证据很可能都已经被销毁了，这使我完全站错了队，并且深入敌后。

original: Escaping from the Remnants was the best decision I have made in months. Zheng actually trusted me to leave with a full complement of hacked Security Droids after I gave him some bullshit about needing to purge the local area of Capitalist sympathizers.\n\nThe info from the Bureau offers lots of interesting places to hide. I think I’ll check out Takoma Park first and see if I can get into Fort Lewis using some of the restricted codes. My first posting was there so at least I know the area well.
translation: 逃离残部是我这几个月来做出的最明智的决定。我给了郑一些关于需要清除当地资本主义同情者的瞎话后，他居然信任我，让我带着一支完整的被破解的安全机器人小队离开。\n\n从局里得到的信息提供了许多有趣的藏身之处。我想我会先去塔科马公园，看看是否能用一些受限代码进入路易斯要塞。我一开始就是在那里服役的，所以至少我对那里很熟悉。

original: Those crazy bastards tried to eat me. Three years since the nukes went off and the Armed Forces have descended into cannibalism. Even with my skin turning Grey and cracking they still saw me as their next meal and nothing more. Dispatching them was easy, many were even suffering from the advanced stages of radiation poisoning. For some reason my skin seems to be adapting. It was the same with most of the Remnants. I guess it was something they gave us in the immunity boosters before we shipped out. Now at least I have a Fort to call home and half a dozen new Droids to add to my Army.
translation: 那些发疯的混蛋试图吃掉我。核爆发生已经三年了，武装部队居然沦为了食人族。即使我的皮肤变得灰白并裂开，他们仍然只把我视作他们的下一顿饭，而不是别的什么。消灭他们很容易，因为他们中的许多人甚至已经患有晚期辐射中毒。出于某种原因，我的皮肤似乎在逐渐适应这种环境。大多数残部的人也是如此。我想这是我们在出发前注射的免疫增强剂起的作用。现在至少我有一个堡垒可以称之为家，还有六个新的机器人可以加入我的军队。

original: I sliced open some thieves who snuck in last night using some looted SteathBoys. One of the stealth fields refused to shut down after I cut one open at the midsection with a Ripper. It looked like guts and blood were spraying out from thin air for a second. Quite a sight. I wish I’d had a camera handy to capture the moment.
translation: 我昨晚用几个偷来的隐身小子干掉了几个偷偷溜进来的小偷。我用开膛手把一个家伙从中间切开后，他的隐身效果居然没有消失。有那么一瞬间，看起来就像是从无中生有地喷出了内脏和血液。真是壮观的一幕。我真希望我当时手边有个相机能把那一刻拍下来。

original: There’s been fighting outside for what feels like weeks. Super Mutants, soldiers in Power Armor, Ghouls, Raiders. Anything and everything seems to be converging on the Capitol. Nearly 40 years I have lived here at Fort Lewis, scavenging enough supplies to start another revolution. I think now it is time to move on before I lose my base of operations to a stray nuke. Such a shame. I shall miss the fireworks.
translation: 外面的战斗已经持续了好几个星期，感觉像是没完没了。超级变种人、穿着动力装甲的士兵、尸鬼、劫掠者。似乎所有的势力都在向国会大厦聚集。我在路易斯要塞住了将近40年，一直在搜集物资，想要再次发动革命。但我想现在是时候离开了，否则我的基地可能会被一颗打偏的核弹夷为平地。真是太可惜了。我会怀念那些炮火连天的日子的。

original: All the missing people were reported to be heading to this location, Fort Detrick. It’s mentioned in those notes that were Air-Dropped all over. It may be some kind of Raider trap so we’re setting up camp right outside. We’re gonna bait ‘em out and catch any criminals who exit in a crossfire.\n\nBarker is checking out the entrance for traps and then he’s heading inside with the Rookie. Max and I will wait outside and cover them when they come running out.
translation: 据报告，所有失踪的人都前往了德特里克堡这个地方。那些空投的笔记中也提到了这一点。这可能是一个劫掠者的陷阱，所以我们打算在外面扎营。我们要把他们引诱出来，然后在交叉火力中抓住逃出来的罪犯。\n\n巴克正在检查入口处的陷阱，然后他会和新兵一起进去。我和马克斯会在外面守着，等他们出来的时候掩护他们。

original: The damn door slammed shut! It won’t open for shit! No response from Barker. I think I can hear something coming...
translation: 该死的门突然关上了！怎么都打不开！巴克没有回应。我好像听到有什么东西正在靠近......
欢迎来到德特里克堡摔角赛！

original:
Welcome future hero! You are about to become the star of your very own movie! The move of your life and most likely death!

I apologize for tricking you into coming here under false pretenses, but I assure you, if you perform well in front of the cameras you will be handsomely rewarded.

The crate below this terminal contains many valuable items. Like the Fort’s current occupants, it will be restocked by my faithful robot companions from now until the robots themselves break down (should you wish to come back for seconds).

To get the key to the Reward Box you must track down and kill the area’s Alpha or Boss Monster. In this case it’s a glowing ghoul by the name of Woody. Watch out! He’s tougher than he looks. My security force can attest to that.

If you are victorious, then return here with the key to pick up your reward. Like the box that most likely sent you here you will find another key inside. This key will open up seven other locations, or as I prefer to call them - “Rumble Zones”. The coordinates of the locations will be automatically transferred from this terminal at the end of this message.

For easy reference here are their names before I converted them for this purpose:

-Festinger’s Chasm (near The Corvega Factory)
-Fort Lewis (Takoma Park)
-Rosenhan’s Brewery (near Anchorage Memorial)
-Sperry’s Quarry (South West wasteland)
-Blacktooth Publishing (West of Fairfax)
-Wagner's Cavern (North East wasteland)
-Nuka Cola Regional HQ (Chevy Chase)

Should you defeat the other seven remaining Rumbles, collecting a total of 8 Reward Keys in the process, you will gain access to my own personal Vault. Each key unlocks a separate door. Why give you access to my own Vault? Honestly, because I’m bored and need a good fight. If you can battle that far I’ll see that you are well rewarded for your efforts by killing you myself.

I thank you in advance for your hostility.

Zeus.

PS. Incidentally the last Rumble at Chevy is entirely optional. We're having a little trouble with the door and the reward key will only open the reward box. I'm hoping you'll be bloodthirsty enough to indulge me anyway.
translation:
欢迎未来的英雄！你即将成为你自己电影中的明星！这部动作片也可能会是你的绝命片！

我很抱歉用虚假的借口把你骗到这里，但我向你保证，如果你在镜头前表现出色，你会得到丰厚的奖励。

这台终端下方的箱子里装有许多贵重物品。就像堡垒的当前住客一样，从现在开始，我的忠实机器人伙伴会不断为其补充物资，直到机器人本身出现故障（如果你愿意再来的话）。

要获得奖励箱的钥匙，你必须追踪并杀死这个区域的阿尔法级或首领怪物。在这种情况下，它是一只发光的尸鬼，名叫伍迪。小心！他比看上去更强壮。我的安保人员可以作证。

如果你获胜了，就带着钥匙回到这里领取你的奖励。就像很可能把你送到这里的箱子一样，你会发现里面还有另一把钥匙。这把钥匙将打开其他七个地点，或者说我更喜欢称之为“摔跤区”。这些地点的坐标将在本消息结束时自动从这台终端传输给你。

为了方便你参考，我在为此目的转换它们之前，先列出了它们的名字：

-费斯廷格裂口（靠近科维加工厂）
-路易斯要塞（塔科马公园）
-罗森汉啤酒厂（靠近安克雷奇纪念堂）
-斯佩里采石场（西南废土）
-黑牙出版社（费尔法克斯以西）
-瓦格纳洞穴（东北废土）
-核子可乐地区总部（彻维-彻斯）

如果你击败了其他七个剩余的摔跤比赛，在这个过程中总共收集了8把奖励钥匙，你将获得进入我私人避难所的权限。每把钥匙打开一扇不同的门。为什么让你进入我自己的避难所？说实话，因为我无聊，需要一场好斗。如果你能战斗到那么远的地方，我会亲自杀死你，以确保你的努力得到丰厚的回报。

我提前感谢你的敌意。

宙斯。

顺便说一句，彻维-彻斯的最后一场摔角完全是可选的。我们的门有点问题，奖励钥匙只能打开奖励箱。我希望你足够嗜血，无论如何都要满足我。

甜麦炸弹

鲜肉蛋糕：
豌豆烧猪肉
饱饱牌肉罐头
面粉

干脆牛排：
薯片
肉汁汉堡排
恶魔美味芥末蛋

泥沼蟹汤：
泥沼蟹肉
葡萄酒
白兰哥干酪通心面

original: This will be home sweet home for you and your boys from now on. Just make sure you do a better job than that fool Littleton. How he managed to let a mob of deranged clones walk out of there victorious is beyond me, even with the footage to go by. I've dispatched several more Sentry bots to bolster your numbers. If you need anything else just let me know.\nZeus.
translation: 从现在开始，这里将是你和你的手下们的甜蜜之家。只要确保你做得比那个笨蛋利特尔顿更好。我不明白他是怎么让一群疯狂的克隆人胜利逃脱的，即使有录像记录。我已经又派了一些哨兵机器人来增强你们的实力。如果你还需要什么，尽管告诉我。\n\n宙斯。

original:
Thanks boss, I won't let you down. This building looks great. I can't believe how you keep stumbling upon these places.
We just finished adding some extra defenses to the upper platform and we booby trapped the entrance. The next idiot to stumble in here is in for a big surprise.
Food stocks look good and my mob are ready for anything. Bring it on!
Ennis.
translation:
谢谢老板，我不会让你失望的。这栋楼真不错。我真不敢相信你是怎么总能找到这些地方的。

我们刚在上层平台增加了一些防御措施，还在入口处布置了陷阱。下一个不小心闯进来的人可有苦头吃了。

食品储备很充足，我的手下们都已做好万全准备。放马过来吧！

恩尼斯。

original: Super Mutants outside are becoming a problem. They seem to be growing in number and it's preventing my boys from getting out. There are no toilets or functioning sinks left in the entire building and the last guys solution has not helped much. He built twin outhouses above a collapsed room and all that built-up crap in the room below seems to have turned toxic. I'm actually picking up rads in the local area now, not to mention the smell. If you could spare a few repair-bots maybe we could install some new plumbing.\nEnnis.
translation: 外面的超级变种人越来越多，成了个大麻烦。他们数量不断增加，我的手下都没法外出了。整栋楼里已经没有厕所或能用的水槽，而上一个家伙的解决方案也不顶用。他在一个塌陷的房间上面建了两个简易茅厕，下面房间里堆积的垃圾好像已经变成了有毒物质。我现在在这片区域都检测到了辐射，更别提那股臭味了。如果你能匀出几个修理机器人，也许我们能安装一些新的水管设施。\n\n恩尼斯。

original: Negative on the repair-bots. They are stretched too thin as it is. You'll just have to make do and improvise for the time being, besides I need you all ready to fight, not redecorating the building. I'll make sure you are well stocked with water and anti-rad medication with regular air-drops. You just make sure no-one leaves that building alive.\nZeus.
translation: 修理机器人不行。他们现在人手紧缺。你得将就一下，暂时自己想办法解决，而且我需要你们随时准备战斗，而不是装修大楼。我会确保定期空投水和抗辐射药物给你们。你只需要确保那栋楼里的敌人一个都别想活着逃出去。\n\n宙斯。

original: Damn Turret controls are down again. I just can't figure why this keeps happening, or why I installed the thing in the first place...
translation: 该死的炮塔控制系统又出故障了。我就是想不明白为什么这种事老是发生，或者我当初为什么要安装这玩意儿......

original:
REACTOR STATUS WARNING:

Multiple faults detected...
Radiation leak detected...
Toxic gas venting detected...
User Control Interface disabled...
Advanced System Fuctions offline...
Critical Shutdown imminent...
translation:
反应堆状态警告：

检测到多个故障......
检测到辐射泄漏......
检测到有毒气体排放......
用户控制界面已禁用......
高级系统功能已离线......
即将紧急关闭......
约瑟夫皮特的日记，第一天

original: Xcg,ewkl MANaa,msd,m.... settling in OK. We can still hear the sounds of explosions from above. God only knows what is happening ouT 3iusa/ A,NLNahhds..... The house cams blew out minutes after we sealed the shelter and we experienced what felt like several major earthquakes. Tommy and June are holding up well considering and the supplies I stashed down here should keep us safe and entertained for many years. With any luvbnb/ DSLJNjnlanl a,msm ....\n::::Error:::::\n:::: File corrupt ::::
translation:
Xcg,ewkl MANaa,msd,m...，设置搞定了。我们仍然能听到上方传来的爆炸声。只有天知道外面发生了什么混乱情况。我们刚把避难所密封好，房子里的摄像头就坏掉了，接着又经历了数次剧烈震动，感觉像是发生了大地震。考虑到当前的处境，汤米和琼的表现还算不错，而且我藏在这里的补给品应该能让我们安全无忧，且有很多消遣方式，度过很多年。不管未来会发生......

It comes and it goes, sometimes I smell it around the generator too. I hope it was not damaged when the bombs dropped. So far I have seen no faults with the machinery. I guess I'll have to break out the manual and see if I can run a full system diagnostic at some point. Right now though I have too much to worry about with Tommy's illness. 瓦特兹保护者机器人（2300系列）

original: We finally achieved breakthrough success with the Protectron's mounted weapons. We managed to overcome the over-heating issues by frequent coolant injections and increasing the affected armor density. Hand-Lasers now fire fully automatic with only a minor loss of power (below 10%), We actually managed to significantly increase the damage output of the Head Mounted Laser (by approx 20%) as well as making the conversion to full auto. Combining these features with the new adamantium frames and armor you sent over should make these the most advanced Protectron models ever seen on market.
translation: 我们终于在保护者机器人的挂载武器方面取得了突破性成功。我们通过频繁注入冷却液和增加受影响装甲的密度，成功解决了过热问题。现在，手持激光枪可以全自动发射，仅损失极小的功率（低于10%）。我们还成功地将头部激光器的伤害输出提高了约20%，并实现了全自动转换。将这些特性与你送来的新金刚合金框架和装甲相结合，应该会使这些成为市场上最先进的保护者机器人型号。

original: Working with the newer line of military Laser Rifles we applied the same conversion techniques used on the Protectron 2300 series. Early on we ran into a lot of weapon degradation, mainly as a result of over-heating. Lowering the beam intensity but increasing rate of fire helped but it was the switch to Electron Charge Packs as a source for ammunition which fixed the remaining issues with weapon stability and overall condition during use. It also allowed for a far greater ammo capacity than with standard Micro-Fusion Cells.
translation: 在研发新型军用激光步枪时，我们采用了与保护者2300系列相同的转换技术。初期，我们遇到了许多武器性能下降的问题，这主要是由于过热导致的。降低光束强度但提高射速确实有所帮助，但真正解决武器在使用过程中的稳定性和整体性能问题的是改用电子充电包作为弹药。这也使得弹药容量远大于标准微型聚变电池。

original: Progress is still slow on the Auto Pistol. Our main problem is finding a adequate place to attach the new power module without making the weapon too bulky or increasing it's length. Plans have been drawn up for a more slim-line power unit but right now we are still waiting for the parts to be delivered.
translation: 自动手枪的研发进展依然缓慢。我们的主要难题在于为新动力模块找到一个合适的位置进行安装，同时又不让武器变得过于笨重或增加其长度。我们已经为更紧凑的动力单元设计了方案，但目前仍在等待零件到货。

original: With the plans for the Auto Pistol currently on hold I gave the go ahead to start work on improvements to the military's current line of Sentry Bots. Work only started recently but already we have made solid progress with regard to boosting the overall efficiency of their Gatling Lasers. I'm confident we will have a viable new product by the end of the month.
translation: 由于自动手枪的研发计划目前暂停，我批准了开始着手改进军方现有的哨兵机器人。这项工作最近才刚刚启动，但我们在提高加特林激光器的整体效率方面已经取得了明显进展。我有信心在本月底前推出一款切实可行的新产品。

original: I don't know what to say exactly... The bombs dropped this morning.and the bunker hatch entered automatic lockdown. On top of that there were multiple collapses within the bunker. 8 of our staff were killed, 6 when the lab collapsed resulting in a huge explosion which led to the collapse of the lower levels where two more were having their morning coffee in the cafeteria. Right now only four of us remain. We have lost the Lab along with Robot Control, Cold Storage and the entire Lower Level. \nFood stocks are low, we have a single crate of Pork N Beans from the last delivery plus a few items gathered from the various staff bedrooms. We still have access to running water and a decent amount of Nuka-Cola to keep us hydrated. Also I managed to salvage one of the Prototype Laser Rifles. O'Hare, our head of security, is on the ham radio but we can't seem to contact anyone with clearance to get us out of this place. I guess we'll just have to keep trying.
translation: 我真的不知道该说什么好......今天早上炸弹落下了，防空洞的舱盖自动封锁。除此之外，防空洞内还发生了多次坍塌。8名同事遇难，其中6人是在实验室倒塌时不幸身亡的，这引发了一场大爆炸，进而导致低层区域坍塌，当时还有两人在那里的餐厅喝早茶。现在只剩下我们四个人了。我们失去了实验室、机器人控制中心、冷藏库以及整个低层区域。\n\n食品储备不多了，我们只剩下最后一批货物中的一个装有豌豆炖猪肉罐头的板条箱，以及一些从员工宿舍搜集来的东西。我们仍然可以使用自来水，还有相当数量的核子可乐来维持水分。此外，我还设法抢救出了一把原型激光步枪。我们的安保主管奥黑尔正在用无线电联络，但我们似乎联系不上任何有权限让我们离开此地的人。我想，我们只能继续尝试了。

original: Tom Bradley, our Lead Engineer has locked himself in his room.\nErica Moreton, one of our Scientist's, seems to be perpetually drunk, apparently having snuck in several bottles of booze, despite Wattz's strict guidelines regarding employees and alcohol.\nBill O'Hare our Head of Security is the only one of us who seems to have his head on straight. This despite him sitting by the radio night and day, and still finding the time to check in on all of us. He even taught me how to craft some musical instruments and I think I'm gonna give it a go. When I was young I always wanted to be a musician and it should pass the time down here. Bill remains positive we will be rescued. I wish I has his optimism.
translation:
我们的首席工程师汤姆·布拉德利把自己反锁在房间里了。

我们的科学家之一，艾丽卡·莫尔顿，似乎一直处于醉酒状态，尽管瓦特兹对员工饮酒有严格规定，但她显然还是偷偷带进来了几瓶酒。

比尔·奥黑尔，我们的安保主管，似乎是这里唯一头脑清醒的人。尽管他日夜守在收音机旁，还总抽出时间关心我们每个人的情况。他甚至教我如何制作一些乐器，我想我会尝试一下的。我年轻时一直想成为一名音乐家，这应该能帮我在这里打发时间。比尔坚信我们会被救出去。我真希望我能像他那么乐观。

original: There's no damn way out and now the Robots have turned on us. I don't know why but they all seemed to flip out simultaneously, accusing us of being communists! The others wanted to make a fight of it but I know that's pointless so I hid in here. Gunfire seems to have stopped. Shit, I can hear them outside my door. SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME....
translation: 根本没有逃出去的可能，现在机器人也反过来对付我们了。我不知道原因，但它们似乎同时都失控了，指控我们是共产党！其他人想反抗，但我知道这是徒劳，所以我躲在这里。枪声好像停了。该死，我能听到它们在门外。有人能来救救我吗.....

original:
So far, so good. I finally found a working hard drive in amongst all the scrap terminal parts. It's so weird to think one of my long dead relatives used to use this very computer. It looks like there may be some leftover data but given the drive's state when I found it, it will most likely be unsalvagable. Such a shame, I hear they were very interesting people. Here's what I know about them from stories passed down from my mother and father.
Shelton Drake was a very successful TV star. He even played Captain Cosmos, who can still be seen in posters, even to this day.
Back then TV was a lot more popular and lots of people recognized him where ever he went. It is said that he grew weary or all the attention and spent most of his money on elaborate hidden homes where he and his wife, Diana, could get away from it all. 
Diana was a brain doctor before the war. There was a word for it my mom said but I forgot what it was. Apparently she had a high clearance within the military before the war and somehow learned of the impending apocalypse. So Shelton and Diana gathered their things and fled in the middle of the night to this shelter where they were safe from radioactive fallout and raiders. Here they stayed for the rest of their lives. 
Before they died they had four kids, one of which was my great grandfather nine or ten times back, who was called Hester. He too stayed in the shelter his whole life and was the only known survivor of the four children who went on to have kids. Apparently he was a good hunter but I don't know much else about him or his wife.
Their kids left the shelter for reasons I do not know (though I think it was to do with the local radiation) and wound up founding a small community in southern Wyoming called Metrol, where I would eventually be born & raised.
I have to say, compared to home, most of DC is a nightmare. Radiation and disease are common. if not every day hassles here, not to mention all the mutated animals. The people here are much more cynical, untrusting and generally dangerous. Raider gangs are everywhere and I actually saw a gang of Super Mutants last week and I nearly shit myself and hid behind a rock. Iv'e only seen them on their own and from a much greater distance before. They are scary big.
Luckily, when I arrived, the shelter was still fully functional, from electrical systems to the water purifier and was still well stocked with weapons, ammo, even some pre-war food. The turret codes worked as planned, so I still have some defence if this place is attacked. Settling in so far has been easy and even a little exiting.
translation:
到目前为止，一切顺利。我终于在那一堆废旧的终端零件里找到了一个能用的硬盘。想到我某个早已过世的亲戚曾经用过这台电脑，就觉得挺奇怪的。看起来好像还有些残留数据，但鉴于我找到它时硬盘的状态，这些数据很可能无法恢复了。真是太可惜了，我听说他们都是很有趣的人。以下是我从爸妈口耳相传的故事中了解到的关于他们的事情。

谢尔顿·德雷克曾是一位非常成功的电视明星。他甚至演过宇宙队长，这个角色至今仍然能在海报上看到。

当时电视要远比现在流行，无论他走到哪里，都有很多人能认出他来。据说，他厌倦了所有的关注，把大部分钱都花在了建造精巧隐蔽的住宅上，以便他和妻子戴安娜能够远离这一切。

戴安娜战前是一名脑科医生。我妈说过一个词来形容这个职业，但我忘了是什么了。显然，战前她在军队里有很高的权限，不知怎么得知了即将到来的末日。于是谢尔顿和戴安娜收拾好东西，在半夜逃到了这个避难所，在这里他们免受放射性尘埃和掠夺者的侵扰。他们在这里度过了余生。

他们去世前生了四个孩子，其中一个是我的九或十代前的曾祖父，名叫赫斯特。他也一辈子都待在避难所里，是四个孩子中唯一已知有后代的幸存者。据说他是个不错的猎人，但我对他和他的妻子知之甚少。

他们的孩子离开避难所的原因我不清楚（虽然我觉得可能是和当地的辐射有关），最终在怀俄明州南部创建了一个叫梅特罗的小社区，而我就是在那里出生并长大的。

我得说，跟家里比，华盛顿特区的大部分地方简直就是个噩梦。辐射和疾病随处可见。如果不是这里的日常烦恼，更别提那些变异动物了。这里的人更加愤世嫉俗、互不信任，而且普遍很危险。掠夺者帮派到处都是，上周我还亲眼看到了一群超级变种人，吓得我差点尿裤子，躲在石头后面。我以前只见过他们单独行动，而且是从更远的地方。他们体型庞大，看起来很吓人。

幸运的是，我到这里时，避难所仍然完好无损，从电力系统到净水器都运转正常，而且仍然储备着武器、弹药，甚至还有一些战前食品。炮塔代码也按计划工作，所以如果这个地方受到攻击，我还有一些防御手段。到目前为止，安顿下来很容易，甚至还有点令人兴奋。

original: The water purifier is a godsend. None of the merchants and travellers I have met over the last few weeks have had any access to a purified water source. I can get upwards of 20 caps just for one bottle, so it looks like I'm going on a bottle hunt today.
translation: 净水器真是天赐之物。过去几周里，我遇到的所有商人和旅行者都无法获得纯净的水源。我一瓶水能卖到20个瓶盖以上，所以看来我今天要去“狩猎”水瓶了。

original: It's been about two months since I moved in here and I have noticed a substantial increase in soil fertility as well as a decrease in background radiation. Even the basement pool seems to be losing it's radioactivity at a seemingly very high rate. \nSo far I have been able to grow potatoes and carrots plus a variety of flowers and shrubs, using the remaining seeds and bulbs from storage. Even the plant's growth rate seems to have increased with all of them growing to full maturity in a matter of days. I'm sure this is not right, but the food seems to be harmless and entirely non-toxic and the plants certainly brighten up the place so I'm not complaining.
translation: 我搬到这里已经大约两个月了，注意到土壤的肥力有了显著提升，同时背景辐射也降低了。甚至地下室的水池似乎也在以非常高的速度丧失放射性。\n\n到目前为止，我已经能够利用储藏室里剩下的种子和鳞茎种土豆和胡萝卜，以及各种花卉和灌木。甚至植物的生长速度似乎也加快了，它们都在几天内就长到了完全成熟。我确定这不正常，但这些食物似乎无害且完全无毒，而且植物确实让这个地方变得明亮起来，所以我没什么可抱怨的。

original: I'm concerned about being followed. Earlier on, after my supply run to Rivet City, I was certain that three goons who were wandering the market hall had started to follow me back. I took some unusual twists and turns and I think I finally gave them the slip with a stealth boy, though I hated the thought that I might be wasting it. Also one of the merchants mentioned a corporation when I accidentally let slip that I lived in a pre-war Bomb Shelter [Note to self - DO NOT DO THIS AGAIN]. He said the main office of the company that built a lot of the local bomb shelters is still standing in the DC ruins. I checked one of the plaques in the entrance and sure enough, it's the same company - ProTech Protection. I may have to pay a visit to this place and make sure there is no info left over which could reveal this bunker's location.\nOn a side note I figured out how to set the terminal to try and unscramble some of the pre-war data left on it. It says at this rate it's gonna take 178.32 hours so I guess I'm gonna hafta wait a while.
translation: 我担心被人跟踪。之前，在从里维特城补给回来后，我确信有三个在市场大厅里闲逛的家伙开始跟踪我。我绕了些弯路，我觉得最后用隐形小子成功摆脱了他们，尽管我很不情愿浪费掉一个。还有，当我无意中透露自己住在一个战前防空洞时，其中一个商人提到了一家公司[提醒自己--别再这么做了]。他说，建造了当地很多防空洞的那家公司的总部仍然矗立在华盛顿特区的废墟中。我检查了入口处的一块牌匾，果然，是同一家公司--前科技安保公司。我可能得去这个地方看看，确保没有留下任何可能暴露这个掩体位置的信息。\n\n另外，我想出了如何设置终端来尝试解码上面留下的一些战前数据。它说按照这个速度，需要178.32小时，所以我想我得等上一阵子了。

original:
7AR6Eha5an4fdd2aA.... and it was her idea that we build a refuge in the hills in case the w0rse coXZs to the worse. I must say that the idea pleased myself and DianA 3qually and we were soon drawing up plans for own very own post-war getaway. Though dealing with the people from PPPS has been nothing short of abominable, progress has been made, a perfect location scouted, up in the hills and away from the crowds, and construction has begun. Diana's brother has even sourced some military grade weaponry, and Diana herself has revealed a healthy interest in the hardware. Whilst testing the rifles she displayed a raw aggression, a side of her I never thought I'd see. I must say it impressed me immensely. 
Thanks to Diana's connections we were also able to procure a stockpile of medication. It may have all cost us a pretty penny but you can't put a price on safety these daXzv,a jkkl5a8abnn9ahaola809Bfuas6VG.....
::::ERROR:::::
Data Corrupt.
translation:
7AR6Eha5an4fdd2aA.... 而且是她的主意，我们要在山上建一个避难所，以防情况进一步恶化。我必须说，这个主意让我和戴安娜都很满意，我们很快就开始制定自己战后逃离的计划。尽管与PPPS公司的人打交道简直令人作呕，但我们还是取得了进展，找到了一个完美的地点，就在山上，远离人群，并且已经开始建设。戴安娜的哥哥甚至弄来了一些军用级武器，戴安娜自己对这些装备也表现出了浓厚的兴趣。在测试步枪时，她展现出了原始的侵略性，这是我从未见过的一面。我必须说，这给我留下了深刻的印象。

多亏了戴安娜的关系，我们还能够储备一批药物。虽然这可能花了我们不少钱，但在这个时代，安全是无法用金钱衡量的。daXzv,a jkkl5a8abnn9ahaola809Bfuas6VG.....

数据损坏。

original: Had the boys rig up this shack for me & Dayz. Damn crappy job but it's fuckin hard to get good workers these days. Even public executin seem to have lost it's magic. Still it's better than livin on that goddamn uneven road and should keep the rain off our heads.
translation: 我让那些小子们给我和戴兹搭了这个小屋。妈的，真是一塌糊涂，但现在找个好工人真他妈难。就连公开处决似乎都失去了它的威慑力。不过，总比住在那条该死的凹凸不平的路上强，至少能帮我们挡挡雨。

original: DC is a fuckin mess. It seems like Super Mutants are drawn to the place. Makes keepin a low profile with our crew fuckin impossible. I wanted to check out the comic store again but the place was over-run. Still we caught some settlers out near Friendship. Stupid place for them to wander, you'd think people would know better by now. Too bad for them, all the better for us.\nOnly one survived to make the trip back. She's not bad looking but as usual Dayz won't let me touch her. She wants to do the interrogatin herself.
translation: 哥伦比亚特区简直一团糟。似乎超级变种人都被吸引到了这个地方。想让我们的人保持低调他妈的根本不可能。我本来想再去那家漫画店看看，但那里已经被占领了。不过，我们在友谊镇附近抓到了一些定居者。他们真是傻，居然跑到那种地方去，你本以为到现在为止人们应该会更明智一些。算他们倒霉，不过这对我们来说倒是件好事。\n\n只有一个人活着回来了。她长得还不错，但戴兹还是像往常一样不让我碰她。她想亲自审问她。

original: We might of hit the jackpot this time. That woman we claimed yesterday told us about a place they wuz looking for. Called it the PeePeePeePee S or something like that. Said it wuz owned by a company before the war that specialized in bomb shelters. Not sure if it's true or if she wuz just spoutin any old shit to stop Dayz carvin her up. Seems worth checkin out anyway. I attached the co-ordinates to this terminal. Maybe we can find us the locations of some un-plundered Vaults, or pre war weapon stashes. That would be fuckin awesome. Were headin out first thing tomorrow, ready for anythin. I know a few Talon safe zones on the way. Hell maybe some of them baby snatchers will even lend a hand.
translation: 我们这次可能真的走运了。昨天抓到的那个女人告诉我们一个地方，他们正在找那个地方。她管它叫“PeePeePeePee S”还是什么的。她说那里以前是一家专门建造防空洞的公司所拥有的。不知道她说的是不是真的，还是只是为了不让戴兹砍她才胡说八道。不过，不管怎样，都值得我们去查一查。我把坐标附在了这个终端上。也许我们能找到一些尚未被掠夺的避难所，或者战前的武器储藏点。那就太棒了。我们明天一早就出发，随时准备应对一切。路上我知道几个塔隆的安全区。说不定那些偷孩子的家伙还会帮上一把。

original: Fuckin hell, this fuckin machine keeps teliin me I'm spellin fuckin wrong. What the fuck, I know I spell good, that's what the boyz always say, I am one eloquent MF. If it looks like the fuckin word then I can fuckin understand it so what is the fuckin point? Why the fuck can't a word be spelt in multiple ways? Fuckin bullshit stuck up computer. Kiss my raw ass.
translation: 他娘的，这台破机器一直告诉我他妈的拼写错误。见鬼，我知道我拼得好，小伙子们总是这么说，我很会说话的。如果它看起来像是那个词，那么我就能理解它，那他妈的重点是什么？为什么一个词不能有多种拼写方式？该死的计算机，狗屁不通。去你的吧。

original:
Springvale Security Emergency Operation Procedures

1: No less than three (3) Security staff are to accompany Mr X and his relatives from Checkpoint Delta to his personal shelter. Security personnel are forbidden to enter the Bomb Shelter without express permission from Mr X.

2. Three (3) Security staff are required to patrol all Sectors of Springvale Sewer at all times once the Bomb Shelter has been sealed. 

3: Security staff are required to work twelve (12) hour shifts, three (3) on, three (3) off at any one time.

4: In the case of a Level Two (2) Security Breach or higher, all Security personnel are to report for duty until the breach has been resolved.

5: In the event Mr X does not make it to Checkpoint Delta, Security staff are to remain on site for a period of at least one year before evacuation procedures can be initiated.

6: In the event of an evacuation all keys are to be left with Foreman J. Daniels for appropriate safe keeping. All terminal data is to be erased, then all relevant drives destroyed, along with any hard-copies. The 4D containment unit is also to be disabled and the Armory locked down to deter looters.
translation:
春之谷安保紧急操作程序

1：从D区检查站到其私人避难所，必须有不少于三名（3名）安保人员陪同X先生及其亲属。未经X先生明确许可，安保人员不得进入防空洞。

2：防空洞封闭后，必须始终有三名（3名）安保人员在春谷下水道所有区域进行巡逻。

3：安保人员需采用十二（12）小时轮班制，每次三人（3人）在岗，三人（3人）休息。

4：若发生二级（2级）或以上安全漏洞，所有安保人员需立即到岗，直至漏洞得到解决。

5：若X先生未能抵达D区检查站，安保人员需留守至少一年，之后才能启动撤离程序。

6：若需撤离，所有钥匙需交由领班J.丹尼尔斯妥善保管。需删除所有终端数据，然后销毁所有相关驱动器及任何纸质文件。还需禁用4D收容单元，并封锁军械库以防掠夺

original: Expect Mr [REDACTED] to drop by at some point next week with the remaining food supplies for the Shelter. As usual I expect everything to be running at 100% efficiency when he arrives. If anyone encounters any problems before then, regardless of category, you are to inform me immediately.
translation: 预计[被编辑]先生将于下周某个时间带着避难所剩余的食物补给到来。与往常一样，我希望他到来时一切都能以100%的效率运行。在那之前，如果任何人遇到任何问题，无论什么类别，都必须立即向我报告。

original:
June 20
Finally left. Got some of the others to leave with me. Hate that place, never going back.

June 23
Found an abandoned library. The town nearby has about a dozen residents. They have not spotted us yet. They do not seem to come in here.

June 24
Found some new friends in the basement. Once we turned big Molly, the rest fell in line. Basement leads to a sewer where they were breeding. Will have to look around the area in the future.

July 10
Had trouble getting Molly thru the doors to get her up here but she was very persuasive. We all ending up pushing at one point. She's much happier now though.

July 21
Some armed men broke in last night. Most of them did not last long. The two left are in the basement cell. One will not last to see another sundown. We'll use them as food for our new family.

July 22
No follow up attacks from the town. The place looks quiet, only saw a couple of kids running around. Maybe the men came from somewhere else.

August 10
Fam tore up the cage to get at the meat. Can't say I blame them. Need a better place for storage.

August 12
Attempted to trade with a man who visited the town. Wanted to sell some of these useless books. He said he would not trade with us so we killed him. His animals were angry and would not be tamed. We had to kill them all. I thought we would see eye to eye but as usual our people are miss treated by everyone. More food for us at least.

August 16
Some kind of ants everywhere. It looks like they wiped out the town. Tried talking to them but they are very hostile. None of our methods are working with them. Their bond with their queen must be very strong. Told everyone to kill them on sight.

August 16-2
More armed people in town. Heard lots of gunfire. It seems like they headed into the Car Repair Shop and never came back out. Also ants are now showing up in the Sewer. Sent some of our fam back down there to guard the area.
translation:
6月20日
终于离开了。我让其他人也跟我一起走。真是恨透了那个地方，再也不回去了。

6月23日
发现了一个废弃的图书馆。附近的镇子里大约有十几个居民。他们还没发现我们。他们似乎也不来这里。

6月24日
在地下室里找到了一些新朋友。我们把大块头莫莉搞定后，其他人就服服帖帖了。地下室通向一个下水道，那里是他们繁殖的地方。以后得在这一带好好逛逛。

7月10日
费了好大劲才把莫莉从门里弄上来，她真是能说会道。我们最后都上手推了。不过现在她倒是挺开心的。

7月21日
昨晚有些武装分子闯了进来。他们大部分人都没活多久。剩下的两个被关在地下室牢房里。其中一个活不过日落了。我们会把他们当成新家庭的食物。

7月22日
镇上的人没有继续攻击。这里看起来很安静，只看到几个孩子在跑来跑去。也许那些武装分子是从别的地方来的。

8月10日
家里人把笼子弄破了，想要里面的肉。我也不能怪他们。得找个更好的储藏地方。

8月12日
试图和一个来镇上的人做交易。想卖掉这些无用的书。他说不会和我们交易，于是我们就杀了他。他的动物很生气，没法驯服。我们只好把它们都杀了。我还以为我们能达成一致，但和往常一样，我们的人总是被所有人欺负。但至少我们多了些食物。

8月16日
到处都是一种蚂蚁。它们好像把镇子都毁了。试着和它们交流，但它们非常敌视。我们的方法都不起作用。它们和蚁后的联系肯定很紧密。我让大家看到它们就杀。

8月16-2日
镇上多了些武装人员。听到了很多枪声。他们似乎进了汽车维修店，就再也没有出来。而且蚂蚁现在也出现在下水道里了。派了一些家里人回去守在那里。

original:
June 21
Our settlement was attacked by looters. Damn assholes burned nearly everything they didn't take. Frankie went off to join them, he said it was the new way of life or some shit. Not for me it isn't, I don't care if I'm on my own now, I'll find a way.
There was no point trying to persuade Frankie to join me. I know Dad told me to look out for him but I gave up on that a long time ago.

June 23
I found a town that looks safe. I think it's Olney, we used to visit Aunt Win there when we were kids, but it looks different to how I remember. Now there are barricades everywhere and many of the tall buildings are ruined. I'm gonna try and barter my way inside. At least I still have Dad's pre-war stash to sell.

June 24
They let me in, even sold me an empty apartment. I'm so relived. There's still at least twenty people living here, though I hear it used to be a lot more. I even met a nice girl by the name of Kelly. We're about the same age and have a lot in common but I can't tell if shes into me or not. I hope so.

June 26
I think tonight might be the night. Kelly and I finally kissed today and she said I could sleep at her house tonight. I'm so excited I can barely keep still.

June 27
What the fuck? Seriously I'm gonna kill Frankie one of these days. That psychopathic dickhead and his new gang showed up and wrecked Olney last night. They killed nearly everyone, they were going to kill us too, until Frankie had a change of heart and turned on his new gang to save us. I still don't know why he did that.

June 28
We need a place to hide so we're gonna try the key Dad left behind. It should unlock an old sewer system where Dad used to work. I wish Frankie would just fuck off somewhere else but Kelly says we owe him and I guess he is blood.

June 29
From early exploration it appears that this sewer is huge but many sections are locked down or mildly irradiated. We have decided to bed down close to the entrance, mostly because we can re-lock the door here. Kelly seemed to be restless throughout the night but insisted that nothing was wrong. At least it is somewhat peaceful down here, safe from prying eyes. I almost feel as if I have left that old world behind.

July 1
That backstabbing shit stain has done it again. Now he's stolen Kelly from me. They were spending more and more time together and making excuses for me to leave. When I came back early they were fucking. Fucking fucking, right there and on my fucking bed! This is fucking bullshit. Without me, we wouldn't even be here. What the fuck did I do to deserve this? He's over a year younger than me and doesn't even wash for fuck's sake!

July 6
It's been over a week in this place and it's driving me mad. Kelly wont have anything to do with me anymore and yesterday I know they were stealing my booze. I know for a fact they ran out days ago and I had four bottles left. Now they are all gone and they were blatantly drunk. This is just like the old times again. Frankie kept telling me to "chill out", that "more will turn up" and that I was "being paranoid". That fucking familiar paranoia taunt again... 
I know whenever I leave the room they talk and laugh about me behind my back. Frankie has always been a thief and an asshole but recently he's just going too far. It makes me think of that note I found. Is Frankie still part of an ongoing conspiracy against me? Probably, but if that is the case does that mean Kelly was involved too? Was all this a fucking setup? No... that can't be right. The world ended, this can't all be happening because of me... I need some fresh air...

July 20
I have been too depressed to keep a journal of recent events, however Kelly's recent death is just too much to go by without note. I still don't know how she died because Frankie's story never makes sense. It seems he was trying to trade for a new gun with some ex-Military people he spotted whilst skavving. Somehow an argument broke out. Frankie says they started it (it's always someone else's fault with Frankie), they shot first, killing Kelly and somehow Frankie escaped uninjured. I don't know why she went everywhere with him. Now shes dead and as far as I'm concerned it's his fault. He took everything good from me and throws it back in my face all the time like it's my fault. He thinks I'm too good and have no "killer instinct". Well one of these days I'm gonna prove him wrong.
translation:
6月21日
我们的定居点被掠夺者袭击了。这帮该死的混蛋烧掉了他们没带走的一切。弗兰基跑过去加入了他们，说这就是新的生活方式什么的。我可不这么想，现在我不在乎是否孤身一人，我会找到出路的。试图说服弗兰基跟我一起走是徒劳的。我知道爸爸让我照顾他，但我很久以前就放弃了。

6月23日
我找到了一个看起来安全的镇子。我想这是奥尼，我们小时候经常去拜访温姨的地方，但看起来和我记忆中的不同。现在到处都是路障，许多高楼都毁坏了。我打算试着通过交易进入镇上。至少我还有爸爸战前的储藏品可以卖。

6月24日
他们让我进去了，甚至卖给我了一套空公寓。我松了一口气。这里至少还有二十个人住着，尽管我听说以前人更多。我还遇到了一个叫凯莉的漂亮女孩。我们年龄相仿，有很多共同点，但我不确定她是否喜欢我。希望如此。

6月26日
我想今晚就是时候了。凯莉和我今天终于接吻了，她说今晚我可以去她家睡。我太激动了，几乎无法保持冷静。

6月27日
妈的！说真的，总有一天我要杀了弗兰基。那个变态混蛋和他的新帮派昨晚毁了奥尼。他们杀了几乎所有人，本来也要杀我们的，直到弗兰基突然改变主意，背叛了他的新帮派来救我们。我还是不知道他为什么要这么做。

6月28日
我们需要一个藏身之处，所以我们要试试爸爸留下的钥匙。它应该能打开爸爸以前工作过的旧下水道系统。我希望弗兰基能滚到别的地方去，但凯莉说我们欠他的，我想他毕竟是我的亲人。

6月29日
从早期的探索来看，这个下水道非常巨大，但许多区域都被封锁了或受到轻度辐射。我们决定在靠近入口的地方休息，主要是因为这里可以重新锁门。凯莉整晚似乎都心神不宁，但坚持说没什么问题。至少这里相对安静，远离窥探的目光。我几乎感觉自己已经离开了那个旧世界。

7月1日
那个背叛的混蛋又干了一次。现在他抢走了我的凯莉。他们越来越多地在一起，找借口让我离开。当我提前回来时，他们正在床上鬼混。就在我的床上！这他妈的太过分了。没有我们，他们根本到不了这里。我他妈做了什么要遭这种罪？他比我小一岁多，而且他妈的根本不洗澡！

7月6日
在这个地方已经一个多星期了，这让我快要发疯了。凯莉再也不愿意理我，而且昨天我知道他们偷了我的酒。我确切知道他们几天前就喝完了，我还剩下四瓶。现在它们都不见了，他们显然喝醉了。这又像以前一样了。弗兰基一直告诉我“冷静点”，“会有更多的”，说我“太疑神疑鬼了”。那他妈熟悉的疑心病又来了......我知道每当我离开房间，他们就在背后议论嘲笑我。弗兰基一直是个小偷和混蛋，但最近他太过分了。这让我想起了找到的那张纸条。弗兰基是否还在针对我的阴谋中？可能吧，但如果是这样的话，凯莉是否也参与其中了？这一切都是个他妈的陷阱吗？不......那不可能。世界都毁灭了，这一切不可能都是因为我......我需要透透气......

7月20日
我最近一直太抑郁了，没有记录发生的事情，然而凯莉的死让我不能不记。我还不知道她是怎么死的，因为弗兰基的说法从来都说不通。他似乎是在和他在掠夺时遇到的一些前军人交易新枪时发生了争执。不知为何吵了起来。弗兰基说他们先动的手（在弗兰基那里，永远都是别人的错），他们先开枪，杀了凯莉，而弗兰基却奇迹般地毫发无损地逃脱了。我不知道她为什么要一直跟着他。现在她死了，在我看来，这是弗兰基的错。他夺走了我拥有的一切美好的东西，还总是把责任推到我头上。他认为我太善良了，没有“杀手本能”。总有一天，我会证明他错了。

original:
June 22
I feel free at last. I joined a gang and these guys really get me. Didn't take me long to convince 'em I was on board. Just had to give one of the piss ant old farmers a permanent razor blade smile. They have booze, chems, girls, guns. Hell, what more could I ask for? Don't know what happened to Frank but I don't care. That fat loser was always just a clueless waste of space.

June 24
Returned to my old home to look for Dad's stash. It was badly burned but I could still get in. It was gone from it's hiding place so Frank must have taken it. What a thieving shit.

June 25 
It looks like we are gearing up for a new raid. I can't wait! 
The boss says we can kill who we like and take what we want. I must say it is a relief to be around people who actually embrace their true nature. People are killers. All of us, it's just some of us refuse to admit it.

June 28
Things did not go to plan. Now I'm stuck with Frank again and if any of the gang see me, I'm a dead man. At least I met a new hottie by the name of Kelly. She seems to be into Frank for some reason but I'm sure I can fix that. No way a dumb slob like him can deserve a girl like that. 
At least with Frank around I might be able to get the rest of Dad's stash.

June 29
Frank went off to explore the sewer, which left Kelly and I to get to know each other a little better. I let her know what Frank was really like. I can tell she likes me. No sign of the stash though.

July 2
Kelly has made the obvious choice and has chosen me instead of Frank. I can tell he's upset but he's such a fucking pussy he's not gonna do anything about it so fuck him. He still wont let me access the stash. I'll have to find it when he's next out exploring or whatever the fuck he does when he leaves.

July 10
Frank has found a key to lock up his desk. I know he's hiding something in there. Well two can play at that game.

July 15
Kelly keeps complaining of an itchy pussy. She says she wont fuck again unless it gets sorted. What the fuck am I supposed to do? It's obviously her problem.

July 17
So I finally found out what happened to the stash. Frank owned up that he'd bartered it all but a bit, for a home in fucking Olney. He swapped the rest for a couple of comic books as a present for Kelly. What a fucking waste. I think he actually thought he'd win her back with the books. I took them away and pissed all over them. I was gonna beat the shit out of him too but he gave me a funny look I'd never seen before. I decided he was not worth the effort.

July 19
Kelly is dead. Stupid bitch just couldn't help but stick her nose in where it didn't belong. Frank is pissed big time this time. I'll have to take his gun in the night so he does not get any ignorant plans on using it. Even he has to see the bitch is not worth it.
translation:
6月22日
我终于感到自由了。我加入了一个帮派，这些家伙真的很合我心意。没花多久我就说服了他们，让我加入。我只不过给了那个讨厌的老农夫一个永久的“剃须刀微笑”（意指杀掉他）。他们有酒、毒品、女人、枪支。妈的，我还能要求什么？不知道弗兰克怎么样了，但我不在乎。那个胖子废物一直就是个一无是处的白痴。

6月24日
我回到老家去找爸爸的藏匿物。房子被烧得很惨，但我还是进去了。藏匿物不见了，肯定是弗兰克拿走了。真是个该死的贼。

6月25日
看起来我们又要准备一次新的突袭了。我等不及了！
老大说我们可以随便杀谁，想要什么就拿什么。我得说，和真正接纳自己本性的人在一起真是松了一口气。人都是杀手，我们所有人都是，只是有些人拒绝承认罢了。

6月28日
事情没有按计划进行。现在我又得和弗兰克在一起了，如果帮派里的任何人看到我，我就死定了。至少我遇到了一个叫凯莉的新美女。她似乎对弗兰克有点意思，但我肯定能解决这个问题。像他那样愚蠢的家伙怎么可能配得上那样的女孩。
至少弗兰克在的话，我可能会找到爸爸剩下的藏匿物。

6月29日
弗兰克去探索下水道了，留下我和凯莉更深入地了解彼此。我让她知道了弗兰克的真面目。我能看出她喜欢我。不过还是没有藏匿物的线索。

7月2日
凯莉做出了明显的选择，她选择了我而不是弗兰克。我能看出他很沮丧，但他是个该死的懦夫，不敢对我怎么样，所以去死吧他。他还是不让我碰藏匿物。我得等他下次出去探险或者他离开的时候去找。

7月10日
弗兰克找到了一把锁他桌子的钥匙。我知道他在里面藏了什么东西。好吧，我们也可以玩这个游戏。

7月15日
凯莉一直抱怨下面痒。她说如果不解决这个问题，她就不让我再碰了。我他妈该怎么办？这显然是她自己的问题。

7月17日
我终于知道了藏匿物的事。弗兰克承认他拿大部分去换了奥尔尼的一个家，剩下的则换了几本漫画书作为给凯莉的礼物。真是个浪费。我觉得他实际上是想用这些书赢回她的心。我把书拿走，并在上面撒尿。我本来还想揍他一顿，但他给了我一个我从没见过的滑稽表情。我觉得他不值得我费这个劲。

7月19日
凯莉死了。这个愚蠢的贱货就是爱管闲事。这次弗兰克真的生气了。我得趁晚上拿走他的枪，这样他就不会有愚蠢的计划去使用它了。就算是他，也不得不承认那个贱货不值得。

original: ...have been here for at least a week. We still have not figured a way into the Bomb Shelter. Phil is getting sick. He wont admit it, but trudging back and forth through the radioactive sewage is taking it's toll and I'm not sure how much longer the chems will last, or Phil for that matter. Without him we'll never figure out how to get in there. My skin has been getting kinda itchy recently. I don't think we should have come down here, but we're low on supplies after fighting off the ghouls and who knows what could be inside that Shelter.
translation: .....我在这里至少有一个星期了。我们还没找到进入防空洞的方法。菲尔病了。他不承认，但在放射性污水中来回跋涉是要付出代价的，我不确定这些化学物质还能持续多久，菲尔也不知道。没有他，我们永远不知道怎么进去。我的皮肤最近有点痒。我觉得我们不应该到这里来，但在击退尸鬼之后，我们的补给不足了，谁知道避难所里会有什么。

original:
Oh you are my blessed queen,
You are the light, the dark and the in-between.
Though none have ever known me the way you do,
You make my world complete and true.
I'll remain by your side whatever the weather,
How I love to stroke your furry antennae.
translation:
吾之福后兮，尔乃辉煌，
明暗交织兮，尔居其间。
世无知我兮，如尔之深，
吾之宇宙兮，因尔而全。
风雨无阻兮，吾伴尔旁，
爱抚尔须兮，心悦诚惶。

original:
Subject 64b came to our attention as a result of standard Class D Testing of the schools of DC.

Subject 64b is a human male who displayed a high potential for telekinetic and psychic ability as a youth. Subject had high potential for Project X-04. Due to the subject's impending adolescence, tests were begun immediately. 

In Phase 1 all of the subject's family members and close friends were indoctrinated over a period of five weeks and three days. Any showing resistance to the project were administered Class A amnesiacs and were eventually convinced in the project's greater good, using the steps outlined in Protocol 43.

In Phase 2 remote viewing equipment was set up in a 5 mile radius from Subject 64b's home, along with in and around any building that known outside contacts of Subject 64b visit, as per Protocol 17.
Subject's terminal data and other correspondence, both incoming and outgoing was intercepted, monitored and edited when appropriate, in accordance with the guidelines set in Protocol 33.
Phase 2 yielded no significant results.

In Phase 3 family and friends were prompted to treat Subject 64b with subtle disdain and were told to generally lower the subject's morale.
Positive re-enforcement of the subject's actions was limited to only actions that could be deemed of benefit to the project.
Phase 3 yielded no significant results.

In Phase 4 family and friends were prompted to treat the subject with open hostility. Bully Protocol 5 was enabled and the subject's younger brother was told to steal and destroy certain items that were popular with the subject. In a variation from SOP the brother was persuaded to write a journal explaining why the subject is a bad person. 
The subject's father struggled with Phase 4, so was reallocated to a job that would keep him away from the subject.
Subject's contacts were subjected to selected footage, displaying the worst aspects from Subject 64b's behavior. In instances where sufficient footage could not be sourced, pre made footage was inserted, as outlined in Protocol 66.
Phase 4 yielded no significant results. Subject's reaction was often just confusion. Subject did not seem to accept this new reality. 
More profound results were found in the Subject's brother's behavior. It seems he has become increasingly jealous of the attention focused on the subject, though the reasons why are currently not known. It is possible that he sees himself as the true alpha. The effect was deemed beneficial to the potential long term success of the project.

Phase 5 was underway and chem testing had begun when the Great War started.
Subject 64b remained under surveillance for approximately 1780 days after the incident.
Though few cameras remained active it has been ascertained that the Subject had still yet to display any signs of manifesting his true potential.

After leaving the monitored zone the subject was last tracked to Springvale Underground.
The location was used as a toxic dump between the years 2083-2085 and it is believed that the area is currently populated with radioactive mutations.
Though the subject's father worked at this location before the war, all attemps to access local surveillance equipment have failed.

Subject 64b's current status is unknown.
Any attempts to ascertain the condition of Subject 64b should consist of a team of at least two Level 2 (or higher) CSPMR personnel with full combat training. At least one of the personnel should be a 28-35 year old female, preferably generically attractive and trained in care-work.
[See attached photo for reference].

Addendum: Subject 64b's Father.
The subject's father spent approximately 380 days after the Great War confined to Springvale Underground, along with six other personnel who were assigned to work within the sewer up until and after The Great War. During Phase 4 the father had attempted, on several occasions, to end the project and was deemed a post-war threat to security.  After returning to the monitored zone he was intercepted on route to the subject's home. The father was administered Class A amnesiacs and underwent several re-education sessions. Roughly two months after being released and returning home the father committed suicide for reasons currently unknown.
translation:
64b号实验体因哥伦比亚特区学校进行的D类标准测试而引起了我们的注意。

64b号实验体是一名男性，青少年时期便展现出强大的念动力和精神力潜能。他是X-04项目的高潜力人选。由于其即将进入青春期，测试立即开始。

在第一阶段，实验体的所有家庭成员和亲密朋友在五周零三天内被洗脑。任何对项目表示抵抗的人都被施以A类遗忘剂，并最终按照《协议43》中概述的步骤，被说服相信项目的大义。

在第二阶段，根据《协议17》，在实验体64b家周围5英里半径内，以及实验体已知的外界联系人会拜访的任何建筑内外，都安装了远程监控设备。实验体的终端数据和其他往来通信，无论是收件还是发件，都按照《协议33》中的指导原则被拦截、监控，并在适当时进行编辑。第二阶段没有取得显著成果。

在第三阶段，实验体的家人和朋友被暗示要对实验体表现出轻微的蔑视，并被告知要普遍降低实验体的士气。对实验体行为的正面鼓励仅限于那些对项目有益的行动。第三阶段没有取得显著成果。

在第四阶段，家人和朋友被指示公开敌视实验体。启动了《欺负协议5》，并指示实验体的弟弟偷走并销毁实验体喜欢的某些物品。与标准操作规程不同，实验体的弟弟还被说服写一篇日记，解释为什么实验体是个坏人。实验体的父亲对第四阶段感到挣扎，因此被调到一个能让他远离实验体的职位。实验体的联系人被展示了一些精选片段，展示了实验体行为中最糟糕的一面。在无法获得足够片段的情况下，按照《协议66》的规定插入了预先制作的片段。第四阶段没有取得显著成果。实验体的反应通常是困惑。他似乎没有接受这个新的现实。实验体的弟弟行为上出现了更深刻的变化。他似乎越来越嫉妒实验体受到的关注，尽管目前还不知道原因。这可能是因为他认为自己才是真正的领袖。这一效果被认为对项目长期成功有益。

第五阶段正在进行中，化学测试已经开始，这时大战爆发了。

64b号实验体在事件发生后大约1780天内仍处于监视之下。尽管只有少数摄像头仍在工作，但已确定实验体仍未显示出任何发挥其真正潜力的迹象。

离开监控区后，实验体最后被追踪到春谷地下。该地点在2083年至2085年间被用作有毒废物倾倒场，据信该地区目前居住着放射性变异生物。尽管实验体的父亲战前曾在此地工作，但所有尝试访问当地监控设备的尝试都失败了。

64b号实验体的当前状态未知。

任何试图确定64b号实验体状况的行动都应由至少两名具备完全战斗训练的2级（或更高级别）CSPMR人员组成。其中至少应有一名是28-35岁的女性，最好具有普通吸引力并接受过护理工作培训。[参见所附照片以供参考]。

附录：64b号实验体的父亲。

实验体的父亲在大战后的大约380天里，一直被囚禁在春之谷地下，与其他六名被指派在战争前后在下水道内工作的人员一起。在第四阶段，父亲曾多次试图终止项目，并被视为战后安全威胁。在返回监控区后，他在前往实验体家的路上被拦截。父亲被施以A类遗忘剂，并接受了多次再教育。在被释放并返回家乡大约两个月后，父亲自杀，原因目前尚不清楚。

original:
I found this note in Dad's room, not long after he killed himself. It looks like it has been torn from a larger message:

Apart from "observing," or detecting, the electrons, the detector had no effect on the current. Yet the scientists found that the very presence of the detector-"observer" near one of the openings caused changes in the interference pattern of the electron waves passing through the openings of the barrier.

I don't know what this means exactly, or why Dad had it stashed away. He worked in the sewers, he was not a scientific man. What is this observer?  Is this something to do with me? Is this why everyone talks about me behind my back? Are they watching me too? It often feels that way but I just don't know...
translation:
我在爸爸自杀后不久，在他的房间里发现了这张纸条。它看起来像是从一份更长的信息中撕下来的：

“除了“观察”或检测电子外，探测器对电流没有其他影响。然而，科学家们发现，探测器--“观察者”仅仅靠近屏障开口之一的存在，就引起了穿过屏障开口的电子波的干涉模式的变化。”

我不知道这到底意味着什么，也不知道爸爸为什么要把它藏起来。他在下水道工作，并不是个科学家。这个“观察者”是什么？这和我有关吗？这就是大家背后议论我的原因吗？他们也在监视我吗？我经常有这种感觉，但我就是不知道......

original: Ike - If you get back before me WATCH OUT!!!\nI set up some traps. I activated the turret too, so make sure you re-program it before bringing anyone downstairs.\nI had to go looking for more supplies. You have been gone for too long and we have less than a weeks worth left.
translation:
