埃克--如果你比我先回来，小心为上！！！

我设了一些陷阱。我还启动了炮塔，所以在带任何人下楼之前，你一定要先重新编程。

我得去找更多的补给品。你已经离开太久了，我们的补给只够撑不到一个星期了。
实验体008（罗德尼虚空的传奇）

original:
Subject 008 (The Legend Of Rodknee Void)

Summary:
Subject 008 has the ability to project thought onto various media platforms and can leave thought-trails that can be heard and followed by certain other individuals, both in real time and after the event. He also had the ability to read the thoughts of other people watching him through a camera or similar recording device.

1930s
Subject 008's thoughts manifest on several blockbuster movies from the decade, mainly silent comedies. Many famous actors from the time describe hearing an internal voice that seemed to have knowledge, not only of the show they were performing in, along with future events, but often personal information relating to the actors themselves. They described the ability to converse with the subject on a mental level and ask him questions, though few got a clear response. It was said at the time that you had to be aware of Subject 008 in order to hear him, though how the subject first came to people's attention is currently unknown.

1940s
Subject 008's thoughts continue to manifest on various films from the decade, moving away from comedy and into war movies. 
Specially trained people known as "Readers" start to be brought into movie sets in order to listen out for Subject 008 during filming. Those who made contact came away with varying stories and feelings from the experience. Some described it as "like hearing the voice of God" whilst others said it was more like the Devil and others reported an ordinary man with an extraordinary ability. Many only reported vague feelings that correspond with the more detailed accounts, though lots of Readers also described feeling severely frustrated, sad and sometimes happy, with every emotion pushed to the extreme.
Several instances were reported of references to a "lost" love in the subject's life and a sorrowful yearning for someone.
Attempts were made to interact with the subject by posing questions, though the subject seemed wary of giving any specific answers, especially relating to the ongoing war or current events. The subject did admit that the allied nations would prevail and they would indeed go on to win the war. 

1950s
Subject 008 appears at several stages of his life on radio broadcast "The Fools" which would run until the late 60's. At least one of those voices was the subject as a youth trying to decipher the formulas behind some of the more ridiculous and surreal elements of the show but a later, more experienced series of thought-trails seemed to hint at an impending global disaster.
The subject made his first appearance on a musical composition and went on to feature on several more hits from the decade. Reports of these thoughts imply the subject was busy doing other things whilst listening to most of the songs and yet somehow his thoughts were transferred anyway. Many report seeing or feeling scenes of an apocalyptic nature and several reference the subject doing various mundane inventory checks on food and weapons.
More Readers were hired with a professional background in psychic ability or psychiatry. Through various tests conducted during the time, the Readers picked up many new, though less obvious thought-trails on various media, some of which which were later identified as the general public's consensus (which can be read on all known media using current techniques) and Subject 025. Subject 025 appeared as a female who has intimate knowledge of Subject 008 and cares deeply for the subject. Subject 25 apparently is unable to contact the subject directly but can somehow observe the subject's actions and has learned to mimic the subject's ability. It is speculated this is the only form of interaction Subject 008 and Subject 025 have with each other.

1960s
Subject appears on several major films and occasionally in musical compositions from the era. During the Moon Landing broadcast he can be clearly read criticizing the "Bell Incident" which had not been made public knowledge at the time.
It is hypothesized that Subject 008 is living in a TV show of some kind, as several other commentators are discovered analysing the subject's actions and thoughts as he watches to or listens to certain broadcasts.
Subject appears to have a certain level of disdain for the music of this period and it seems to be impossible to force a manifestation of the subject's thoughts on a medium the subject has no interest in.

1970s
The [REDACTED] Corporation was founded in order to learn from and exploit Subject 008 and similar voices for the benefit of The American government and military.
Subject 008 appeared infrequently throughout the decade, mostly on violent films and occasionally over political footage or documentaries. 
Subject 008 was said to be "openly hostile" towards military operations that were in action at the time.

1980s
This seems to be a historic decade in the evolution of Subject 008.
Subject 008 appears on many more films and songs than in previous decades, brought on partly by the trend in the media of the time to actively seek out a response from Subject 008. Many films and songs were commissioned with the express intent of garnering a positive response from the subject, and many were successful. 
The subject seems to have a taste for the more experimental, electronic themed music of the decade and the action films of the time, especially those starring Bernard Bluenegger, who was a popular star of the era. Bernard would later describe the subject as "just a little kid who does not mean any harm" and "a bit like me when I was younger".
It was Bernard who would go on to discover the subject's name - "Rodney".
Many more references to Subject 25 appear, along with references to younger love interests that seem to pre-date any knowledge of Subject 25. Subject frequently requests answers regarding issues surrounding his love life.
[NOTE: In later psychiatric evaluations of Subject 008 he reveals he would get responses when posing questions in this manner. When it came to his love life he often did not like the responses he heard. Though he refused to go into much detail it is believed he was somewhat aware of the fate that awaited him because of this frequent line of questioning]. 
Several reports surface of people having visions of the subject masturbating whilst listening to certain songs, which lead to those songs being banned in most areas of the globe.
Subject 008 displayed contempt for political officials of the decade and was known to think about what were, at the time, classified military secrets over news broadcasts and documentaries.
Subject 008 was deemed a threat to global security.

1990s
With the 90's came the ban on repetitive electronic music which came about in order to prevent the spreading of Subject 008's message to a perceived "underclass". This decision fueled a number of extensive rants on the issue by Subject 008, especially over music and music related programming of the decade. The subject appears to have little to no interest in other media events of the time, though his fondness for comedy resurfaces and he can be heard on many sitcoms from the era.
His main thoughts outside of those relating to the original subject matter seem to consist of the subject drawing a comparison between his own actions and thoughts, and how those have affected the politics of the decade, often in the form of regrets.
In some of the heavier electronic songs from the early 90's Subject 008 can be heard referring to himself as "Rodney Void".

2000s
Subject 008 mainly appears on TV shows from the decade. Little new information was learned but with the popularization of the Terminal Database Network, the subject's notoriety began to grow as his story was spread throughout the homes of regular people.

2010s
This decade saw a severe clampdown on information regarding to Subject 008. Associated media going back to the 1950's was seized and destroyed except for limited duplications, and with it filters were introduced to the TDN which prevented users from spreading related information to a wider audience. Many more restrictions were placed upon what content could be broadcast and this prompted a huge backlash from Subject 008 who deemed these actions "the end of civilization". His reaction to political authority figures of the time was always considered to be "very hostile".

2020-2041
Very little new information relating to Subject 008 was learned during these years. It is theorized that he had little access to, or interest in the events and media of this era. Belief in Subject 008 began to wane amongst the general public, with most forgetting about him by the end of the 20's.

2042
Subject's mother was impregnated using a sample from the Project [REDACTED], the aim of which was to engineer super soldiers and scientists using DNA from various high standard human sources. The sample that would produce Subject 008 was obtained from [REDACTED].
Project [REDACTED] failed to yield any significant results outside of Subject 008.

2043
Subject 008 is born, named Rodney [REDACTED] on [REDACTED] in [REDACTED] Hospital, in [REDACTED].
Subject's mother died from complications following the birth.
Subject was put into the care of a new foster family.
The subject's new mother and father were briefed on the background of Subject 008 and underwent a pregnancy simulation, in preparation for the subject's birth. Both underwent voluntary treatment with Class A amnesiacs and were re-educated to believe that Subject 008 was their own child. From there onwards Subject 008 was brought up normally in accordance with the other subjects born during Project [REDACTED].
[NOTE. Subject would later comment that he loves his family and, despite certain actions and thoughts to the contrary in his past, that he could not think of two better parents].
Due to the subject and others having referred to the subject and his past throughout history, Subject 008 was soon identified as Rodney Void.
Monitoring the subject had been kept to a minimum before this point but soon after word spread and many in the scientific and military communities were becoming increasingly interested. A constant on-line feed was created. Foundations were arranged for monitoring Subject 008 24 hours a day. There foundations would go on to become the standardized guildelines set out in Protocol 17.
Subject 008's favorite TV show, "The Early Years" , a distinctly anarchic creation that went against the grain of all other TV shows from the time, was filmed and broadcast. Many of the actors and crew involved, along with several informed viewers reported frequent comments from Subject 008 on an almost endless list of topics, though mostly from the subject's youth and in relation to the scenes he found funny.
Retrospective reading of the 12 episodes over the years revealed many deeper hidden thoughts believed to have originated from the subject in his older years, mostly relating to his own circumstances, though on occasion, as seen throughout history, the subject would recall high profile events from around the time such as the invention of Nuka Cola in 2044. Subject 008 was heard referring to Nuka Cola Cherry as his favorite drink and related the differences in certain Colas of the same era. In fact it was these messages that prompted John-Caleb Bradburton to begin manufacture of the product in the first place. Bradburton had to postpone work on release of Nuka Cola Cherry until 2059 due to new guidelines that had to be set for both government and business enterprises who were using Subject 008's thoughts for their own financial benefit, without considering the impact on historical continuity. These new laws saw an end to the operations of The [REDACTED] Corporation. 
In his later thoughts the Subject would often refer back to a cataclysmic event, which would become known as The Great War.
Though plans were made to use Subject 008's ability to prevent the impending War, it was eventually decided to maintain the Subject's continuity rather than risk worsening the situation and instead various preparations were made for the inevitable. The bulk of these plans would go on to become Protocol 1. 

2044-2053
[Age 1 to 10 years]
Subject 008's behavior yielded no significant results for the next ten years.
The subject's older thoughts continued to manifest on various shows throughout the decade, showing a taste for darker and edgier programming and satire, with a preference for the then new wave of "alternative" comedy. Due to the scarcity of these type of broadcasts amongst the usual propaganda, the subject began to build a small but somewhat loyal fanbase, mostly amongst the scientific personnel who were observing him, who often shared a similar taste in humor. Many military and government officials saw Subject 008 as a potential threat and tried, unsuccessfully, to terminate the project entirely on several occasions.
Others, (within the Military in particular) were convinced that the Subject had high psychic potential and wanted to advance the project with various tests which were deemed at the time to be too dangerous for the subject's sanity and historical continuity. 
TV shows, movies and songs, known to have been popular with the subject, were introduced to him in a vaguely chronological order over the following years, via the father or through regional TV programming. Bans placed on certain media were lifted, so the subject would not find others around him unrelatable.

2053
[Age 10 years]
TV Show "The Raul Perton Show" was filmed and broadcast. This is believed by many, including the subject himself, to be the first time the subject began to communicate directly with the TV. This is later contradicted by the subject himself during a segment in the show, where he reveals (in relation to how he communicates with the TV) "this is easy, I have done this with The Early Years loads of times".
The format of Raul's show involved various surreal comedic sketches followed by Raul addressing the camera directly and engaging the hypothetical audience in comedy banter. During these segments the subject would seem to be attempting to tell Raul which elements of sketches he enjoyed, and why certain others did not work. Though Raul was busy reading from an autoscript at the time he still picked up on certain elements of feedback.
Raul was not aware of Subject 008's existence at the time of recording and underwent several mental breakdowns as a result of hearing Subject 008. This culminated in a brief stint in a mental hospital for Raul. Later in the year he was briefed on the details of Subject 008 and his ability, and was contracted with a lifetime career in TV in order to attract more of Subject 008's thoughts. Indeed, Subject 008 followed Raul and his TV exploits up until the Great War. During an unaired interview in 2050 Raul stated that "you always knew you were onto a good thing when Rodney turned up, especially if he was in a good mood". 
Raul would be exposed to some of Subject 008's, now legendary bad moods, several years later when during a limited run episodes of his weekly satire show "News4U", Subject 008 can be heard ranting angrily and incessantly about various political causes, pleading with anyone and everyone to listen. He also criticized the shows performers for not being more critical of certain government actions.
Workers both on and off stage from various other shows of the time picked up flashes of the subject's opinions throughout the year and more Readers were hired to listen out for the subject's distinct [REDACTED] voice on TV stations globally.
Instances of the subject's thought manifesting on music from the time increased exponentially from previous years. This is believed to be when the subject first got into music and to correspond to this, the subject's father was prompted to introduce certain bands and songs.
Subject 008 displayed a particular liking for the short-lived uptempo "bassline" genre that was to peak in the following years.
Despite many bands and musicians getting a vague notion of the subject's thoughts, very few engaged, or were engaged by the subject in cognitive conversation at the time. Most thoughts discovered on bassline recordings were believed to have originated from the subject at age 14-16 and involved the subject trying to overcome various obstacles in his love life as well as coming to terms with his potential psychic ability. On occasion other voices can be heard responding to the subject's thoughts, though few have been identified with time, many are believed to originate from those directly viewing Subject 008 in real-time or in the future, including on many occasions, Subject 25.
Many key ranking politicians reported hearing derogatory and critical remarks from Subject 008 during TV and radio appearances, especially when they were already aware of the subject's existence.. These thoughts are believed to have mainly originated from clip-shows the subject watched during the ages of 25-30, as many thought-trails seem to end abruptly, as though edited out of existence.
Subject 008 at this age expresses no interest in politics.

2054-2057
[Age 11-14]
Subject 008 appeared to have little interest in the TV shows and general entertainment of this period outside of the occasional comedy. 
Subject seemed to be confused by the shifts in musical trends of the era and is often heard pining for the early 50's sound in many recordings. Subject's interest in 1980's and 1990's media peaks, though he spends most of his time socializing with friends his own age and playing outside.

2057
[Age 14]
Dr [REDACTED] creates the [REDACTED] Thought-Transcriber which allowed scientists to view a scrolling bar of the subject's thoughts at all times, much like subtitles for a film. Though flawed and frequently picking up the wrong person, this breakthrough in modern technology was to be refined, using the subject's data over time, for a variety of uses, all top secret. It's existence was never officially announced to the public.
The subject's preference for late 80's and early 90's entertainment remains.
Subject 008 seemingly became aware that he has some kind of link with TV shows and film and begins to question the boundaries of his reality. 
During this time it was finally proven that Subject 008's thought patterns clearly matched those of "Rodney Void" and during many films he could be seen and read directly quoting historic lines from his own history in real-time.
Subject 008 begins to distinguish between his own thoughts that can be read by others and those that cannot, and frequently debates whether using his inner voice (which can be easily read) is a good idea, or whether it's a sign of hearing voices and impending madness, potentially culminating in a trip to an asylum. This becomes a regular thought process and fear for the subject throughout much of the year.
Subject 008 had, at some point during the year, become infatuated with a comic book character from the "Urban Brawlers" series of comics. The character is a blonde, scantily clad, [REDACTED] young woman called Sarenna. The subject spent many hours attempting to communicate with Sarenna in some way and seemed to be trying to think of ways to bring her into his own reality.  
Subject 008 has also become more responsive to other girls his own age, previously having only been interested in the company of other boys.
General [REDACTED] attempted to make psychic contact with the subject as he walked to school one day and was reportedly successful. The project was green lit simply so the General could confirm the subject's patriotic stance one way or another and ascertain whether or not he was intending to pose a threat to the establishment or the general public. The General was said to have been satisfied that the subject was not a threat to national security. The General is then said to have pushed for extra information and quizzed the subject over certain military tactics. The subject would go on to detail a potential a false flag scenario whereby a country could incite their people into an unjust war, though he later rejected the thought as being too abhorrent to his own values and pointed out that the unjustly effected citizens would find out the truth eventually and would seek justice. 
Despite the subject's protestations, his plan would later be put into action during Operation [REDACTED] in 2062.

2058
[Age 15]
Subject 008 frequently fantasized about several girls from his school, along with some he had met online, with the number growing regularly, and occasionally he tried to communicate with them psychically from his room. All attempts were seemingly unsuccessful and the subject seems to have difficulty expressing his feeling for these girls outside of his own mind, which seemed to lead to much frustration and confusion from the subject. The subject would later report feeling the girls often responded in his mind with the phrase "I'm not the one", or something similar. 
The Subject was fine with normal day to day interactions, even boisterously overconfident on some occasions. The subject participated in several fights around this time, all with rival classmates.
Subject 008 seemed to come to the conclusion that though he could not communicate psychically with those around him, he could communicate with some of the people observing him.
The subject seemed to go through a phase of mentally protesting at a number of viewers, either from the real-time observers or people viewing the footage in the future. Apparently the subject was being heavily criticized for several of his recent actions and had been deemed "The Antichrist" by a small number of religious fanatics. A large percentage of [REDACTED] were religious at the time, and the subject's controversial opinions had marked him out as a prime target for those in the know.
The subject when questioned by readers, explained most of his behavior by explaining the need to generate a reaction which would spawn further reactions he could read at a later time (offering the example of the conversation he and the reader were participating in), and he would provoke this state in others, mostly by using the comedy skills he had picked up, but sometimes just by being outright offensive (much to the hilarity and shock of several of the real-time and later witnesses to these events). 
The subject was often mocked for his weight at the time and chose to take the stance that if he was not going to be offended, then other people should not be offended by what he has to say, even if they were not implicit in the mocking he underwent. His attitude in this area changed somewhat over time and became more considerate to individual circumstances, though he remained thoroughly against organised religion of all types for the rest of his known life. 
Theories were formed that instead of being psychic, the subject had simply invented an advanced form of prediction which could somehow leave it's imprint on various media and the minds of those performing or enjoying said media. No one had any solid theories about how this imprint was left but some were to speculate that it was the observation of Subject 008's thoughts and subsequent amplification in real-time that caused the imprint effect to be so pronounced on whatever media he viewed. The fact that the subject had become aware of his ability to some extent also seemed to add to his mental presence.
The subject kept up a front of relative normalcy in front of his family and friends, seemingly not wanting to come across as insane, he kept his theories about his ability to himself. Most people never even noticed anything unusual was happening with the subject and so, were none the wiser.
Subject 008 had what he and many others believed to be his first encounter with Subject 25 whilst lying on a bed thinking, with no media on in the background. Subject 008 was visually distressed with what he had heard and addressed the hidden cameras and audience for the first time in a confused outburst aimed at whoever was listening. It seems the voice he heard was in severe distress and was seemingly contacting the subject out of desperation after some undisclosed event. After offering what little support he could, Subject 008 begun ranting to the cameras about how it was the observer's fault, that they knew this event would take place and they were letting it happen, just like everything else. He insisted that "it has not happened yet" and that "they need to stop it".
The subject would not address the cameras or observers directly again for over 10 years, even when prompted to by high level Readers. He also never brought up the encounter with Subject 25 again until he seemingly relived the same encounter many years later.

2057
[Age 16]
translation:
实验体008（罗德尼虚空的传奇）

总结：
实验体008有能力将思想投射到各种媒体平台上，并能留下思想轨迹，这些轨迹可以被某些人在事件发生时或发生后实时追踪和听到。他还能读取通过摄像机或类似录制设备观看他的人的思想。

20世纪30年代
实验体008的思想体现在该十年推出的几部大片上，主要是无声喜剧。当时许多著名演员都表示听到过一个内心声音，它不仅了解他们正在表演的剧目和未来的事件，还经常了解演员自己的个人信息。他们描述说能够在精神层面与实验体交流并向他提问，但很少有人得到明确的回答。据说，当时人们必须意识到实验体008的存在才能听到他的声音，但目前尚不清楚实验体是如何首次引起人们注意的。

20世纪40年代
实验体008的思想继续体现在该十年推出的各种电影中，从喜剧片转向战争片。

为了在拍摄过程中监听实验体008，开始将一群经过特殊培训的人，即“监听员”，带进片场。那些与实验体接触过的人离开时都带着不同的故事和感受。有些人描述说“就像听到了上帝的声音”，而另一些人则说更像是魔鬼，还有人报告说只是一个拥有超凡能力的普通人。许多人只报告了一些模糊的感觉，这些感觉与更详细的描述相对应，不过许多监听员也表示感到极度沮丧、悲伤，有时还有高兴，每种情绪都被推向了极致。

据报告，实验体的生活中多次提到一段“失去”的爱情，以及对某人的悲伤渴望。

人们尝试通过提问与实验体交流，但实验体似乎对给出具体答案持谨慎态度，尤其是关于正在进行的战争或当前事件的问题。不过实验体确实承认，盟国会取得胜利，他们也确实赢得了战争。

20世纪50年代
实验体008在20世纪60年代末之前一直在广播节目“傻瓜”中，以他人生的不同阶段出现。其中至少有一个声音是青年时期的实验体，试图解析节目中一些更荒谬和超现实元素的背后逻辑，但之后一系列更为成熟的思想轨迹似乎暗示了一场即将到来的全球灾难。

实验体首次出现在一首音乐作品中，并继续在该十年的多首热门歌曲中亮相。关于这些思想的报告表明，实验体在听大多数歌曲时都在忙其他事情，但他的思想不知为何仍然被传递了出来。许多人报告说看到了或感受到了具有末日性质的场景，还有一些人提到实验体正在进行各种日常的食物和武器盘点。

更多拥有超能力或精神病学专业背景的“监听员”被雇佣。通过当时进行的各种测试，监听员们在各种媒体上捕捉到了许多新的、尽管不太明显的思想轨迹，其中一些后来被确定为公众的普遍共识（使用当前技术可以在所有已知媒体上阅读到），还有一些是实验体025的。实验体025是一名女性，对实验体008有深入的了解，并且非常关心他。实验体25显然无法直接与实验体联系，但能够以某种方式观察实验体的行动，并学会了模仿实验体的能力。据推测，这是实验体008和实验体025之间唯一的互动方式。

20世纪60年代
实验体出现在几部重要电影中，偶尔也会出现在那个时代的音乐作品中。在登月广播中，可以清晰地听到他对当时尚未公开的“贝尔事件”的批评。

据推测，实验体008生活在某种电视节目中，因为人们发现有其他评论员在分析他观看或收听某些广播时的行动和想法。

实验体似乎对那个时期的音乐颇为不屑，似乎不可能在他不感兴趣的媒介上强行展现他的思想。

20世纪70年代
[被编辑]公司成立，旨在学习并利用实验体008和类似声音为美国政府和军方谋取利益。

在整个70年代，实验体008很少出现，大多出现在暴力电影中，偶尔也会出现在政治镜头或纪录片中。

据说实验体008对当时正在进行的军事行动“公开敌对”。

20世纪80年代
这似乎是实验体008进化史上具有历史意义的一个十年。

与前几十年相比，实验体008出现在更多电影和歌曲中，部分原因是当时媒体有主动寻求实验体008回应的趋势。许多电影和歌曲都是为了明确获得实验体的积极回应而制作的，并且其中许多都成功了。

实验体似乎喜欢那个十年更具实验性的电子主题音乐和动作片，尤其是由那个时代当红明星伯纳德·布鲁内格主演的电影。伯纳德后来将实验体描述为“只是个不想伤害任何人的小孩子”以及“有点像年轻时的我”。

正是伯纳德发现了实验体的名字——“罗德尼”。

实验体25被提及的次数更多，同时还有关于比认识实验体25更早的年轻恋情的提及。实验体经常询问有关自己感情生活的问题。

[注：在后来的对实验体008的精神评估中，他透露当他以这种方式提出问题时，会得到回应。当谈到自己的感情生活时，他往往不喜欢听到的回答。虽然他拒绝透露太多细节，但据信他因这种频繁的提问而对自己的命运有所察觉]。

有多份报告称，人们在听某些歌曲时出现了实验体自慰的幻觉，这导致这些歌曲在全球大部分地区被禁。

实验体008对那个十年的政治官员表示蔑视，并会思考当时被列为机密的军事秘密，这些思考出现在新闻广播和纪录片中。

实验体008被视为全球安全的威胁。

20世纪90年代
随着90年代的到来，禁止了重复性的电子音乐，以防止实验体008的信息传播给所谓的“底层民众”。这一决定引发了实验体008对这一问题的多次长篇大论，尤其是对那个十年的音乐和音乐相关节目的批评。实验体似乎对其他媒体事件没有多少兴趣，不过他对喜剧的喜爱再次浮现，可以在那个时代的许多情景喜剧中听到他的声音。

除了与原始主题相关的思考外，他的主要想法似乎是将自己的行为和想法进行比较，以及这些是如何影响了那个十年的政治，经常表现为懊悔。在90年代初一些较重的电子歌曲中，可以听到实验体008称自己为“罗德尼·虚空”。

2000年代
实验体008主要出现在那个十年的电视节目中。没有学到多少新信息，但随着终端数据库网络的普及，实验体的名声开始增长，他的故事在普通人的家中广为流传。

2010年代
这个十年对实验体008的信息实行了严格的管控。从20世纪50年代开始的相关媒体被没收并销毁，只剩下有限的复制品，并且终端数据库网络引入了过滤器，防止用户将相关信息传播给更广泛的受众。对可播放的内容施加了更多限制，这引发了实验体008的强烈反弹，他将这些行动视为“文明的终结”。他对当时的政治权威人物的反应总是被认为是“非常敌对”。

2020-2041年
这些年里，关于实验体008的新信息非常少。据推测，他很少接触或关注这个时代的事件和媒体。大众对实验体008的信仰开始减弱，到20年代末，大多数人已经忘记了他。

2042年
实验体008的母亲是使用[被编辑]项目中的一个样本受孕的，该项目的目的是利用来自各种高标准人类的DNA来打造超级士兵和科学家。会产生实验体008的那个样本是从[被编辑]获得的。[被编辑]项目除了实验体008外，没有取得任何显著成果。

2043年
实验体008出生，在[被编辑]的[被编辑]医院被命名为罗德尼[被编辑]。实验体的母亲因分娩并发症去世。实验体被送交给一个新的寄养家庭。实验体的新父母了解了实验体008的背景，并接受了怀孕模拟训练，为实验体的出生做准备。两人都自愿接受了A类健忘症治疗，并被重新教育，让他们相信实验体008是他们的亲生孩子。从那时起，实验体008就按照[被编辑]项目期间出生的其他实验体的方式被正常抚养长大。[注：实验体后来评论说，他爱他的家人，尽管他过去有过一些相反的行为和想法，但他想不出还有比这更好的父母]。由于实验体和其他人在历史上一直提及实验体及其过去，实验体008很快就被认定是罗德尼·虚空。在此之前，对实验体的监视一直保持在最低限度，但消息很快传开，科学界和军界人士对此越来越感兴趣。创建了一个在线实时信息源。为24小时监视实验体008奠定了基础。这些基础后来成为了《协议17》中规定的标准化指南。实验体008最喜欢的电视节目《早年时光》是一部明显具有无政府主义色彩的作品，与当时的所有其他电视节目格格不入，它被拍摄并播出。许多参与的演员和工作人员，以及一些知情观众报告说，实验体008就几乎无穷无尽的话题发表了频繁评论，不过大多与他年轻时的生活和他觉得有趣的场景有关。多年来对这12集的回顾性阅读揭示了许多更深层次的隐藏想法，据信这些想法源于实验体晚年时期，大多与他的个人境遇有关，不过偶尔也会像历史上所见那样，实验体会回忆起当时的一些重大事件，比如2044年核子可乐的发明。人们听到实验体008说核子可乐樱桃口味是他的最爱，并讲述了同时代某些可乐的不同之处。事实上，正是这些消息促使约翰-迦勒布·布拉德伯顿开始生产这种产品。布拉德伯顿不得不将核子可乐樱桃口味的发布工作推迟到2059年，因为必须为那些利用实验体008的想法为自己谋取经济利益而不考虑对历史连续性的影响的政府和企业制定新的指导方针。这些新法律导致了[被编辑]公司的终结。在后来的想法中，实验体经常会提到一场灾难性事件，这场事件后来被称为“大战”。虽然曾计划利用实验体008的能力来阻止即将到来的战争，但最终决定保持实验体的连续性，而不是冒险让情况恶化，而是为不可避免的情况做了各种准备。这些计划的大部分后来成为了《协议1》的内容。

2044-2053年 [1岁至10岁]
在接下来的十年里，实验体008的行为没有产生任何显著结果。
实验体早期的想法继续在那十年的各种节目中表现出来，显示出对更黑暗、更前卫的节目和讽刺作品的喜爱，特别是对当时新兴的“另类”喜剧的偏爱。由于这类节目在通常的宣传中很少见，实验体开始建立了一个虽小但相当忠诚的粉丝群，主要是观察他的科学人员，他们往往有着相似的幽默品味。许多军事和政府官员将实验体008视为潜在威胁，并试图几次完全终止该项目，但均未成功。其他人（特别是军方内部人员）认为实验体具有很高的心理潜能，并希望通过各种当时被认为对实验体的精神健康和历史连续性过于危险的测试来推进该项目。
在接下来的几年里，通过父亲或通过地区电视节目，以大致按时间顺序向实验体介绍了据说深受他喜爱的电视节目、电影和歌曲。对某些媒体的禁令被解除，这样实验体就不会觉得周围的人与自己无关。

2053年 [10岁]
电视节目《劳尔·伯顿秀》拍摄并播出。许多人，包括实验体本人，都认为这是实验体第一次开始直接与电视沟通。但随后在实验体参与的一期节目中，他自己推翻了这一说法，透露（关于他如何与电视沟通）“这很简单，我以前在和《早年时光》节目时就做过很多次”。劳尔的节目形式包括各种超现实的喜剧小品，然后是劳尔直接对着镜头与假想的观众进行喜剧调侃。在这些环节，实验体似乎是在告诉劳尔他喜欢哪些小品元素，以及为什么其他某些小品不好笑。尽管当时劳尔正忙着念自动剧本，但他还是注意到了某些反馈内容。在录制时，劳尔并不知道实验体008的存在，在听到实验体008的声音后，他经历了几次精神崩溃。这最终导致劳尔短暂地住进了精神病院。同年晚些时候，他被告知了实验体008及其能力的详情，并签约了一生的电视职业生涯，以吸引更多实验体008的想法。事实上，实验体008一直关注着劳尔及其电视节目，直到大战爆发。在2050年一次未播出的采访中，劳尔说，“当罗德尼出现时，你就知道有好戏看了，尤其是当他心情好的时候”。几年后，在劳尔每周讽刺节目《新闻4U》的几期限时播出节目中，观众能听到实验体008愤怒且不停地咆哮着各种政治议题，恳求所有人倾听。他还批评节目表演者没有对某些政府行为提出更多批评。当时，其他节目的工作人员，无论台前幕后，一整年都在捕捉实验体的观点片段，电视台也雇佣了更多监听员，监听全球电视台实验体那独特的[已删除]声音。实验体的想法在音乐中显现的例子比以往几年呈指数级增长。人们认为这正是实验体开始接触音乐的时候，与此相对应的是，实验体的父亲被提示介绍某些乐队和歌曲。实验体008特别喜欢那种短暂流行的快节奏“贝斯线”风格，这种风格在接下来的几年里将达到巅峰。尽管许多乐队和音乐家对实验体的想法略有了解，但当时很少有人与他进行认知对话，或者被他进行认知对话。贝斯线录音中发现的大多数想法据信源自实验体14-16岁时，涉及他试图克服爱情生活中的各种障碍，以及接受自己潜在的心灵感应能力。偶尔能听到其他声音回应实验体的想法，尽管随着时间的推移，只有少数声音被识别出来，但人们认为，其中许多声音来自那些实时或直接在未来观看实验体008的人，包括在许多场合下，来自实验体25。许多高级政客报告说，他们在电视和广播节目中听到了实验体008的贬损和批评言论，尤其是当他们已经知道实验体存在的时候。人们认为，这些想法主要来自实验体25-30岁时观看的剪辑节目，因为许多想法似乎突然中断，就像被编辑掉了一样。此时的实验体008对政治不感兴趣。

2054-2057年 [11-14岁]
除了偶尔看看喜剧，实验体008似乎对这一时期的电视节目和一般娱乐活动兴趣不大。
实验体似乎对那个时代音乐潮流的转变感到困惑，在许多录音中经常能听到他怀念50年代初的声音。实验体对80年代和90年代媒体的兴趣达到顶峰，但他大部分时间还是与同龄的朋友社交和在外面玩耍。

2057年 [14岁]
[姓名被删除]博士创造了[设备名被删除]思维转录器，该设备允许科学家随时查看实验体思想滚动的字幕条，就像电影的字幕一样。尽管这项技术存在缺陷，经常识别到错误的人，但这项现代科技的突破将通过长期使用实验体的数据来完善，并有多种用途，且全部属于绝密。它的存在从未向公众正式公布。
实验体依然偏爱80年代末和90年代初的娱乐方式。
实验体008似乎意识到自己与电视节目和电影有着某种联系，并开始质疑现实的边界。
在此期间，最终证明实验体008的思维模式与“罗德尼·虚空”的思维模式完全吻合，在许多电影中，可以看到并读到他实时引用自己历史中的经典台词。
实验体008开始区分哪些是自己的思想可以被他人读取，哪些不能，并经常辩论使用内心声音（容易被读取）是否是个好主意，或者这是否是听到声音和即将发疯的迹象，最终可能会导致被送进精神病院。这一想法和恐惧成为了实验体一年中经常出现的思维过程和担忧。
在这一年的某个时候，实验体008迷上了“都市斗殴者”系列漫画中的一个漫画角色。这个角色是一位金发、衣着暴露的[信息被删除]年轻女性，名叫萨伦娜。实验体花费了许多小时试图以某种方式与萨伦娜沟通，并似乎正在思考如何将她带入自己的现实世界。
实验体008对其他同龄女孩的反应也变得更加积极，之前他只对其他男孩感兴趣。
[姓名被删除]将军曾在一天实验体上学的路上尝试与他进行心灵感应接触，据报道成功了。该项目获得绿灯通行仅仅是为了让将军确认实验体的爱国立场，并确定他是否打算对当权者或公众构成威胁。据说将军对实验体不构成国家安全威胁感到满意。然后据说将军要求获得更多信息，并就某些军事战术向实验体提问。实验体详细描述了一种可能的假旗情景，即一个国家可以煽动人民进行不义之战，但他后来认为这种想法与自己的价值观太相悖，并指出受到不公正影响的公民最终会发现真相，并会寻求正义。尽管实验体提出抗议，但他的计划在2062年的[行动名被删除]中被付诸实施。

2058年 [15岁]
实验体008经常幻想自己学校里的几个女孩，以及他在网上遇到的一些女孩，数量还在不断增加。他偶尔会尝试在自己的房间里用心灵感应与她们交流。但所有这些尝试似乎都不成功，实验体似乎很难在思想之外向这些女孩表达自己的感受，这给他带来了很多沮丧和困惑。后来，实验体表示经常感觉女孩们在他的脑海中用“我不是那个人”或类似的话来回应他。

实验体在日常交往中表现正常，甚至在某些场合还表现得非常自信。那段时间，他参与了几次打架，都是与竞争对手同学之间的冲突。

实验体008似乎得出结论，虽然他不能与周围的人进行心灵交流，但他可以与一些观察他的人交流。

实验体似乎经历了一段时期，对许多观众进行精神上的抗议，无论是实时观察者还是未来观看录像的人。显然，实验体最近的几次行动都受到了严厉批评，甚至被少数宗教狂热者视为“反基督者”。当时，[信息被删除]中的大部分人都有宗教信仰，而实验体那些有争议的言论使他成为了知情者的首要目标。

当被读者提问时，实验体通过解释自己需要引发一种反应，而这种反应会催生他以后能读到的进一步反应（举了他和读者正在参与的对话为例），来解释自己大部分的行为，他会用这种方式挑起别人的这种状态，大多时候是通过运用他学来的喜剧技巧，但有时只是直言不讳地冒犯别人（这让许多实时和后来的目击者既觉得好笑又震惊）。

当时，实验体经常因为体重问题而受到嘲笑，他选择采取这样的立场：如果他自己不会觉得被冒犯，那么别人也不应该被他所说的话冒犯，即使他们并非他经历的嘲笑的直接对象。虽然他在这一方面的态度随着时间的推移有所改变，变得更加体谅个人情况，但在他已知的生活中，他始终彻底反对各种形式的有组织宗教。

有人提出理论，认为实验体并非具有超能力，而是发明了一种高级预测形式，可以在各种媒体和表演或欣赏这些媒体的人们的脑海中留下印记。没有人对如何留下这种印记有确切的理论，但一些人推测，这是由于对实验体008的思想进行观察并在实时中进行后续放大，导致无论他观看什么媒体，这种印记效果都非常明显。实验体在某种程度上已经意识到自己的能力，这似乎也增加了他的精神存在感。

在家人和朋友面前，实验体保持着一副相对正常的外表，似乎不想被认为精神失常，他把自己的能力理论藏在心里。大多数人甚至都没有注意到实验体身上有任何异常，因此，他们对此一无所知。

实验体008躺在床上思考时（周围没有媒体播放），他和许多人认为，自己与实验体25有了第一次遭遇。实验体008对所听到的内容感到视觉上的困扰，并首次向隐藏的摄像头和观众发出了困惑的爆发式演讲，针对任何在听的人。似乎他听到的声音正处于极度痛苦之中，并在某个未公开的事件后出于绝望而联系实验体。在提供了他能提供的少量支持后，实验体008开始对着摄像头咆哮，指责观察者是事件的罪魁祸首，他们知道这件事会发生，却让它发生了，就像其他所有事情一样。他坚持认为“这件事还没有发生”，并说“他们需要阻止它”。

在接下来的10多年里，即使被高级读者提示，实验体也没有再直接对摄像头或观察者发表讲话。直到多年后，他似乎重新经历了同样的遭遇，才再次提起与实验体25的这次遭遇。

2057年
[16岁]
实验体008（罗德尼虚空的传奇）

original:
Subject 008 (The Legend Of Rodknee Void)

Summary:
Subject 008 has the ability to project thought onto various media platforms and can leave thought-trails that can be heard and followed by certain other individuals, both in real time and after the event. He also had the ability to read the thoughts of other people watching him through a camera or similar recording device.

1930s
Subject 008's thoughts manifest on several blockbuster movies from the decade, mainly silent comedies. Many famous actors from the time describe hearing an internal voice that seemed to have knowledge, not only of the show they were performing in, along with future events, but often personal information relating to the actors themselves. They described the ability to converse with the subject on a mental level and ask him questions, though few got a clear response. It was said at the time that you had to be aware of Subject 008 in order to hear him, though how the subject first came to people's attention is currently unknown.

1940s
Subject 008's thoughts continue to manifest on various films from the decade, moving away from comedy and into war movies. 
Specially trained people known as "Readers" start to be brought into movie sets in order to listen out for Subject 008 during filming. Those who made contact came away with varying stories and feelings from the experience. Some described it as "like hearing the voice of God" whilst others said it was more like the Devil and others reported an ordinary man with an extraordinary ability. Many only reported vague feelings that correspond with the more detailed accounts, though lots of Readers also described feeling severely frustrated, sad and sometimes happy, with every emotion pushed to the extreme.
Several instances were reported of references to a "lost" love in the subject's life and a sorrowful yearning for someone.
Attempts were made to interact with the subject by posing questions, though the subject seemed wary of giving any specific answers, especially relating to the ongoing war or current events. The subject did admit that the allied nations would prevail and they would indeed go on to win the war. 

1950s
Subject 008 appears at several stages of his life on radio broadcast "The Fools" which would run until the late 60's. At least one of those voices was the subject as a youth trying to decipher the formulas behind some of the more ridiculous and surreal elements of the show but a later, more experienced series of thought-trails seemed to hint at an impending global disaster.
The subject made his first appearance on a musical composition and went on to feature on several more hits from the decade. Reports of these thoughts imply the subject was busy doing other things whilst listening to most of the songs and yet somehow his thoughts were transferred anyway. Many report seeing or feeling scenes of an apocalyptic nature and several reference the subject doing various mundane inventory checks on food and weapons.
More Readers were hired with a professional background in psychic ability or psychiatry. Through various tests conducted during the time, the Readers picked up many new, though less obvious thought-trails on various media, some of which which were later identified as the general public's consensus (which can be read on all known media using current techniques) and Subject 025. Subject 025 appeared as a female who has intimate knowledge of Subject 008 and cares deeply for the subject. Subject 25 apparently is unable to contact the subject directly but can somehow observe the subject's actions and has learned to mimic the subject's ability. It is speculated this is the only form of interaction Subject 008 and Subject 025 have with each other.

1960s
Subject appears on several major films and occasionally in musical compositions from the era. During the Moon Landing broadcast he can be clearly read criticizing the "Bell Incident" which had not been made public knowledge at the time.
It is hypothesized that Subject 008 is living in a TV show of some kind, as several other commentators are discovered analysing the subject's actions and thoughts as he watches to or listens to certain broadcasts.
Subject appears to have a certain level of disdain for the music of this period and it seems to be impossible to force a manifestation of the subject's thoughts on a medium the subject has no interest in.

1970s
The [REDACTED] Corporation was founded in order to learn from and exploit Subject 008 and similar voices for the benefit of The American government and military.
Subject 008 appeared infrequently throughout the decade, mostly on violent films and occasionally over political footage or documentaries. 
Subject 008 was said to be "openly hostile" towards military operations that were in action at the time.

1980s
This seems to be a historic decade in the evolution of Subject 008.
Subject 008 appears on many more films and songs than in previous decades, brought on partly by the trend in the media of the time to actively seek out a response from Subject 008. Many films and songs were commissioned with the express intent of garnering a positive response from the subject, and many were successful. 
The subject seems to have a taste for the more experimental, electronic themed music of the decade and the action films of the time, especially those starring Bernard Bluenegger, who was a popular star of the era. Bernard would later describe the subject as "just a little kid who does not mean any harm" and "a bit like me when I was younger".
It was Bernard who would go on to discover the subject's name - "Rodney".
Many more references to Subject 25 appear, along with references to younger love interests that seem to pre-date any knowledge of Subject 25. Subject frequently requests answers regarding issues surrounding his love life.
[NOTE: In later psychiatric evaluations of Subject 008 he reveals he would get responses when posing questions in this manner. When it came to his love life he often did not like the responses he heard. Though he refused to go into much detail it is believed he was somewhat aware of the fate that awaited him because of this frequent line of questioning]. 
Several reports surface of people having visions of the subject masturbating whilst listening to certain songs, which lead to those songs being banned in most areas of the globe.
Subject 008 displayed contempt for political officials of the decade and was known to think about what were, at the time, classified military secrets over news broadcasts and documentaries.
Subject 008 was deemed a threat to global security.

1990s
With the 90's came the ban on repetitive electronic music which came about in order to prevent the spreading of Subject 008's message to a perceived "underclass". This decision fueled a number of extensive rants on the issue by Subject 008, especially over music and music related programming of the decade. The subject appears to have little to no interest in other media events of the time, though his fondness for comedy resurfaces and he can be heard on many sitcoms from the era.
His main thoughts outside of those relating to the original subject matter seem to consist of the subject drawing a comparison between his own actions and thoughts, and how those have affected the politics of the decade, often in the form of regrets.
In some of the heavier electronic songs from the early 90's Subject 008 can be heard referring to himself as "Rodney Void".

2000s
Subject 008 mainly appears on TV shows from the decade. Little new information was learned but with the popularization of the Terminal Database Network, the subject's notoriety began to grow as his story was spread throughout the homes of regular people.

2010s
This decade saw a severe clampdown on information regarding to Subject 008. Associated media going back to the 1950's was seized and destroyed except for limited duplications, and with it filters were introduced to the TDN which prevented users from spreading related information to a wider audience. Many more restrictions were placed upon what content could be broadcast and this prompted a huge backlash from Subject 008 who deemed these actions "the end of civilization". His reaction to political authority figures of the time was always considered to be "very hostile".

2020-2041
Very little new information relating to Subject 008 was learned during these years. It is theorized that he had little access to, or interest in the events and media of this era. Belief in Subject 008 began to wane amongst the general public, with most forgetting about him by the end of the 20's.
translation:
实验体008（罗德尼虚空的传奇）

总结：
实验体008有能力将思想投射到各种媒体平台上，并能留下思想轨迹，这些轨迹可以被某些人在事件发生时或发生后实时追踪和听到。他还能读取通过摄像机或类似录制设备观看他的人的思想。

20世纪30年代
实验体008的思想体现在该十年推出的几部大片上，主要是无声喜剧。当时许多著名演员都表示听到过一个内心声音，它不仅了解他们正在表演的剧目和未来的事件，还经常了解演员自己的个人信息。他们描述说能够在精神层面与实验体交流并向他提问，但很少有人得到明确的回答。据说，当时人们必须意识到实验体008的存在才能听到他的声音，但目前尚不清楚实验体是如何首次引起人们注意的。

20世纪40年代
实验体008的思想继续体现在该十年推出的各种电影中，从喜剧片转向战争片。

为了在拍摄过程中监听实验体008，开始将一群经过特殊培训的人，即“监听员”，带进片场。那些与实验体接触过的人离开时都带着不同的故事和感受。有些人描述说“就像听到了上帝的声音”，而另一些人则说更像是魔鬼，还有人报告说只是一个拥有超凡能力的普通人。许多人只报告了一些模糊的感觉，这些感觉与更详细的描述相对应，不过许多监听员也表示感到极度沮丧、悲伤，有时还有高兴，每种情绪都被推向了极致。

据报告，实验体的生活中多次提到一段“失去”的爱情，以及对某人的悲伤渴望。

人们尝试通过提问与实验体交流，但实验体似乎对给出具体答案持谨慎态度，尤其是关于正在进行的战争或当前事件的问题。不过实验体确实承认，盟国会取得胜利，他们也确实赢得了战争。

20世纪50年代
实验体008在20世纪60年代末之前一直在广播节目“傻瓜”中，以他人生的不同阶段出现。其中至少有一个声音是青年时期的实验体，试图解析节目中一些更荒谬和超现实元素的背后逻辑，但之后一系列更为成熟的思想轨迹似乎暗示了一场即将到来的全球灾难。

实验体首次出现在一首音乐作品中，并继续在该十年的多首热门歌曲中亮相。关于这些思想的报告表明，实验体在听大多数歌曲时都在忙其他事情，但他的思想不知为何仍然被传递了出来。许多人报告说看到了或感受到了具有末日性质的场景，还有一些人提到实验体正在进行各种日常的食物和武器盘点。

更多拥有超能力或精神病学专业背景的“监听员”被雇佣。通过当时进行的各种测试，监听员们在各种媒体上捕捉到了许多新的、尽管不太明显的思想轨迹，其中一些后来被确定为公众的普遍共识（使用当前技术可以在所有已知媒体上阅读到），还有一些是实验体025的。实验体025是一名女性，对实验体008有深入的了解，并且非常关心他。实验体25显然无法直接与实验体联系，但能够以某种方式观察实验体的行动，并学会了模仿实验体的能力。据推测，这是实验体008和实验体025之间唯一的互动方式。

20世纪60年代
实验体出现在几部重要电影中，偶尔也会出现在那个时代的音乐作品中。在登月广播中，可以清晰地听到他对当时尚未公开的“贝尔事件”的批评。

据推测，实验体008生活在某种电视节目中，因为人们发现有其他评论员在分析他观看或收听某些广播时的行动和想法。

实验体似乎对那个时期的音乐颇为不屑，似乎不可能在他不感兴趣的媒介上强行展现他的思想。

20世纪70年代
[被编辑]公司成立，旨在学习并利用实验体008和类似声音为美国政府和军方谋取利益。

在整个70年代，实验体008很少出现，大多出现在暴力电影中，偶尔也会出现在政治镜头或纪录片中。

据说实验体008对当时正在进行的军事行动“公开敌对”。

20世纪80年代
这似乎是实验体008进化史上具有历史意义的一个十年。

与前几十年相比，实验体008出现在更多电影和歌曲中，部分原因是当时媒体有主动寻求实验体008回应的趋势。许多电影和歌曲都是为了明确获得实验体的积极回应而制作的，并且其中许多都成功了。

实验体似乎喜欢那个十年更具实验性的电子主题音乐和动作片，尤其是由那个时代当红明星伯纳德·布鲁内格主演的电影。伯纳德后来将实验体描述为“只是个不想伤害任何人的小孩子”以及“有点像年轻时的我”。

正是伯纳德发现了实验体的名字——“罗德尼”。

实验体25被提及的次数更多，同时还有关于比认识实验体25更早的年轻恋情的提及。实验体经常询问有关自己感情生活的问题。

[注：在后来的对实验体008的精神评估中，他透露当他以这种方式提出问题时，会得到回应。当谈到自己的感情生活时，他往往不喜欢听到的回答。虽然他拒绝透露太多细节，但据信他因这种频繁的提问而对自己的命运有所察觉]。

有多份报告称，人们在听某些歌曲时出现了实验体自慰的幻觉，这导致这些歌曲在全球大部分地区被禁。

实验体008对那个十年的政治官员表示蔑视，并会思考当时被列为机密的军事秘密，这些思考出现在新闻广播和纪录片中。

实验体008被视为全球安全的威胁。

20世纪90年代
随着90年代的到来，禁止了重复性的电子音乐，以防止实验体008的信息传播给所谓的“底层民众”。这一决定引发了实验体008对这一问题的多次长篇大论，尤其是对那个十年的音乐和音乐相关节目的批评。实验体似乎对其他媒体事件没有多少兴趣，不过他对喜剧的喜爱再次浮现，可以在那个时代的许多情景喜剧中听到他的声音。

除了与原始主题相关的思考外，他的主要想法似乎是将自己的行为和想法进行比较，以及这些是如何影响了那个十年的政治，经常表现为懊悔。在90年代初一些较重的电子歌曲中，可以听到实验体008称自己为“罗德尼·虚空”。

2000年代
实验体008主要出现在那个十年的电视节目中。没有学到多少新信息，但随着终端数据库网络的普及，实验体的名声开始增长，他的故事在普通人的家中广为流传。

2010年代
这个十年对实验体008的信息实行了严格的管控。从20世纪50年代开始的相关媒体被没收并销毁，只剩下有限的复制品，并且终端数据库网络引入了过滤器，防止用户将相关信息传播给更广泛的受众。对可播放的内容施加了更多限制，这引发了实验体008的强烈反弹，他将这些行动视为“文明的终结”。他对当时的政治权威人物的反应总是被认为是“非常敌对”。

2020-2041年
这些年里，关于实验体008的新信息非常少。据推测，他很少接触或关注这个时代的事件和媒体。大众对实验体008的信仰开始减弱，到20年代末，大多数人已经忘记了他。
实验体008（罗德尼虚空的传奇）

original:
2042
Subject's mother was impregnated using a sample from the Project [REDACTED], the aim of which was to engineer super soldiers and scientists using DNA from various high standard human sources. The sample that would produce Subject 008 was obtained from [REDACTED].
Project [REDACTED] failed to yield any significant results outside of Subject 008.

2043
Subject 008 is born, named Rodney [REDACTED] on [REDACTED] in [REDACTED] Hospital, in [REDACTED].
Subject's mother died from complications following the birth.
Subject was put into the care of a new foster family.
The subject's new mother and father were briefed on the background of Subject 008 and underwent a pregnancy simulation, in preparation for the subject's birth. Both underwent voluntary treatment with Class A amnesiacs and were re-educated to believe that Subject 008 was their own child. From there onwards Subject 008 was brought up normally in accordance with the other subjects born during Project [REDACTED].
[NOTE. Subject would later comment that he loves his family and, despite certain actions and thoughts to the contrary in his past, that he could not think of two better parents].
Due to the subject and others having referred to the subject and his past throughout history, Subject 008 was soon identified as Rodney Void.
Monitoring the subject had been kept to a minimum before this point but soon after word spread and many in the scientific and military communities were becoming increasingly interested. A constant on-line feed was created. Foundations were arranged for monitoring Subject 008 24 hours a day. There foundations would go on to become the standardized guildelines set out in Protocol 17.
Subject 008's favorite TV show, "The Early Years" , a distinctly anarchic creation that went against the grain of all other TV shows from the time, was filmed and broadcast. Many of the actors and crew involved, along with several informed viewers reported frequent comments from Subject 008 on an almost endless list of topics, though mostly from the subject's youth and in relation to the scenes he found funny.
Retrospective reading of the 12 episodes over the years revealed many deeper hidden thoughts believed to have originated from the subject in his older years, mostly relating to his own circumstances, though on occasion, as seen throughout history, the subject would recall high profile events from around the time such as the invention of Nuka Cola in 2044. Subject 008 was heard referring to Nuka Cola Cherry as his favorite drink and related the differences in certain Colas of the same era. In fact it was these messages that prompted John-Caleb Bradburton to begin manufacture of the product in the first place. Bradburton had to postpone work on release of Nuka Cola Cherry until 2059 due to new guidelines that had to be set for both government and business enterprises who were using Subject 008's thoughts for their own financial benefit, without considering the impact on historical continuity. These new laws saw an end to the operations of The [REDACTED] Corporation. 
In his later thoughts the Subject would often refer back to a cataclysmic event, which would become known as The Great War.
Though plans were made to use Subject 008's ability to prevent the impending War, it was eventually decided to maintain the Subject's continuity rather than risk worsening the situation and instead various preparations were made for the inevitable. The bulk of these plans would go on to become Protocol 1. 

2044-2053
[Age 1 to 10 years]
Subject 008's behavior yielded no significant results for the next ten years.
The subject's older thoughts continued to manifest on various shows throughout the decade, showing a taste for darker and edgier programming and satire, with a preference for the then new wave of "alternative" comedy. Due to the scarcity of these type of broadcasts amongst the usual propaganda, the subject began to build a small but somewhat loyal fanbase, mostly amongst the scientific personnel who were observing him, who often shared a similar taste in humor. Many military and government officials saw Subject 008 as a potential threat and tried, unsuccessfully, to terminate the project entirely on several occasions.
Others, (within the Military in particular) were convinced that the Subject had high psychic potential and wanted to advance the project with various tests which were deemed at the time to be too dangerous for the subject's sanity and historical continuity. 
TV shows, movies and songs, known to have been popular with the subject, were introduced to him in a vaguely chronological order over the following years, via the father or through regional TV programming. Bans placed on certain media were lifted, so the subject would not find others around him unrelatable.

2053
[Age 10 years]
TV Show "The Raul Perton Show" was filmed and broadcast. This is believed by many, including the subject himself, to be the first time the subject began to communicate directly with the TV. This is later contradicted by the subject himself during a segment in the show, where he reveals (in relation to how he communicates with the TV) "this is easy, I have done this with The Early Years loads of times".
The format of Raul's show involved various surreal comedic sketches followed by Raul addressing the camera directly and engaging the hypothetical audience in comedy banter. During these segments the subject would seem to be attempting to tell Raul which elements of sketches he enjoyed, and why certain others did not work. Though Raul was busy reading from an autoscript at the time he still picked up on certain elements of feedback.
Raul was not aware of Subject 008's existence at the time of recording and underwent several mental breakdowns as a result of hearing Subject 008. This culminated in a brief stint in a mental hospital for Raul. Later in the year he was briefed on the details of Subject 008 and his ability, and was contracted with a lifetime career in TV in order to attract more of Subject 008's thoughts. Indeed, Subject 008 followed Raul and his TV exploits up until the Great War. During an unaired interview in 2050 Raul stated that "you always knew you were onto a good thing when Rodney turned up, especially if he was in a good mood". 
Raul would be exposed to some of Subject 008's, now legendary bad moods, several years later when during a limited run episodes of his weekly satire show "News4U", Subject 008 can be heard ranting angrily and incessantly about various political causes, pleading with anyone and everyone to listen. He also criticized the shows performers for not being more critical of certain government actions.
Workers both on and off stage from various other shows of the time picked up flashes of the subject's opinions throughout the year and more Readers were hired to listen out for the subject's distinct [REDACTED] voice on TV stations globally.
Instances of the subject's thought manifesting on music from the time increased exponentially from previous years. This is believed to be when the subject first got into music and to correspond to this, the subject's father was prompted to introduce certain bands and songs.
Subject 008 displayed a particular liking for the short-lived uptempo "bassline" genre that was to peak in the following years.
Despite many bands and musicians getting a vague notion of the subject's thoughts, very few engaged, or were engaged by the subject in cognitive conversation at the time. Most thoughts discovered on bassline recordings were believed to have originated from the subject at age 14-16 and involved the subject trying to overcome various obstacles in his love life as well as coming to terms with his potential psychic ability. On occasion other voices can be heard responding to the subject's thoughts, though few have been identified with time, many are believed to originate from those directly viewing Subject 008 in real-time or in the future, including on many occasions, Subject 25.
Many key ranking politicians reported hearing derogatory and critical remarks from Subject 008 during TV and radio appearances, especially when they were already aware of the subject's existence.. These thoughts are believed to have mainly originated from clip-shows the subject watched during the ages of 25-30, as many thought-trails seem to end abruptly, as though edited out of existence.
Subject 008 at this age expresses no interest in politics.

2054-2057
[Age 11-14]
Subject 008 appeared to have little interest in the TV shows and general entertainment of this period outside of the occasional comedy. 
Subject seemed to be confused by the shifts in musical trends of the era and is often heard pining for the early 50's sound in many recordings. Subject's interest in 1980's and 1990's media peaks, though he spends most of his time socializing with friends his own age and playing outside.

2057
[Age 14]
Dr [REDACTED] creates the [REDACTED] Thought-Transcriber which allowed scientists to view a scrolling bar of the subject's thoughts at all times, much like subtitles for a film. Though flawed and frequently picking up the wrong person, this breakthrough in modern technology was to be refined, using the subject's data over time, for a variety of uses, all top secret. It's existence was never officially announced to the public.
The subject's preference for late 80's and early 90's entertainment remains.
Subject 008 seemingly became aware that he has some kind of link with TV shows and film and begins to question the boundaries of his reality. 
During this time it was finally proven that Subject 008's thought patterns clearly matched those of "Rodney Void" and during many films he could be seen and read directly quoting historic lines from his own history in real-time.
Subject 008 begins to distinguish between his own thoughts that can be read by others and those that cannot, and frequently debates whether using his inner voice (which can be easily read) is a good idea, or whether it's a sign of hearing voices and impending madness, potentially culminating in a trip to an asylum. This becomes a regular thought process and fear for the subject throughout much of the year.
Subject 008 had, at some point during the year, become infatuated with a comic book character from the "Urban Brawlers" series of comics. The character is a blonde, scantily clad, [REDACTED] young woman called Sarenna. The subject spent many hours attempting to communicate with Sarenna in some way and seemed to be trying to think of ways to bring her into his own reality.  
Subject 008 has also become more responsive to other girls his own age, previously having only been interested in the company of other boys.
General [REDACTED] attempted to make psychic contact with the subject as he walked to school one day and was reportedly successful. The project was green lit simply so the General could confirm the subject's patriotic stance one way or another and ascertain whether or not he was intending to pose a threat to the establishment or the general public. The General was said to have been satisfied that the subject was not a threat to national security. The General is then said to have pushed for extra information and quizzed the subject over certain military tactics. The subject would go on to detail a potential a false flag scenario whereby a country could incite their people into an unjust war, though he later rejected the thought as being too abhorrent to his own values and pointed out that the unjustly effected citizens would find out the truth eventually and would seek justice. 
Despite the subject's protestations, his plan would later be put into action during Operation [REDACTED] in 2062.

2058
[Age 15]
Subject 008 frequently fantasized about several girls from his school, along with some he had met online, with the number growing regularly, and occasionally he tried to communicate with them psychically from his room. All attempts were seemingly unsuccessful and the subject seems to have difficulty expressing his feeling for these girls outside of his own mind, which seemed to lead to much frustration and confusion from the subject. The subject would later report feeling the girls often responded in his mind with the phrase "I'm not the one", or something similar. 
The Subject was fine with normal day to day interactions, even boisterously overconfident on some occasions. The subject participated in several fights around this time, all with rival classmates.
Subject 008 seemed to come to the conclusion that though he could not communicate psychically with those around him, he could communicate with some of the people observing him.
The subject seemed to go through a phase of mentally protesting at a number of viewers, either from the real-time observers or people viewing the footage in the future. Apparently the subject was being heavily criticized for several of his recent actions and had been deemed "The Antichrist" by a small number of religious fanatics. A large percentage of [REDACTED] were religious at the time, and the subject's controversial opinions had marked him out as a prime target for those in the know.
The subject when questioned by readers, explained most of his behavior by explaining the need to generate a reaction which would spawn further reactions he could read at a later time (offering the example of the conversation he and the reader were participating in), and he would provoke this state in others, mostly by using the comedy skills he had picked up, but sometimes just by being outright offensive (much to the hilarity and shock of several of the real-time and later witnesses to these events). 
The subject was often mocked for his weight at the time and chose to take the stance that if he was not going to be offended, then other people should not be offended by what he has to say, even if they were not implicit in the mocking he underwent. His attitude in this area changed somewhat over time and became more considerate to individual circumstances, though he remained thoroughly against organised religion of all types for the rest of his known life. 
Theories were formed that instead of being psychic, the subject had simply invented an advanced form of prediction which could somehow leave it's imprint on various media and the minds of those performing or enjoying said media. No one had any solid theories about how this imprint was left but some were to speculate that it was the observation of Subject 008's thoughts and subsequent amplification in real-time that caused the imprint effect to be so pronounced on whatever media he viewed. The fact that the subject had become aware of his ability to some extent also seemed to add to his mental presence.
The subject kept up a front of relative normalcy in front of his family and friends, seemingly not wanting to come across as insane, he kept his theories about his ability to himself. Most people never even noticed anything unusual was happening with the subject and so, were none the wiser.
Subject 008 had what he and many others believed to be his first encounter with Subject 25 whilst lying on a bed thinking, with no media on in the background. Subject 008 was visually distressed with what he had heard and addressed the hidden cameras and audience for the first time in a confused outburst aimed at whoever was listening. It seems the voice he heard was in severe distress and was seemingly contacting the subject out of desperation after some undisclosed event. After offering what little support he could, Subject 008 begun ranting to the cameras about how it was the observer's fault, that they knew this event would take place and they were letting it happen, just like everything else. He insisted that "it has not happened yet" and that "they need to stop it".
The subject would not address the cameras or observers directly again for over 10 years, even when prompted to by high level Readers. He also never brought up the encounter with Subject 25 again until he seemingly relived the same encounter many years later.

2057
[Age 16]
translation:
2042年
实验体008的母亲是使用[被编辑]项目中的一个样本受孕的，该项目的目的是利用来自各种高标准人类的DNA来打造超级士兵和科学家。会产生实验体008的那个样本是从[被编辑]获得的。[被编辑]项目除了实验体008外，没有取得任何显著成果。

2043年
实验体008出生，在[被编辑]的[被编辑]医院被命名为罗德尼[被编辑]。实验体的母亲因分娩并发症去世。实验体被送交给一个新的寄养家庭。实验体的新父母了解了实验体008的背景，并接受了怀孕模拟训练，为实验体的出生做准备。两人都自愿接受了A类健忘症治疗，并被重新教育，让他们相信实验体008是他们的亲生孩子。从那时起，实验体008就按照[被编辑]项目期间出生的其他实验体的方式被正常抚养长大。[注：实验体后来评论说，他爱他的家人，尽管他过去有过一些相反的行为和想法，但他想不出还有比这更好的父母]。由于实验体和其他人在历史上一直提及实验体及其过去，实验体008很快就被认定是罗德尼·虚空。在此之前，对实验体的监视一直保持在最低限度，但消息很快传开，科学界和军界人士对此越来越感兴趣。创建了一个在线实时信息源。为24小时监视实验体008奠定了基础。这些基础后来成为了《协议17》中规定的标准化指南。实验体008最喜欢的电视节目《早年时光》是一部明显具有无政府主义色彩的作品，与当时的所有其他电视节目格格不入，它被拍摄并播出。许多参与的演员和工作人员，以及一些知情观众报告说，实验体008就几乎无穷无尽的话题发表了频繁评论，不过大多与他年轻时的生活和他觉得有趣的场景有关。多年来对这12集的回顾性阅读揭示了许多更深层次的隐藏想法，据信这些想法源于实验体晚年时期，大多与他的个人境遇有关，不过偶尔也会像历史上所见那样，实验体会回忆起当时的一些重大事件，比如2044年核子可乐的发明。人们听到实验体008说核子可乐樱桃口味是他的最爱，并讲述了同时代某些可乐的不同之处。事实上，正是这些消息促使约翰-迦勒布·布拉德伯顿开始生产这种产品。布拉德伯顿不得不将核子可乐樱桃口味的发布工作推迟到2059年，因为必须为那些利用实验体008的想法为自己谋取经济利益而不考虑对历史连续性的影响的政府和企业制定新的指导方针。这些新法律导致了[被编辑]公司的终结。在后来的想法中，实验体经常会提到一场灾难性事件，这场事件后来被称为“大战”。虽然曾计划利用实验体008的能力来阻止即将到来的战争，但最终决定保持实验体的连续性，而不是冒险让情况恶化，而是为不可避免的情况做了各种准备。这些计划的大部分后来成为了《协议1》的内容。

2044-2053年 [1岁至10岁]
在接下来的十年里，实验体008的行为没有产生任何显著结果。
实验体早期的想法继续在那十年的各种节目中表现出来，显示出对更黑暗、更前卫的节目和讽刺作品的喜爱，特别是对当时新兴的“另类”喜剧的偏爱。由于这类节目在通常的宣传中很少见，实验体开始建立了一个虽小但相当忠诚的粉丝群，主要是观察他的科学人员，他们往往有着相似的幽默品味。许多军事和政府官员将实验体008视为潜在威胁，并试图几次完全终止该项目，但均未成功。其他人（特别是军方内部人员）认为实验体具有很高的心理潜能，并希望通过各种当时被认为对实验体的精神健康和历史连续性过于危险的测试来推进该项目。
在接下来的几年里，通过父亲或通过地区电视节目，以大致按时间顺序向实验体介绍了据说深受他喜爱的电视节目、电影和歌曲。对某些媒体的禁令被解除，这样实验体就不会觉得周围的人与自己无关。

2053年 [10岁]
电视节目《劳尔·伯顿秀》拍摄并播出。许多人，包括实验体本人，都认为这是实验体第一次开始直接与电视沟通。但随后在实验体参与的一期节目中，他自己推翻了这一说法，透露（关于他如何与电视沟通）“这很简单，我以前在和《早年时光》节目时就做过很多次”。劳尔的节目形式包括各种超现实的喜剧小品，然后是劳尔直接对着镜头与假想的观众进行喜剧调侃。在这些环节，实验体似乎是在告诉劳尔他喜欢哪些小品元素，以及为什么其他某些小品不好笑。尽管当时劳尔正忙着念自动剧本，但他还是注意到了某些反馈内容。在录制时，劳尔并不知道实验体008的存在，在听到实验体008的声音后，他经历了几次精神崩溃。这最终导致劳尔短暂地住进了精神病院。同年晚些时候，他被告知了实验体008及其能力的详情，并签约了一生的电视职业生涯，以吸引更多实验体008的想法。事实上，实验体008一直关注着劳尔及其电视节目，直到大战爆发。在2050年一次未播出的采访中，劳尔说，“当罗德尼出现时，你就知道有好戏看了，尤其是当他心情好的时候”。几年后，在劳尔每周讽刺节目《新闻4U》的几期限时播出节目中，观众能听到实验体008愤怒且不停地咆哮着各种政治议题，恳求所有人倾听。他还批评节目表演者没有对某些政府行为提出更多批评。当时，其他节目的工作人员，无论台前幕后，一整年都在捕捉实验体的观点片段，电视台也雇佣了更多监听员，监听全球电视台实验体那独特的[已删除]声音。实验体的想法在音乐中显现的例子比以往几年呈指数级增长。人们认为这正是实验体开始接触音乐的时候，与此相对应的是，实验体的父亲被提示介绍某些乐队和歌曲。实验体008特别喜欢那种短暂流行的快节奏“贝斯线”风格，这种风格在接下来的几年里将达到巅峰。尽管许多乐队和音乐家对实验体的想法略有了解，但当时很少有人与他进行认知对话，或者被他进行认知对话。贝斯线录音中发现的大多数想法据信源自实验体14-16岁时，涉及他试图克服爱情生活中的各种障碍，以及接受自己潜在的心灵感应能力。偶尔能听到其他声音回应实验体的想法，尽管随着时间的推移，只有少数声音被识别出来，但人们认为，其中许多声音来自那些实时或直接在未来观看实验体008的人，包括在许多场合下，来自实验体25。许多高级政客报告说，他们在电视和广播节目中听到了实验体008的贬损和批评言论，尤其是当他们已经知道实验体存在的时候。人们认为，这些想法主要来自实验体25-30岁时观看的剪辑节目，因为许多想法似乎突然中断，就像被编辑掉了一样。此时的实验体008对政治不感兴趣。

2054-2057年 [11-14岁]
除了偶尔看看喜剧，实验体008似乎对这一时期的电视节目和一般娱乐活动兴趣不大。
实验体似乎对那个时代音乐潮流的转变感到困惑，在许多录音中经常能听到他怀念50年代初的声音。实验体对80年代和90年代媒体的兴趣达到顶峰，但他大部分时间还是与同龄的朋友社交和在外面玩耍。

2057年 [14岁]
[姓名被删除]博士创造了[设备名被删除]思维转录器，该设备允许科学家随时查看实验体思想滚动的字幕条，就像电影的字幕一样。尽管这项技术存在缺陷，经常识别到错误的人，但这项现代科技的突破将通过长期使用实验体的数据来完善，并有多种用途，且全部属于绝密。它的存在从未向公众正式公布。
实验体依然偏爱80年代末和90年代初的娱乐方式。
实验体008似乎意识到自己与电视节目和电影有着某种联系，并开始质疑现实的边界。
在此期间，最终证明实验体008的思维模式与“罗德尼·虚空”的思维模式完全吻合，在许多电影中，可以看到并读到他实时引用自己历史中的经典台词。
实验体008开始区分哪些是自己的思想可以被他人读取，哪些不能，并经常辩论使用内心声音（容易被读取）是否是个好主意，或者这是否是听到声音和即将发疯的迹象，最终可能会导致被送进精神病院。这一想法和恐惧成为了实验体一年中经常出现的思维过程和担忧。
在这一年的某个时候，实验体008迷上了“都市斗殴者”系列漫画中的一个漫画角色。这个角色是一位金发、衣着暴露的[信息被删除]年轻女性，名叫萨伦娜。实验体花费了许多小时试图以某种方式与萨伦娜沟通，并似乎正在思考如何将她带入自己的现实世界。
实验体008对其他同龄女孩的反应也变得更加积极，之前他只对其他男孩感兴趣。
[姓名被删除]将军曾在一天实验体上学的路上尝试与他进行心灵感应接触，据报道成功了。该项目获得绿灯通行仅仅是为了让将军确认实验体的爱国立场，并确定他是否打算对当权者或公众构成威胁。据说将军对实验体不构成国家安全威胁感到满意。然后据说将军要求获得更多信息，并就某些军事战术向实验体提问。实验体详细描述了一种可能的假旗情景，即一个国家可以煽动人民进行不义之战，但他后来认为这种想法与自己的价值观太相悖，并指出受到不公正影响的公民最终会发现真相，并会寻求正义。尽管实验体提出抗议，但他的计划在2062年的[行动名被删除]中被付诸实施。

2058年 [15岁]
实验体008经常幻想自己学校里的几个女孩，以及他在网上遇到的一些女孩，数量还在不断增加。他偶尔会尝试在自己的房间里用心灵感应与她们交流。但所有这些尝试似乎都不成功，实验体似乎很难在思想之外向这些女孩表达自己的感受，这给他带来了很多沮丧和困惑。后来，实验体表示经常感觉女孩们在他的脑海中用“我不是那个人”或类似的话来回应他。

实验体在日常交往中表现正常，甚至在某些场合还表现得非常自信。那段时间，他参与了几次打架，都是与竞争对手同学之间的冲突。

实验体008似乎得出结论，虽然他不能与周围的人进行心灵交流，但他可以与一些观察他的人交流。

实验体似乎经历了一段时期，对许多观众进行精神上的抗议，无论是实时观察者还是未来观看录像的人。显然，实验体最近的几次行动都受到了严厉批评，甚至被少数宗教狂热者视为“反基督者”。当时，[信息被删除]中的大部分人都有宗教信仰，而实验体那些有争议的言论使他成为了知情者的首要目标。

当被读者提问时，实验体通过解释自己需要引发一种反应，而这种反应会催生他以后能读到的进一步反应（举了他和读者正在参与的对话为例），来解释自己大部分的行为，他会用这种方式挑起别人的这种状态，大多时候是通过运用他学来的喜剧技巧，但有时只是直言不讳地冒犯别人（这让许多实时和后来的目击者既觉得好笑又震惊）。

当时，实验体经常因为体重问题而受到嘲笑，他选择采取这样的立场：如果他自己不会觉得被冒犯，那么别人也不应该被他所说的话冒犯，即使他们并非他经历的嘲笑的直接对象。虽然他在这一方面的态度随着时间的推移有所改变，变得更加体谅个人情况，但在他已知的生活中，他始终彻底反对各种形式的有组织宗教。

有人提出理论，认为实验体并非具有超能力，而是发明了一种高级预测形式，可以在各种媒体和表演或欣赏这些媒体的人们的脑海中留下印记。没有人对如何留下这种印记有确切的理论，但一些人推测，这是由于对实验体008的思想进行观察并在实时中进行后续放大，导致无论他观看什么媒体，这种印记效果都非常明显。实验体在某种程度上已经意识到自己的能力，这似乎也增加了他的精神存在感。

在家人和朋友面前，实验体保持着一副相对正常的外表，似乎不想被认为精神失常，他把自己的能力理论藏在心里。大多数人甚至都没有注意到实验体身上有任何异常，因此，他们对此一无所知。

实验体008躺在床上思考时（周围没有媒体播放），他和许多人认为，自己与实验体25有了第一次遭遇。实验体008对所听到的内容感到视觉上的困扰，并首次向隐藏的摄像头和观众发出了困惑的爆发式演讲，针对任何在听的人。似乎他听到的声音正处于极度痛苦之中，并在某个未公开的事件后出于绝望而联系实验体。在提供了他能提供的少量支持后，实验体008开始对着摄像头咆哮，指责观察者是事件的罪魁祸首，他们知道这件事会发生，却让它发生了，就像其他所有事情一样。他坚持认为“这件事还没有发生”，并说“他们需要阻止它”。

在接下来的10多年里，即使被高级读者提示，实验体也没有再直接对摄像头或观察者发表讲话。直到多年后，他似乎重新经历了同样的遭遇，才再次提起与实验体25的这次遭遇。
