translation: 打赌你会这么说，土豆脑袋。我不是很喜欢那些罗科的机械怪物表演，所以我还是去原子牛仔看畸形秀吧。

original: I'd like you to take a break at the Lucky 38.
translation: 我想让你去幸运38休息一下。

original: I'm not your personal mother fucking pack mule.
translation: 我又不是你的私人驮货老妈子。

original: Damn your a funny guy... funny like a gunshot wound.
translation: 该死的你这个有趣的家伙...有趣的像枪伤。

original: Don't you have a real name?
Real name... I know I have one, it's an L word I think..., Lydia or Linda maybe... I can see the shape but I can't make out the details...
translation: 真名......我知道我有一个，我想是个以L开头的词......，莉迪亚或者琳达可能吧......我能看到轮廓，但看不清细节......

original: Too long ago, like a dream. It makes me too sad to remember.
translation: 太久远了，就像一场梦。想起来就让我难过。

original: They all call me 800. I'm a patient here.
translation: 他们叫我800。我是这儿的一个患者。

original: Why do they let you out?
They just let me wonder around. Don't know why, I think they find me boring... I don't really respond when they hurt me...
translation: 他们只是让我四处逛逛。不知道为什么，我认为他们觉得我很无聊......他们伤害我的时候，我根本没什么反应......

original: I always keep my mouth shut... someone else taught me that... can't remember who... maybe just the others...
translation: 我总是闭着嘴...是别人教我的...不记得是谁了...也许是其他人吧......

original: So they don't mind you then.
I don't think so, it's like I just don't matter to them, especially these days. They're much more concerned with your re-appearance.
translation: 不这么认为，就好像他们根本不在乎我，尤其是现在。他们更关心你的再现。

original: What else can you tell me about this place?
translation: 关于这个地方，你还能告诉我什么？

original: You are not alone in this quest, this place has been a resting place for demons for too long yet there is still some goodness here...
translation: 这个任务中，你不是一个人。虽然这儿已变为恶魔栖息之所太久了，但仍然有良知存在......

original: Some of the undead feel it is time for a regime change. I think they are using me as a conduit to help you... just voices... they guide me.
translation: 一些亡灵觉得是时候改朝换代了。我想是他们派我来帮助你的......只有声音......他们引导的我。

original: I just listen and I hear things... Those with the power to manifest have hidden supplies for you.
translation: 我只是听着，然后听到一些东西......那些有能力实现的人为你隐藏了补给。

original: Here, I have the key to one, I can tell you the way...
translation: 给，我有一把钥匙，我可以告诉你路怎么走......

original: Where did you get the key?
translation: 你从哪儿拿到这钥匙的？

original: The key... it was in my cell when I awoke...
translation: 这钥匙......我醒来的时候就在我牢房里......

original: ...I knew instinctively what it would be for. Knew it would be me they would come to when the time was right...
translation: ......我本能地知道它是用来干什么的。我知道，时机一到，他们就会来找我......

original: Any other stashes I should know about?
translation: 还有什么隐藏的物资我应该知道吗？

original: You should seek out the Washrooms in Cell Block A. You'll need to head up to the second floor to get there... Look behind the Cells.
translation: 你应该去找找A区牢房的洗手间。你需要到二楼才能到那里...看看牢房后面。

original: Look out for the solitary cubes at the end... I wish I could tell you about more but that's all I know...
translation: 留心那条路尽头单独的牢房......我希望我能告诉你更多信息，但我就知道这么多了......

original: I'm the only sane one left around here but it's up to you at the end of the day...
translation: 我是这里唯一还正常的人了，但说到底还是得看你......

original: I'm just a nobody, but at least I know some things, and I promise all I want is to help you get through this alive.
translation: 我只不过是个无名小卒，但至少我知道一些事情，我保证，我只想帮你活着度过这一切。

original: Is there anything else you can tell me about the patients?
translation: 你有别的什么能告诉我吗，有关这些患者的？

original: Yes. Whatever you do if you meet any other live patients make sure to kill them.
translation: 嗯。无论你打算做什么，当你碰到其他活着的患者，杀了他们。

original: This place used to house the most corrupt and depraved minds in the entire State...
translation: 这个地方曾经收容了整个州最腐败堕落的灵魂......

original: The Warden spends most of his time turning them all into sociopathic killing machines. I don't even know why I'm still alive...
translation: ＂典狱长＂化了毕生精力把他们改造为反社会的杀人机器。我都不知道我是怎么活下来的......

original: Even 697 is dead now and he was the last human left with any spark of humanity... He tore out his own eyes...
translation: 连697都死了，他是最后一个还保有人性火花的人......他自己挖出了双眼......

original: Is there any other important info you can tell me?
translation: 你有别的什么重要的消息能告诉我吗？

original: Before you leave you should know this, you will soon meet another lost soul who is not who she claims to be...
translation: 在你离开前，你应该知道，你很快就会遇到另一个迷失的灵魂，她并不是她自称的那个人......

original: The great deceiver who lives two lives... Do not trust her under any circumstances.
translation: 大骗子有两条命......无论如何，别信她。

original: She will say anything to gain your confidence, and if you help her the consequences will be devastating.
translation: 她会花言巧语来骗取你的信任，一旦你帮了她，结果是毁灭性的。

original: Time... Time and space... Some things are just meant to be... It's all just math in the end... that's what they tell me anyway...
translation: 时间......时间和空间......某些事，命中注定......这一切最终只是数字......无论如何，这是他们告诉我的......

original: ...even what she believes... whatever happens Vonda Brookes must not leave this building alive under any circumstances.
translation: ......甚至她相信......无论发生什么，沃达·布鲁克斯不许活着离开这里，无论如何。

original: Just remember that Vonda Brookes must die.
translation: 记住，沃达·布鲁克斯，必须死。

original: You met the Cook already. Besides him the others you really need to worry about are The Nurse, The Chief and The Warden.
translation: 你应该已经碰到过＂厨子＂了。除了他，你还该担心的是：＂护士＂、＂酋长＂和＂典狱长＂。

original: They are not like the other spirits and patients that dwell here... they are much stronger...
translation: 他们不像这里的其他亡灵和患者......他们更强大......

original: How do you know who I am?
We all know who you are 101. You don't know what you are about to do...and to be honest neither do I. You are a legend.
translation: 我们都知道你是谁，101小子。你不知道你将要做什么....说实话，我也不知道。你是个传奇。

original: The nightmare that haunts other nightmares. Many have seen you, some just briefly, others like myself have even spoken with you.
translation: 让噩梦萦绕的噩梦。很多人见过你，有些只是匆匆一瞥，有些像我一样，甚至和你交谈过。

original: I can't explain it exactly but time works differently in here, one second you are here, the next you are not...
translation: 我无法准确解释，这里的时间不一样，前一秒你还在这里，下一秒就不在了......

original: ...and yet some things seem to remain forever...
OK, where is this stash located?
It's in the entrance halls, upper floor in the old staff lockers. Take this key, it should unlock them for you.
translation: 它在入口大厅，上层的老员工储物柜里。拿着这把钥匙，它应该能帮你打开。

original: I'm an explorer - who are you?
Lieutenant Vonda Brookes of the USMC, state your business stranger. Are you working for that bastard Warden?
translation: 沃达·布鲁克斯中尉，美国海军陆战队，说出你的来头，陌生人。你是为那个杂种＂典狱长＂工作的么？

original: No I'm not a Guard, I don't work here...
translation: 不，我不是警卫，我不在这工作......

original: Good, I believe you. You sure don't look like one of the Guards and we can use all the help we can get right now.
translation: 好，我姑且相信你。你看起来不像这儿的警卫，我们现在必须用上所有能帮得上忙的力量。

original: The guards are dead and the exit is clear.
translation: 警卫都死了，出口已经被清理干净了。

original: That's great news - thank you so much, we would have all died in here without your help.
translation: 好消息!太谢谢你了，没你帮忙我们都会死在这里。

original: Will you be coming with us?
How did you end up here?
We came here with orders to free all the patients to help with the local clean up operation. I know what goes on in here...
translation: 我们奉命而来，释放所有患者来协助当地的清理作业。我知道接着该怎么做。

original: They'd have more chance out there with the rads than in here with the sadistic staff. The Warden wasn't having any of it though.
translation: 他们在外面的辐射下存活的机会，比留在这里受这些虐待狂员工的折磨要大。但典狱长却不肯。

original: As soon as we brought up the subject of freeing the patients he turned hostile. Ordered his guards to take our weapons...
translation: 我们一提释放患者的事，他就变得敌对起来。命令守卫收缴我们的武器......

original: I fired first and all hell broke loose. We got a few of them and then a few patents joined the fight.
translation: 我先开的枪，然后一切都乱套了。我们干掉了他们几个，然后又有几个患者加入了战斗。

original: I saw Aston and Don go down. Clintock was nowhere to be seen, so Hugo and I made a break for the nearest door.
translation: 我看见阿斯顿和唐倒下了。克林托克不见了，于是雨果和我朝最近的门跑去。

original: Hugo was hit bad but he still covered us whilst we ran in here.
translation: 雨果中弹严重，但他还是掩护我们跑了进来。

original: We have been preparing for a full assault for the last few minutes, then we heard the gunfire and you showed up.
translation: 我们已经打算最后一搏了，突然一阵枪声传来，你就出现了。

original: If you can clear the way I'm sure I can get these people out safely and bring back enough Soldiers to close this place down for good.
translation: 如果你能开道，我能确保这些人的安全，并带回足够多的士兵，一劳永逸地关闭这个地方。

original: Please kill those guards so I can get some of these patients out alive...
translation: 请杀了这些警卫，我好让这些患者活着出去......

original: I'm not sure that I can help, I have been told not to trust you.
translation: 我不确信我能帮上忙，我被告知不能相信你。

original: What do you mean? Who are you? How do you know who I am?
translation: 你什么意思？你是谁？你怎么知道我是谁的？

original: I'm from the future, I think, it's complicated...
translation: 我从未来而来，我想，一言难尽......

original: What? That's impossible, are you an inmate here or something? It doesn't matter, we don't have time for this. Will you help us or not?
translation: 什么？这......这不可能，你是这儿的囚徒，或者别的什么东西？无所谓，我们没时间考虑这个。你，帮不帮我们忙？

original: I'm sorry, I can't say anymore. There's nothing I can do to help you.
translation: 对不起，我不想多说了。我没什么忙可以帮的了。

original: Fine, fuck you then, I hope you rot in here.
translation: 好，操你......祝你和我们一样在这儿腐烂吧。

original: No, the risks are too great.
Fine, fuck you too. I hope you rot in here.
translation: 好，操你......祝你和我们一样在这儿腐烂吧。

original: That's great, I just need to get everyone ready. See you on the outside...
translation: 太好了，我只需要每个人准备就绪。外面见......

original: I have a feeling that's not gonna happen. I still have work to do here.
translation: 我觉得这不会发生。我在这里还有事要做。

original: Well OK... Take care, I hope our paths will cross again someday...
translation: 好吧......小心，希望我们的路有一天可以重汇......

original: More fucking intruders... how in the hell did you get in there? - Guards Attack!
translation: 又他妈是操蛋入侵者......你他妈怎么进来的？警卫们，给我上！

original: Yep, it's me. Probably not exactly how you remember but I can assure you I'm real, not some kind of ghost illusion.
translation: 是，就是我，可能不像你想象的那样，但我可以保证，我的的确确是真的，不是亡灵，不是幻象。

original: I have been preparing for this day for a very long time and I have learned a few tricks in the last two centuries.
translation: 我已经为这一天准备了太久了，在逝去的两个世纪里，我学会了不少东西。

original: I've been studying every document I could find on this place. 90% of it is just what they want you to see. It's the rest that's the problem.
translation: 我把这儿能找到的文件都研究了个遍。90%都是他们想让你知道的。对我来说，除了需要休息，其他都不是问题。

original: Why did you come here? What happened to you?
translation: 你为什么来到这？发生什么事了？

original: I came here to find you of course. Let me join you, finally put an end to this place.
translation: 我当然是为了来找你啦。让我加入你，彻底终结这个鬼地方。

original: Once that is done I'll tell you everything you want to know.
translation: 等一切都结束了，我会告诉你我知道的真相的。

original: Trust me, I can handle myself and I have killed enough Ghosts in this place to know what I am talking about.
translation: 相信我，我能保护好自己，我已经杀了不少这里的亡灵了，我知道我在说什么。

original: Do you know anything about what we will be up against?
translation: 你对我们要面对的敌人有什么了解吗？

original: Sure, from what I have seen you have taken care of three of our main targets already.
translation: 当然。据我所知你已经料理了我们主要目标中的三个了。

original: That just leaves the Warden, his patients and probably a few Ghosts.
translation: 只剩下＂典狱长＂、他的患者，和一些亡灵。
告诉我有关＂典狱长＂的事。

original: Well, if you hadn't guessed already, the Warden is still alive. Or undead at least. He'll be in his main office.
translation: 哦，如果你没猜错的话，＂典狱长＂还活着，或者至少说，他还没死透。。他应该在他的办公室。

original: You have to go through Cell Block B to access it. I've only ever seen that place on blueprints.
translation: 你得穿过B区牢房才能到那里。我只在蓝图上见过那个地方。

original: As for his potential power I have no idea but I'll tell you one thing I always believed in...
translation: 至于他可能有什么能力，我就不知道了。但有一件事我一直坚信......

original: That's to be as depraved and cruel as that man you would have to be downright ignorant too...
translation: 像他那样卑鄙残忍的人，肯定也无知到了极点......

original: ...which means he's most likely over-confident and under prepared.
translation: .....也就是说，他很可能过于自信，却准备不足。

original: That being said I'm sure he'll throw everything he has at us once we enter Cell Block B. That's where he keeps his 'Fixed' patients.
translation: 话虽如此，我敢肯定，一旦我们进入B区牢房，他就会倾尽所有来对付我们。他把他的“改造过的患者＂都关在那里。

original: Those left in B Block are most likely just a horde of lobotomized freaks mixed with a smattering of sadists.
translation: 那些被落在B区的很可能只是一群被切除了脑叶的怪胎，夹杂着一些虐待狂。

original: The weak do not last long in this place though, so don't underestimate them.
translation: 战斗力低下的家伙在那里活不长，因此不要低估他们。

original: Use fire wherever possible, even acid if you have any. They can't phase out of it properly and it puts them down fast.
translation: 有火就用火，有酸就用酸。他们受不了这些，这些玩意能很快把他们撂倒。

original: Energy weapons are OK, they have good sustained penetration and slow projectiles.
translation: 能量武器也不错，它们穿透力强，射速低。

original: Bullets are damn near useless unless you have some serious firepower. They just pass straight through for the most part.
translation: 实弹几乎无效，除非你的火力足够强。它们多半会直接穿过。

original: Looks like he finally got what was coming to him.
translation: 看来他终于得到了应有的下场。

original: You've got that right. I think this nightmare is finally over. This place will not be claiming any more lives.
translation: 你说得对。我想这场噩梦终于结束了。这个地方不会再夺走更多人的性命了。

original: Hey... I've been thinking and now that we have the time I have something I should tell you.
translation: 嘿...我一直在想，现在我们有时间了，我有些事得告诉你。

original: What did you wish to talk about?
I do have something to confess... I'm not actually a Ghoul. This is just a mask I wear.
translation: 我有件事得坦白...我其实不是尸鬼。这只是我戴的面具。

original: I wear it for two reasons. First I like the places it gets me access to.
translation: 因为两个原因，我戴着它。首先，我戴着它，能去很多地方。

original: Not a lot of people wanna bother you when you look like this. There's anonymity and peace of mind in that.
translation: 当你长这样的时候，没多少人会愿意来打扰你。这里有匿名的好处，也让我心安。

original: Second, I don't like it when people around me start asking questions I'm not comfortable giving them the answers to...
translation: 其次，我不喜欢人们围着我，逼问一些我不想回答的问题......

original: How have you have not aged in 200 years?
I knew you'd wanna know, I can see it in your face, maybe you even figured it all out already.
translation: 我就知道你想知道，我看得出来，也许你甚至已经都猜出来了。

original: Better to admit the truth now regardless. To cut a long story short I made myself like them, only not like them.
translation: 不管怎样，现在最好还是承认真相吧。长话短说，我让自己变得像他们一样，但又不完全一样。

original: Tell me, what's happened since we first met?
translation: 告诉我，从我们第一次见面到现在，都发生了什么？

original: Lots of things. The short version is, the higher-ups were not interested in the threat posed by the 'minor peasant revolt' at the Asylum.
translation: 很多事情。简单来说，上层领导对疯人院里“小小暴乱”的威胁不感兴趣。

original: Soon after, radioactive winds lead to DC becoming temporarily uninhabitable and all healthy troops were moved inland.
translation: 不久之后，放射性风暴导致华盛顿特区暂时无法居住，所有健康的部队都被转移到了内陆。

original: I was ordered to leave for Charleston, but I used my authority to steal a bunch of anti-rad gear and hid out near Winchester.
translation: 我奉命前往查尔斯顿，但我利用职权偷了一批防辐射装备，在温彻斯特附近躲了起来。

original: The Military was so unorganized back then I knew I could do more good out there on my own anyway.
translation: 当时的军队毫无组织可言，我知道自己在那里能发挥更大的作用

original: ... and that I would doubtlessly end up just another MIA statistic.
translation: ......而且，我毫无疑问会成为另一个失踪人口。

original: A few months later exploring DC was easy enough when the skies were clearer, and using the right equipment.
translation: 几个月后，当天空更加晴朗，使用合适的装备，探索华盛顿特区就足够容易了。

original: The streets were much quieter by then. Everyone was in hiding or trying to avoid the heavily irradiated spots.
translation: 那时的街道安静多了。大家都在躲藏，或者尽量避开辐射严重的地方。

original: That was when I discovered the Capitol Building and the handful of scientists and soldiers who had remained there.
translation: 就在这时，我发现了国会大厦，以及留在那里的少数科学家和士兵。

original: I persuaded them to help me bring an end to the Asylum and free the inmates, foolish as that was with such a small force.
translation: 我说服他们帮我结束疯人院的暴乱，释放里面的囚犯，尽管以我们这么小的力量这么做很愚蠢。

original: We were totally unprepared for the Warden's traps and seemingly invulnerable Security Force. We were forced to retreat.
translation: 我们对＂典狱长＂的陷阱和几乎无懈可击的警卫毫无防备，不得不撤退。

original: Somehow the others still had faith in me and we planned a trap for the security guard who patrolled the exterior.
translation: 不知怎的，其他人还是相信我，我们计划伏击在外巡逻的安保人员。

original: We captured him and made a drug out of him that made me near indestructible...
translation: 我们抓住了他，并用他制作了一种药物，让我变得几乎坚不可摧......

original: ...just in time to watch everything get destroyed by The Master's brain dead slaves...
translation: ......可却正好赶上目睹一切被主教那些脑死亡的奴隶摧毁......

original: He was the guy behind the whole Super Mutant craze. He's long dead so I heard. Good riddance.
translation: 他是整个超级变种人狂热背后的家伙。我听说他早就死了。真是谢天谢地。

original: As for his Army, what's left of 'em live out West for the most part and they're not so bad these days...
translation: 至于他的军队，剩下的人大多生活在西边，而且如今他们也没那么坏了....

original: ...it's the local types you should worry about. Dumber than a wooden kettle the lot.
translation: ......你该担心那些本地品种......蠢得像木水桶。

original: Most of them don't even know why they are fighting, they just hate us non-Super Mutants. They don't seem to need any more than that.
translation: 他们中的大部分甚至不知道他们打的是谁。他们对一切非超级变种人都十分憎恨，其他都无关紧要了。

original: What happened when you attacked the Asylum?
translation: 在你袭击疯人院之后发生了什么事？

original: The first time was the worst. We lost so many. 2079. They were ready for us.
translation: 第一次情况最糟。那是在2079年，我们损失惨重。他们以逸待劳。

original: Two of the guards in particular, I think one was the Chief, an ugly son of a bitch, were just tearing through our ranks.
translation: 其中两个警卫是特殊的，我猜想其中一个就是＂酋长＂,一个丑陋的、狗娘养的，把我们队伍撕碎了。

original: Nothing could stop them so we had to flee. Capturing a lone guard and synthesizing the immortality drug was our first and last break...
translation: 他们无人能挡，我们只能四散而逃。抓住一个落单的警卫，合成那种不朽药，成了我们最后的指望......

original: The Super Mutant attack on our HQ saw to that...
translation: 超级变种人袭击了我们的总部，一切都毁了......

original: I managed to literally carry a medic named Riley made out of the rubble, everyone else was killed.
translation: 我从废墟中救出了一个名叫赖利的医生，其他人都死了。

original: Riley was never a combatant and I was in no hurry to get anyone else killed in my own efforts to close Friendship Asylum.
translation: 赖利不是一个战斗人员，我也不想在攻陷友谊疯人院的过程中再让其他人牺牲。

original: I spent many years trying to help out the DC locals whilst trying to maintain a low profile.
translation: 我一边尽量保持低调，一边帮助华盛顿特区的当地人。

original: I lived in Underworld for most of that time where a traveller named Miller created that mask for me to wear.
translation: 大部分时间，我住在地下城，在那里，一个叫米勒的旅行者帮我做了这个面具。

original: For some reason that mask gave me the confidence to bring myself to try and tackle the asylum single handed. In 2097 I went back.
translation: 不知为什么，那个面具给了我独自对抗疯人院的信心。2097年，我回来了。

original: I did pretty well too. Had a Minigun custom-built for the job. .308 caliber. Near useless in the long run.
translation: 我准备得相当好。为这我定制了一把多管机枪.......308口径终究杯水车薪啊。

original: Still dropped a few but I found fire did the trick much better so I set about making a bunch of Molotovs.
translation: 虽然还是干掉了几个，但我发现火的效果更好，所以我开始制作一堆燃烧瓶。

original: That's when The Chief showed up with his goons and showed me that I'm not as invulnerable as I thought.
translation: 就在那时＂酋长＂带着他的爪牙出现了,他让我明白，我并不是自己想的那样坚不可摧。

original: I don't know what they were firing at me - some kind of blue ray but it scrambled my brain and hurt like hell.
translation: 我不知道他们朝我开了什么--一种蓝色的射线，但它让我的大脑一团糟，疼痛难忍。

original: I thought I was gonna die so I ran...
translation: 我想，我就要死了，我拼命地跑......

original: You said you can hear voices?
Yeah, it all started when I moved out to Winchester in 2100. I took one of my parent's old data backups with me and studied everything I could.
translation: 是的，这一切都要从2100年我搬到温彻斯特说起。我带上了父母的一个旧数据备份，尽我所能地学习了里面的所有内容。

original: During those years I got to know my own thought processes and 'inner voice' pretty well.
translation: 那些年里，我很好地了解了我自己的思维过程和＂内心的声音＂。

original: Occasionally though, abstract or unpredictable thoughts would randomly manifest in my subconscious.
translation: 不过，有时一些抽象或不可预测的想法会随机出现在我的潜意识中。

original: Having a keen interest in Psychology I started to analyze them to try and find out what could trigger such an event.
translation: 由于我对心理学有着浓厚的兴趣，我开始分析它们，试图找出是什么触发了这样的事件。

original: I found these triggers were coming mostly from other people and varied from person to person.
translation: 我发现这些触发因素大多来自其他人，而且因人而异。

original: In the middle of nowhere for many years you just know when someone else is in your area. It's instinctive.
translation: 在荒郊野外生活了很多年，你总能感觉到别人进入了你的领地。这是一种本能。

original: Many times I found this to be the case so I tried to figure out how and why and I came to the conclusion that it's all cause and effect.
translation: 很多次我都发现了这一点，所以我试图找出原因和方法,我得出了结论

original: Every action has an equal and opposite reaction. With this as a framework the other pieces started to fall into place.
translation: 每个行为都有一个相等且相反的反应。以此为框架，其他的事情开始逐渐明朗。

original: If a person was thinking about, for example stabbing me I could hear that and distinguish it from my own thoughts and the general static of life.
translation: 如果一个人在想，比如说要捅我一刀，我能听到这个想法，并能把它和我自己的想法以及生活的常规杂音区分开来。

original: I then have a choice of three obvious reactions...
translation: 然后我有三种明显的反应可以选择......

original: First I can ignore it and put it down to my subconscious playing tricks on me or something I saw on an old vid rip.
translation: 第一，我可以忽略它，认为是我的潜意识在捉弄我，或者是我从某个旧视频片段里看到的。

original: Second I can fear it and let that threat dominate my mind...
translation: 第二，我可以感到害怕，并让这种威胁占据我的脑海......

original: ...or thirdly I can think about intercepting their attack, taking their knife off them and ramming it in their eye socket.
translation: ......或者第三，我可以考虑拦截他们的攻击，夺下他们的刀，然后把它插进他们的眼眶。

original: A message many potentially hostile humans and even animals seem to be able to understand.
translation: 这是许多潜在的好斗的人类，甚至是动物似乎都能理解的信息。

original: As a result I rarely get in an unnecessary fight these days... at least a fight that I didn't start.
translation: 因此，我现在很少参与不必要的战斗...至少不会参与那些不是我挑起的战斗。

original: Does this mean you can read my mind?
translation: 这意味着，你能读我的心？

original: I wish I could but you are a mystery to me. Your mind is in a state of legion... so many voices, so many opinions...
translation: 我希望我能，但你对我来说是个谜。你的思想有如在千军万马之中......如此多声音，如此多观点......

original: Like a spectrum of thought in a single mind. I could read your thoughts but to do so would take an event, something shocking and unpredictable...
translation: 就像一个人的思想光谱。我可以读懂你的想法，但要做到这一点需要发生一些事，一些令人震惊且不可预测的事情......

original: When we enter these situations your thought streams become intertwined and many strands sing out as one above the others.
translation: 当我进入你思想的世界，流淌的思绪突然变得错综复杂，思维之线一个接一个地引吭高歌。

original: Then and only then do I get a brief glimpse into your consciousness.
translation: 也只有在那时，我才能短暂地窥探到你的意识。

original: So these voices are a bit innacurate then?
translation: 然后？那些声音就变得不太精确了么？

original: Well, it's not perfect. Trust me, you can't arrange to meet someone at a specific time in your head. It just does not work.
translation: 嗯，它并不完美。相信我，你不能在脑海里安排和别人在某个具体时间见面。这根本行不通。

original: If my own mind is preoccupied then the thoughts of others are shoved aside... Makes sense that that would work both ways.
translation: 如果我的心思被别的事情占据了，那么别人的想法就会被推到一边.....这在两方面都讲得通。

original: Sometimes people can be preoccupied with a single thought for weeks and not allow themselves to hear the voices waiting for them...
translation: 有时人们会被一个念头困扰数周，不允许自己听到那些等待他们的声音......

original: ...until they are ready to accept the information. That could even be as long as several years after the initial thought was made.
translation: ......直到他们准备好接受这些信息。这甚至可能在最初的想法产生后的几年才发生。

original: Of course few people are even aware of this and most of it will go on in their subconscious.
translation: 当然，很少有人意识到这一点，而且大部分都会在他们的潜意识中继续。

original: Even then due to frequency only the most important messages will be received.
translation: 即使如此，由于频率的原因，只有最重要的信息才会被接收到。

original: Not that all these thoughts are directly from or to other people. I like to think of some as future echos...
translation: 并不是说所有这些想法都直接来自或指向其他人。我喜欢把其中的一些想成是未来的回声.....

original: Sounds like all that time on your own drove you mad.
translation: 听起来长时间的独处已经把你逼疯了。

original: I dunno, maybe. I don't care if it did. My mind is clearer now than it has ever been.
translation: 我不知道，可能吧。我不在乎有没有疯。现在我的头脑比以往任何时候都清醒。

original: Anything else you want to tell me about our reality?
translation: 关于我们的现实，你还有什么想告诉我的吗？

original: Well, it's all just a theory. It's not like there's any books out there on this shit and they sure didn't teach it where I grew up.
translation: 嗯，这都只是理论。又不是外面有书讲这些，我长大的地方也肯定没教过这些。

original: I'm just trying to do the best with what I have, and it's worked for me so far.
translation: 我只是尽力而为，而且到目前为止，这对我还挺管用的。

original: Seriously, I'd like to hear more.
translation: 说真的，我很想听听更多。

original: Oh, well, OK. I did read somewhere that thoughts can manifest as reality with enough belief. Just some banned pre-war science journal.
translation: 哦，好吧。我确实在某处读到过，只要有足够的信念，想法就能化为现实。可能是在一些被禁止的战前科学期刊上。

original: This to me can be partially explained with the 'Future Echos' concept but I think it goes further.
translation: 对我来说，这可以部分解释＂未来的回声＂这一概念，不过我认为这一理论可以更进一步。

original: Let's say that you can control your own reality with your own mind, if that is the case so can the people next door. And their kids...
translation: 比如说，如果你能用自己的思维控制自己的现实，那么隔壁的人也可以。还有他们的孩子....

original: ...maybe their dog. Who knows. Whatever they are not gonna be thinking the same things as you.
translation: ......甚至他们的狗。谁知道呢，无论他们是不是在考虑和你一样的问题。

original: They may even expect things to happen to you that you had never dreamed of...
translation: 他们甚至能预料到将要在你身上发生的事，那些你做梦也想不到的......

original: If that happens then that could potentially occur instead of whatever you had in mind.
translation: 如果发生了，那可能会取代你的想法成为现实。

original: It's all a matter of percentages and statistics. Plus I guess an individual's Willpower and Intelligence factor in pretty highly.
translation: 这就完全是个概率与统计的问题了。另外，我猜个人的意志力和智力因素也占了很大比重。

original: If this is all true then what it boils down to is that we are all fundamentally connected like a single organism...
translation: 如果这一切都是真的，这就可以归结为：我们，每个人，其实根本上是同一个、互相连接起来的有机体......

original: ...a single energy splintered into a spectrum of unique though not unlimited personality arrangements.
translation: ......一个单一的能量，被分裂成一系列独特但并非无限的个性排列。

original: We are mathematically as predictable as the solar system that surrounds us or the animals we slaughter...
translation: 我们在数学上是可预测的，就像我们周围的恒星系统一样，就像我们屠宰的动物一样......

original: To harm our fellow humans is to harm ourselves in the long run... That is the irony that the old Governments were blind to...
translation: 互相屠戮，长远来看，其实就是在屠戮我们自己......这是如此讽刺，我们的旧政府所做的......
告诉我更多有关赖利的事。

original: He was a great guy. He stuck with me until he died in '91 from Radiation Poisoning.
translation: 他是个很棒的人。他一直陪着我，直到91年因辐射中毒去世。

original: We were holed up in the old History Museum for the most part.
translation: 我们大部分时间都躲在旧历史博物馆里。

original: My parents used to take me there as a kid so I knew the place well and being half radiation-free it seemed like as good a place as any to hide out.
translation: 我小时候父母经常带我去那里，所以我对那里很熟悉，而且那里有一半区域没有辐射，似乎是个不错的藏身之处。

original: At least until the local Mutant rampage was over...
translation: 至少在当地的变种人狂暴之前......

original: With a bit of hard work and a few hand-snapped Mutant Spines they got the message the area was off limits.
translation: 我们费了点功夫，折断了几根变种人的脊椎，才让它们明白这个区域是禁地。

original: Pretty soon after the mutants left, the humans began to turn up with various states of radiation poisoning...
translation: 在这些变种人离开后不久，各种受到不同程度辐射毒害的人们开始慢慢出现......

original: ...some were even well on the way to becoming Ghouls.
translation: ......有些人甚至快要变成尸鬼了。

original: Riley set about studying the condition and attempting to find a cure. That place went on to become Underworld, a refuge for ghouls.
translation: 赖利着手研究他们的状况，尝试找到一种治疗手段。这儿慢慢变成了地下城，成了尸鬼的避难所。

original: I still remember his optimism. Always looking for the quick solution to all the world's problems...
translation: 我仍然记得他乐天的个性。他总是想快速解决世界上所有的问题

original: Convinced it was all possible if he just tried hard enough or had enough time...
translation: 相信一切皆有可能，只要付出了足够多的努力，还有足够多的时间......

original: I guess I found that inspiring and I loved him for it.
translation: 我想，这让我感到很鼓舞，我也因此爱他。

original: He only ever admitted his feelings for me when he was dying. I felt like I had known all the time.
translation: 直到垂死之时，他才承认对我的感情。我想说，我早就知道了。

original: I felt so guilty for a long time after that but deep down I know that's not what he would have wanted for me.
translation: 此后我内疚了很久，但实际上我知道，这不是他所希望的。

original: Sure, I know loads of Recipes. Let me know which you would like me to make.
translation: 当然，我知道很多菜谱。告诉我你想让我做哪个。

original: Take this recipe list so you know what ingredients to look out for.
translation: 拿着这个菜谱列表，这样你就知道要准备哪些食材了。

original: Of course, what would you like?
Can't, we don't have all the ingredients...
translation: 不好意思，我们的食材不足......

original: We don't have all the stuff we need.

translation: 对不起，我们没有多余的材料......
哦不，我们可不是什么都有。

original: OK, speak to you again soon...
Sure, glad to have some backup in this place.
translation: 当然，很高兴能在这儿得到补给。

original: Great, lets go get that bastard Warden.
translation: 好极了，让我们去会会那个狗杂种＂典狱长＂。

original: No, you should not join me, I think I should do this alone.
translation: 不，你不用加入我，我觉得我可以自己来。

original: Sorry, not an option. I'm here now and I've waited nearly two centuries for this day. You'll have to kill me to stop me and that's not easy.
translation: 对不起，这不在我的选项里。我已经在这儿了，我已经为这一天等待了整整两个世纪了。你除非杀了我才能阻止我，这可不容易哦。

original: Well it looks like we are in this together then.
translation: 看来我们得一起行动了。

original: Great, lets go get that bastard Warden.
translation: 好极了，让我们去会会那个狗杂种＂典狱长＂。

original: So you do have a sense of humor.
translation: 看来你还是挺有幽默感的。
好的，我会守护当前区域。

original: I'll be here until you return.
translation: 我会待在这儿等你回来。

original: How did you do manage to harness their powers?
translation: 你是怎样驾驭这种力量的？

original: That's a long story... a lot of my stories are... but I'll tell them if you like.
translation: 这说来话长......一连串我的故事......如果你想听，我可以讲给你听。

original: To capture the Ghosts power we had to capture one of them alive. To do that I had to create a trap.
translation: 为了获得亡灵的力量，我们必须活捉一只。为此，我得设个陷阱。

original: Many years ago there was a particularly unpleasant and thuggish Security Guard who on occasion would venture outside the building...
translation: 很多年前，有个特别令人恶心的、残暴的警卫，偶尔会跑到大楼外面......

original: ...seemingly to look for fresh victims, maybe supplies...
translation: ......看起来像是在找新猎物，也许是找补给......

original: A few of us had the area under observation and got to know his routines, cautious as he was, he was still very predictable.
translation: 我们几个一直观察着那片区域，摸透了他的行动规律，他虽然谨慎，但还是很有规律可循

original: ...almost hugging the building at all times for sustenance it seemed.
translation: ......似乎总是紧贴着大楼找吃的。

original: I hand rigged an electrical stun trap with about two dozen cattle prods and lay in wait. Worked like a charm.
translation: 我用手工做了一个电击陷阱，大约有二十多个电棒，然后埋伏起来。效果出奇的好。

original: Knocked the big fucker straight out. From there we dragged him back to our HQ, periodically stunning him again along the way.
translation: 一下子就把那大傻逼电晕了。之后我们就把他拖回总部，路上还不时地电他一下。

original: He deteriorated pretty fast once we had him back but we got all the data we needed into the terminals.
translation: 一把他带回去，他很快就变质了，不过我们在这之前获得了所需的全部数据，输入了终端。

original: Enough to synthesize a drug capable of mutating the user in a similar manner without the side effects. Basically immortality in a drug.
translation: 这些数据足够我们合成一种药物，能够让使用者以类似的方式发生变异，而且没有副作用。基本上就是能让人长生不老的药。

original: I was the first test subject. Before we had chance to verify the results we were assaulted by Super Mutants.
translation: 我是第一个尝试的人。我们还没来得及验证结果，我们突然被超级变种人袭击了。

original: Only two of us got out alive...
translation: 最后只有我们两个人活着逃了出来......

original: That's all ancient history now but if you ever want to know more just let me know.
translation: 那都是陈年旧事了，但如果你想知道更多，随时告诉我。

original: Through it all I know the Capitol Research Office is still standing. Here's a master key and the location...
translation: 不管怎样，我知道国会大厦研究办公室还在。这是万能钥匙和地点

original: I go there to hassle the muties occasionally but not enough to endanger the other locals.
translation: 我偶尔会去那里找变种人的麻烦，但不会危及到其他当地人。

original: Tell me what it was like before the Nukes.
translation: 告诉我核爆前是什么样。

original: Life was getting pretty unbearable even before the war. Corporations were buying up all independent organizations...
translation: 战争爆发前，生活就已经变得难以忍受了。大公司收购所有独立组织....

original: ...the Government was trying to force everyone to think the same which even from a Military perspective is tactically unsound.
translation: ......政府试图强迫所有人思想统一，就算从军事角度来看，这也是战术上的失策。

original: Working for the Military I was privy to certain information.
translation: 我在军方工作，了解一些内幕。

original: The government was keeping the population under control by drugging the water supplies.
translation: 政府通过在水源中下药来控制民众。

original: It made people more relaxed but prone to violence, like they could no longer tell what was reasonable.
translation: 这让人们缓解了紧张情绪，但助长了人们的暴力倾向，他们不再能做出是非判断了。

original: When Bola-Cola was brought out around 2067 Nuka Cola became the sole supplier of bottled drinks to three quarters of US States...
translation: 当2067年前后波拉可乐正式退出的时候，核子可乐就成了美国四分之三州唯一的瓶装饮料供应商...

original: ...there was no alternative bottled liquid supplier for the whole East Coast.
translation: ......在整个东海岸，没有其他的瓶装液体饮料替代品。

original: The only way to get un-drugged liquid was direct from source or to use a ridiculously expensive filter.
translation: 要想喝到没下药的水，只能直接从源头获取，或者使用贵得离谱的过滤器。

original: Just for telling you about this shit before the war I would have been Court-Martialed.
translation: 要是在战前告诉你这些该死的屁事，我就该被送上军事法庭了。

original: We were running low on fossil fuels for as long as I have been alive and the Resource War was declared the same year I was born.
translation: 在我记事起，化石燃料就快要耗尽了，资源战争在我出生的那一年爆发。

original: My parents told me they had seen this a dozen times already, 'the war on terror', 'the war on drugs', 'the war on sex', 'the war on speech' etc.
translation: 我父母告诉我，他们已经见怪不怪了，“反恐战争”，“禁毒战争”，“性解放战争”，“言论自由战争”等等......

original: ...only this time it was different. Much worse than ever before.
translation: ......但这次不一样。比以前任何时候都要糟糕。

original: I was too young to remember any of that but, my parents were keen historians and kept extensive audio and video logs.
translation: 我当时太小，什么都不记得，但我父母是热衷于历史的人，他们保存了大量的音频和视频日志。

original: Israel was nuked in a terrorist attack '53 and from then on everything went insane with conflicts raging everywhere.
translation: 1953年，以色列在恐怖袭击中遭到了核打击，从此一切都陷入了疯狂，冲突四处爆发。

original: Countries were battling it out for each other's empty oil reserves.
translation: 各国为了争夺彼此已经枯竭的石油储备而战。

original: In 2066 the Chinese invaded Alaska for their last spit of oil.
translation: 2066年，中国人为了最后一点石油入侵了阿拉斯加。

original: The lack of resources made the wars progress at a snail's pace, many battles being fought solely by infantry, usually entrenched.
translation: 资源的匮乏令战事进展缓慢，很多进行中的战役只是步兵团间的对抗，常常是战壕战。

original: Then just as everything reached a breaking point, bam, Fission power.
translation: 然后，就在一切都达到临界点的时候，砰，裂变能源出现了。

original: The US had already made too many enemies globally. Fission Battery generators were being created faster than food supplies.
translation: 美国在全球已经树敌太多。裂变电池发电机的制造速度比粮食供应还要快。

original: We developed Power Armor which began to win the ground war for us but that was probably the catalyst that sent the nukes flying.
translation: 我们研制出了动力装甲，开始在地面战争中获胜，但这只是让战争推向核深渊的催化剂。

original: When the bombs were launched it was all over real quick. I got to hide it out in a Military Vault on the outskirts of Richmond.
translation: 当炸弹投下时，一切都结束了。我躲在里士满郊外的一个军军方避难所里。

original: Towards the end joining the War effort was the only way to go unless you were rich or specially trained somehow.
translation: 到最后，除非你够有钱或者接受过特殊训练，否则参加战争是唯一的出路。

original: Civilian rights were so limited that most people, including myself, felt they had no choice but to join the Army.
translation: 大部分的公民权利被限制了，包括我在内的大多数人都觉得除了参军别无选择

original: I joined early and moved up the ranks fast.
translation: 我很早就参军了，并且晋升神速。

original: What happened to the people who did not want to fight?
translation: 那些不想参与战争的人怎么办呢？

original: Propaganda efforts at the time meant just being a non-combatant came at a huge social cost.
translation: 当时的宣传手段意味着，即使是不参战也会付出巨大的社会代价。

original: The government was even arresting or eliminating those who spoke out against them, even just in private.
translation: 政府甚至逮捕或消灭那些公开反对他们的人，即使是在私下里。

original: There was a rumor that half the country was employed to spy on the other half but that's bullshit.
translation: 有传言说，国家有一半的人都在监视另一半，但那都是胡说八道。

original: Just utter a keyword and a computer terminal underground somewhere would start recording everything you say.
translation: 只要你说出一个关键词，某个地方的地下计算机终端就会开始记录你说的每一句话。

original: Many people who spoke out against the war ended up being classified as TMIs or 'Terminally Mentally Ill' patients.
translation: 许多公开反对战争的人最终被归类为TMIs，即“末期精神病患者”。

original: The Friendship Hospice was created specifically to house TMIs.
translation: 友谊疯人院就是专门为这些TMIs设立的。

original: I have always wanted to shut that hellhole down. I'm glad we finally got it done...
translation: 我一直想关掉那个地狱般的地方。我很高兴我们终于做到了......

original: ...I finally feel free of all that shit and I can't tell you how good that feels.
translation: ......我终于摆脱了那些垃圾，那种感觉真是无法形容。

original: Did you ever try to attack the Asylum again?
translation: 你试着再去攻击过疯人院么？

original: It was approaching the time I planned on attempting another breach, when it dawned on me that it was never gonna work until you showed up.
translation: 我本来打算再次尝试闯入，但突然意识到，除非你出现，否则这一切都不会成功。

original: ...That even if I did fix things, it could result in you not being there to help us in the past... For a long time I felt torn.
translation: ......即使我真的解决了问题，也可能导致你无法在过去帮助我们，无法在过去帮助我们......我很长时间都感到很纠结。

original: I was unable to deal with the feelings of shame in the company of others, so I moved to an abandoned farm on the outskirts of Winchester.
translation: 我无法在别人面前面对自己的羞愧感，所以我搬到了温彻斯特郊外的一个废弃农场。

original: After many years of study I realized my best option was to find you, and in 2130 I set up observation posts all around Friendship.
translation: 经过了多年的研究，我领悟到，我最好的选项是：找到你。2130年，我在友谊高地周围建立起了观察哨。

original: For years I waited. The terminals picked up many wanderers in Vault suits but no 101s...
translation: 我等了很多年。终端接收到了很多穿着避难所制服的流浪者信号，但就是没有101的信号......

original: You showed up in the end and here we are. It's a hell of a relief to me I hafta say.
translation: 但最终，你出现了，我们做到了。这对我来说真是如释重负。

original: I guess after a while I even started to question my own sanity. I've been hearing voices for years now...
translation: 我猜再过一会我甚至就要怀疑自己是否清醒了。这几年来，我一直听到有声音在说话......

original: Have you ever performed a test to see if the voices are real?
translation: 你做过测试么，证明这些声音是真实的？

original: Not in a controlled environment no... However I have had many opportunities to test the theory and in extreme situations it works.
translation: 没有在受控环境下试过...不过我有很多次机会验证这个理论，在极端情况下，它是有效的。

original: On the other hand if a person does not know themselves well enough or is not honest with themselves then the process is near pointless.
translation: 另一方面，如果一个人不够了解自己，或者对自己不够诚实，那么这个过程就几乎没什么意义。

original: Plus if a person speaks in a different language to you, you can only read their emotions and visual memories I guess. Still not sure on that one..
translation: 加上假如一个人操着一种截然不同的语言，我猜你只能读懂他的情感和视觉记忆。这点我还不太确定......

original: I often wonder if the mass brainwashing of society before the war was as much to keep psychic connections out of the public's interest...
translation: 我常常困惑：是否这种战前的对全社会的洗脑，也出于同样的目的，也就是与公众的喜好保持精神联系......

original: ...as it was to promote the war effort.
It sure seems that way but that would inherently make the Governments of the time much smarter than they appear...
translation: 这似乎就是这样，但这同样意味着政府要比它看起来的聪明得多......

original: ...which in turn makes their behaviour all the more ridiculous so it's hard to tell.
translation: ......这反而让他们的行为更加荒谬，所以很难说清楚。

original: Visions of things we are destined to do at a certain point in time.
translation: 一种幻象，在一个注定的时间，注定的地点，我们注定要去做的事。

original: Desires or fears..., the things that matter most to us are hard coded into our minds seemingly from birth.
translation: 欲望或恐惧......那些对我们至关紧要的事似乎从出生起就在我们脑海里编码。

original: We seek out or destinies unintentionally. To realize this is to be able to use it to your advantage.
translation: 我们搜寻，或者无意中决定命运。能意识到这一点就可以将其变为你的优势。

original: So you are saying these voices could theoretically help me?
translation: 按你的意思，这些声音能在理论上帮助我？

original: That's not exactly what I meant but as a general guideline that would make sense...
translation: 我是说，不全是，不过不过作为一般的指南，这可以说得通......

original: As long as you are not afraid of what they have to say.
translation: 只要你不害怕那些它们不得不说的真相。

original: Once you understand how it is done you will start to see the barriers in your own life that prevent it, should there be any...
translation: 一旦你明白了它的原理，你就可以开始看见你生命中的樊篱，然后跨越它们，如果有的话......

original: Awareness is the first step. You have to be able to be completely honest with yourself and others on a mental level.
translation: 意识是第一步。你必须完完全全地对你自己、对他人诚实，即便在精神层面上。

original: To do that you often must confront your own demons and justify your own actions to yourself...
translation: 要做到这一点，你必须面对你自己的心魔，为你自己的所作所为辩护......

original: You must find enough forgiveness or guilt to be able to view your life objectionably from other people's perspectives.
translation: 你必须有足够的宽宥，怜悯，能在他人的注视下客观地剖析自己。

original: Some people for obvious reasons are unprepared to go through with this for fear of the consequences of dwelling on their actions.
translation: 一些人因为显而易见的原因：害怕去回忆、复述自己的所为，尚未准备好去承受这一切。

original: People like this often choose to live their lives in a web of lies blocking out the unwanted voices with alcohol or projected abuse.
translation: 那些人们选择生活在自己的谎言编织的网中，封闭掉那些不想听见的声音，酗酒上瘾。

original: I know who I'd rather be is all...
So you don't really have any proof that you are psychic?
translation: 因此你没有任何证据证明你自己是个通灵者？

original: Yeah, well, I'm pretty sure that's all true, only maybe I'm just a mutant who's just, like, got really good at predicting things.
translation: 嗯，没有。我确信这都是真的，不过可能我只是一个变种人，一个恰好擅长于预言的变种人。

original: How the fuck should I know, I have nothing to compare myself to...
translation: 这是多么的扯淡，我没有任何事能与我自己比较......

original: Seriously, I think you have MPD of schizophrenia.
translation: 老实说，我觉得你有神经疾病：多重人格。

original: A Multiple Personality Disorder... Hmmm... call it what you like, it's the results that matter to me.
translation: 一种多重人格障碍......唔......随你怎么说吧，这结果对我很重要。

original: You need help, you sound mad to me.
translation: 你需要帮助，你听起来疯了。

original: Fine, you see life your way and I'll see it my way. That's how we humans have been for Centuries... No reason I should expect it to change now...
translation: 好吧，你以你的视角看生命，我以我的。这也是我们人类几个世纪以来一直做的......现在没有理由期望它会改变...

original: Our blessed Cook of all people turned out to be a practitioner of the dark arts...
translation: 我们敬爱的＂厨子＂竟然是个黑魔法的修行者......

original: With the Chief and Nurse's assistance, The Cook performed a sacrificial ritual to bring me back to life.
translation: 在＂酋长＂和＂护士＂的帮助下，＂厨子＂举行了一场献祭仪式，让我起死回生。

original: So here I am, and here we are.
translation: 所以我现在在这里，我们都在这里。

original: Didn't I kill you once already?
translation: 我不是已经把你杀了吗？

original: Oh yes, my rebirth, a day of celebration indeed...
translation: 哦是的，我的死亡......我的重生，的确是值得庆贺的一天。

original: Thanks to your actions on that day I have been able to live for many lifetimes, all the time growing stronger from the pain of those around me...
translation: 多亏了你那天的行为，我才能够活这么久，一直从周围人的痛苦中汲取力量，变得越来越强...

original: You don't talk much do you?
What am I? Your personal fucking entertainer? Want me to read you a goddamn bedtime story too?
translation: 我是什么？你的私人娱乐师？还想让我给你读个他妈的睡前故事吗？

original: Shut the fuck up and enjoy the silence.
translation: 他妈的给我闭嘴，享受一下安静。

original: Yeah, and you're an ugly motherfucker so I guess we're even.
translation: 是啊，而且你长得这么丑，我想我们就算扯平了。

original: You talk too fucking much, so shut your fucking hole.
translation: 你他妈话太多了，给我把嘴闭上。

original: No, I don't. Got a fucking problem with it?
translation: 不，我不是。你他妈有意见吗？

original: I would not have needed this shit back at the asylum...
translation: 我在疯人院的时候根本不需要这东西.....

original: Damn, just let me bleed for a while will ya...
translation: 妈的，就让我流会儿血不行吗......

original: I've heard enough. I'll kill you now.
translation: 我听够了。我现在就要杀了你。

original: Well shut the fuck up and start shooting then.
translation: 那你他妈的就闭嘴，开枪吧。
在患者800身上发生了什么事？

original: Patient 800 failed in her only objective, to persuade you to kill Ms Brookes...
translation: 患者800没能完成她的唯一任务，就是说服你杀掉布鲁克斯女士......

original: She should consider her quick death a blessing in light of her failure...
translation: 鉴于她的失败，她应该把自己的速死当成一种恩赐...

original: Her suffering, like all the others who have died here, only served to make me stronger.
translation: 她的蒙难，像其他死在这儿的人一样，只会令我更强大。

original: Patient 800 has been a good bitch over the years, and you followed her instructions well.
translation: 患者800这些年把我伺候得很好。你也很好地执行了她的指令。

original: I'll leave her fate in your bloody hands.
translation: 她的命运，就交到你血腥的手上吧。

original: So you're the asshole in charge of this shithole?
translation: 所以你是这个鬼地方的头儿？

original: I guess you could say that... I must admit I am very pleased that we finally have the opportunity to talk.
translation: 我想你可以这么说......我必须承认，我们终于有机会交谈，这让我感到非常高兴。

original: Seeing the raw carnage you wracked out there, the powerful individuals you brought down... I felt a bit of an old fool...
translation: 看到你制造的屠杀现场，你干掉的那些强者...我觉得自己真是老糊涂了...

original: To have locked myself away for so long waiting for this day... My enlightenment...
translation: 将自己禁锢于此如此之久，就是为了今天......我的教化......

original: There is so much havoc to be created outside these walls. It got me thinking, you and I should team up.
translation: 外面的世界可以制造更多的混乱。这让我想到，你和我应该联手。

original: You want to join up with me?
Yes, of course, and I can offer more than just my gun at your side.
translation: 没错，我对你不仅仅是一杆枪而已。

original: I can perform the ritual on you too. You can become like me, Immortal among the suffering of others.
translation: 我能为你举行仪式。你能像我一样，在他人的苦难中变得不朽。

original: It's simple enough in a place like this. We don't even need the blood sacrifice these days.
translation: 在这种地方，仪式简单得很。我们现在甚至都不需要血祭了。

original: The Nurse, Cook and Chief all went through with the procedure...
translation: ＂护士＂、＂厨子＂和＂酋长＂都经历了那个过程......

original: ...after taking their own lives, we brought them back one by one.
translation: ......他们在自杀后，我们一个接一个把他们召唤回来。

original: Back then there was another too, Ventnor, a Supervisor. He disappeared...
translation: 那时，还有另一个家伙，文特诺，一位监督者。他不见了......

original: ...stepped outside one day and never returned.
translation: ......有一天他走了出去，就再也没有回来。

original: None of us set foot outside after that. A minor side effect of our immortality is the need to feed on the suffering of others...
translation: 从那以后，我们谁也没再踏出过这里一步。我们不朽的一个小小副作用，就是需要以他人的苦难为食...

original: Without it we are reduced to mere mortals...
translation: 没有它，我们就会变回凡人......

original: The more we hurt others the stronger we grow and, this place is like a battery for pain.
translation: 我们杀伤越多，就变得愈发强大，而这里就像一个苦难的蓄电池。

original: I'm ready to undergo the Ritual now.
translation: 我准备好接受这仪式了。

original: Excellent, this won't take long. I have already made the necessary preparations...
translation: 好极了，这花不了多久，我已做好了准备......

original: All you need to do is drink from this container. It will kill and revive you in a matter of seconds...
translation: 你只需要喝掉这个容器里的东西。它会在几秒钟内杀死你，然后再让你复活......

original: No thanks, I don't think I wanna live forever...
translation: 不，谢谢了，我也没打算永生不朽......

original: Whatever, the offer will still be open when you come crawling back for it.
translation: 无论如何，这里永远向你敞开,要是有一天你爬回这里要求的话。

original: Do you have a real name?
We gave up our old names after the ritual. Whoever we used to be died on that day.
translation: 仪式之后，我们就放弃了原来的名字。从那天起，曾经的那个人就已经死了。

original: Are you fucking stupid? I told you I don't have a name anymore.
translation: 你他妈的傻吗？我已经告诉过你我没有名字了。

original: What do you mean? What do you want?
translation: 你什么意思？你想要什么？

original: I'm The Warden and I have been watching your progress with keen interest...
translation: 我是典狱长，我一直都在密切关注着你的进展.....

original: You seem indifferent to the plight of those around you. I wonder is there a spark of cruelty there or is it just ignorance?
translation: 你似乎对周围人的困境漠不关心。我想知道，你这是残忍无情，还是单纯的无知？

original: Your combat skills are admirable, but what's really going on in your mind?
translation: 你的战斗技巧令人钦佩，但你心里到底在想些什么？

original: I'm talking about your potential. I think a test is in order... You remember Patient 800. A useful little tool...
translation: 我说的是你的潜力。我认为应该对你进行一次测试... 你还记得800号患者吧。她可是个有用的小工具...

original: What do you want me to do?
Simple, prove to me that you have the ability to harm the helpless. Kill Patient 800.
translation: 很简单，向我证明你有伤害无辜的能力。杀了800号患者。

original: You think anything good would remain uncorrupted here? Of course not.
translation: 当然。你以为这里还会剩下什么好鸟么？不可能的......

original: I could see from our old security tapes you were bouncing from one place to another...
translation: 我从以前的监控录像里看到你到处乱跑......

original: ...aimlessly trying to piece things together for yourself as you went.
translation: ......漫无目的地想要自己拼凑出真相。

original: It became obvious I would have to alter things once I saw what the Chief had in store for you.
translation: 当我看到＂酋长＂给你准备的东西后，很明显，我必须改变一些事情。

original: I knew that you needed to go back and kill me, else none of this would have occurred.
translation: 我知道你得回到过去杀了我，否则这一切都不会发生。

original: The deaths of the others were unavoidable and they walked cluelessly into them...
translation: 其他人的死是不可避免的，他们天真地送了命...

original: They were loyal, even in death. I wonder if you too have the same traits.
translation: 他们至死都保持着忠诚。我想知道，你是不是也有同样的特质。

original: Perfect. Your brutality knows no bounds.
translation: 完美，你的残忍真是没有底线。

original: I would never harm a defenseless person.
Very well asshole... you have made your choice...
translation: 很好，混蛋... 你已经做出了选择......

original: I thought you'd never shut the fuck up.
translation: 我还以为你永远都不会闭嘴了。

original: I'm not interested in anything you have to say. I came here to kill you.
translation: 我对你说的毫无兴趣。我来这儿就是杀了你的。

original: Let's fuckin' dance then, tough guy...
translation: 那就让我们来干一架吧，硬汉......

original: Excellent. Let us carve a path of destruction though the entire wasteland.
translation: 好极了。让我们在废土之上撕开一条毁灭之路吧。

original: No, I'm not interested in you joining me.
translation: 不，我对和你联手毫无兴趣。

original: Very well... a pity... I'll just have to kill you then.
translation: 很好......十分遗憾......我只能杀掉你了。

original: Why the hell should I do that?
translation: 为什么我他妈的要这样做？

original: If you can, maybe you are worthy of my company.
translation: 要这么做了，你很值得成为我们的伙伴。

original: I will not only join you, but I will offer to make you too immortal like me.
translation: 我不仅会加入你，我还会让你也变得和我一样永生。

original: Get the hell away from me and stay away.
Thank you, I'll stay here and guard the patients. Good luck.
translation: 谢谢你，我会在这儿守卫这些患者。祝好运。

original: Hey asshole, I'm your worst nightmare....
translation: 嗨，混蛋，我是你最糟糕的梦魇......

original: A fucking nightmare eh... we'll see about that - Guards Attack!
translation: 梦魇是吧...那就走着瞧吧-卫兵，攻击！

original: It's good to see you again.
Since we last met I have been preparing for this day and I have learned a few tricks in the last two centuries.
translation: 自从我们上次见面后，我一直在为这一天做准备，在过去两个世纪里，我学到了一些小把戏。

original: I've been studying every document I could find on this place. 90% of it is just what they want you to see. It's the rest that's the problem.
translation: 我研究了这里所有能找到的文献。90%都是他们想让你知道的。剩下的才是问题所在。\n我研究了这里所有能找到的文献。其中90%都是他们想让你看到的。剩下的那部分才是问题所在。

original: Yeah, we showed that freaking bastard who's really boss!
translation: 是啊，我们让那个畸形的杂种知道谁才是老大！

original: I think this nightmare is finally over. This place will not be claiming any more lives.
translation: 我想这个噩梦终于结束了。这个地方不会再夺走更多人的生命了。

original: Hey... I've been thinking and now that we have the time I have something I should tell you.
translation: 嘿...我一直在想，现在我们有时间了，我有些事得告诉你。

original: I thought you'd never fucking ask.
Here I thought you had abandoned my company.
translation: 我还以为你抛弃我了呢。
哦不，我们可不是什么都有。
对不起，我们没有更多食材了......

original: I've killed you before and I'll do it again.
translation: 我以前杀过你，现在还可以再杀一次。

original: You may have beaten me in combat before when I was old and weak but now I am stronger than ever....
translation: 你以前可能在我年老体弱时打败过我，但现在我比以往任何时候都要强大......

original: The others never understood the true nature of the ritual's power like I do.
translation: 其他人从来都不像我一样理解仪式的真正力量。

original: Even the Chief spent so long mutilating the bodies of his victims that he neglected the most powerful and painful trick in the book...
translation: 就连＂酋长＂也花了太长时间去残害受害者的身体，以至于他忽略了书中最强大也最残忍的招数...

original: The complete destruction of a person's mind, being and sanity can be so much more rewarding than childish primal bloodlust.
translation: 彻底摧毁一个人的思想、存在和理智，这比幼稚的本能嗜血要更加令人满足。

original: Got anything to drink to pass the time?
translation: 有什么喝的能打发时间吗？

original: Real funny numb nuts, if I relaxed anymore I'd be dead.
translation: 真可笑，呆瓜，我要是再放松点，早就死了。

original: Well the dead and the dying scattered around this building are all that remains of my once proud gang.
translation: 唉，这座建筑周围横七竖八躺着的死人和垂死之人，就是我曾经引以为傲的帮派剩下的全部了。

original: Don't think you did all the hard work though. The B.O.S. took care of that by forcing us out of DC.
translation: 别以为都是你干的。钢铁兄弟会才是让我们离开华盛顿特区的人。

original: They killed dozens of our best to get to a couple of our worst...
translation: 他们为了抓住几个最坏的家伙，杀了几十个我们的好兄弟......

original: From what I heard it's only caused them more problems since the Super Mutants took over our old turf, not that I give a shit...
translation: 听说自从超级变种人占领了我们以前的地盘后，他们也遇到了更多的麻烦，不过我根本不在乎......

original: The people who lived here are not the people I grew up with and respected.
translation: 住在这里的人根本不是我从小认识和尊重的那些人

original: I spend most of my time locked away in my room stuffing animal corpses for rich clients so we can all eat for another week or two.
translation: 我大部分时间把自己锁在房间里，忍受着动物尸体的恶臭，为有钱的主顾服务，这样我们才能再多吃一两个星期的饭。

original: I guess it's better than being shot at and I'm getting too old for combat these days anyway...
translation: 我猜这比挨枪子好些，再说，我也太老了，不适合战斗了......

original: I'm the Taxidermist, I work here. You must be the one responsible for killing all my gang.
translation: 叫我＂剥皮师＂好了，我在这儿工作。你一定就是杀了我所有帮派成员的那个人。

original: Don't worry, in many ways you were doing me a favor. Things, they 'aint what they used to be.
translation: 别担心，从某种程度上说，你算是帮了我一个忙。现在一切都变了。

original: Most of my friends are dead or just gone. Seems like every day there were less faces I recognised out there.
translation: 我的大部分朋友都已经死了或者离开了。外面的熟人面孔似乎每天都在减少。

original: Well, since you asked so nicely, I'm the Taxidermist and I work here.
translation: 好吧，既然你如此客气地问了，我叫＂剥皮师＂，在这儿工作。

original: I'm guessing you must be the one responsible for killing all my gang.
translation: 我猜你一定就是杀了我所有帮派成员的那个人。

original: Don't worry, in many ways you were doing me a favor. Things, they 'aint what they used to be.
translation: 别担心，从某种程度上说，你算是帮了我一个忙。现在一切都变了。

original: Most of my friends are dead or just gone. Seems like every day there were less faces I recognised out there.
translation: 我的大部分朋友都已经死了或者离开了。外面的熟人面孔似乎每天都在减少。

original: Whoa there tough guy, just who do you think I am?
translation: 好一个硬汉，你以为我是谁？

original: Are there any jobs I can do for you?
Yeah, I'd say a few job vacancies have appeared on my roster since your arrival...
translation: 是的，我不得不说自从你来了，我的名单上确实出现了几个职位空缺......

original: Right now I have three main concerns. The local Talons, missing friends and a lack of raw materials.
translation: 现在我有三个麻烦事。当地的鹰爪、失踪的朋友，还有缺一些珍稀原料。

original: Tell me about the Talon job.
translation: 告诉我关于鹰爪的任务。

original: My gang, the Raider's who lived here and the Talon's nearby had formed an uneasy truce.
translation: 我的帮派，以前住在这里的掠夺者，和附近的鹰爪公司达成了一项脆弱的停战协议。

original: Druner and I set up several trade deals with a bunch of 'em in a nearby warehouse.
translation: ＂德吕纳＂和我与他们在附近的一个仓库里达成了几笔交易。

original: If they know this Hotel is open for the taking then they are likely to seize it and evict me in the process.
translation: 如果他们知道这家旅馆可以轻易占领的话，他们很可能会把它夺走，同时把我赶出去。

original: I need you to take out the local leaders and bring me back their Dogtags as proof.
translation: 我需要你做掉当地的小头目，并把他们的狗牌带回来作为证据。

original: There's four of them. Take this note to help you remember your targets.
translation: 一共有四个人。拿着这张纸条，帮你记住目标。

original: Without proper organization the local Talons will fall apart.
translation: 没有了组织者，本地的鹰爪就会土崩瓦解。

original: This is their main Eastern frontline outpost and from what I hear re-enforcements are sparse.
translation: 这是他们的主要东方前哨据点，而且我了解那儿的增援很少。

original: If you can manage this I'll give you a special device for storing equipment. It makes carrying round a full haul much easier.
translation: 如果你能做到这一点，我会给你一个特殊的设备来存放装备。这样携带大量物资就方便多了。

original: Nice work, I must say I'm relieved and impressed. As promised here is your reward.
translation: 干得好，我不得不说我放心了，十分感动。如我承诺，这是你的报酬。

original: The Talon leaders are all dead. Here's their Tags.
translation: 鹰爪公司的头目都被干掉了。这是他们的狗牌。

original: Tell me more about your missing friends.
Recently I had to send two of my best out on job up at Old Olney.
translation: 最近我不得不派我最好的两个手下去老奥尔尼镇干活。

original: I received an order for a mounted Deathclaw from a wealthy client...
translation: 我从一位有钱的主顾那里得了个订单，要一具制好的死亡爪......

original: ...and after losing a recent battle with the B.O.S. we needed the caps.
translation: ......为了弥补最近与钢铁兄弟会战斗的损失，我亟需这些瓶盖。

original: The order fell through when the buyer's corpse was discovered, throat slashed out near Tenpenny Tower.
translation: 然而订单失败了，随着买主被切开了喉咙的尸首在特佩尼大厦附近被发现。

original: I sent Chelk, my best tracker and sniper. I sent Doomfist, a somewhat civilized Super Mutant up there with him....
translation: 我派了＂查克＂，我最好的追踪者和狙击兵，和＂毁灭拳＂，一个多少文明些的超级变种人去了那儿......

original: I last heard from them near the Old Olney Fire Station days ago... I just need to know what has happened to them.
translation: 我在几天前最后接到了他们的消息，在老奥尔尼消防局附近......我急着知道他们到底怎么了。

original: If they are trapped and alive I need you to rescue them, if they are dead I'll need proof...
translation: 要是他们被困了还活着，我需要你救出他们；要是死了我需要证据......

original: Of course they may have just decided to move on to less hostile pastures...
translation: 当然，他们可能只是决定去一个不太敌对的地方......

original: I can only reward you in caps, but Chelk took my old Rifle. It's a powerful custom silenced Sniper.
translation: 我只能给你些瓶盖作为报酬，，不过＂查克＂拿了我的旧步枪。这是杆不错的定制消音狙击步枪。

original: If you find it and... if it is no longer of use to them, then you can keep that too.
translation: 要是你找到了它，那么......要是它对他们已经没用了的话，你就自己留着吧。

original: This note should explain anything else you need to know...
translation: 这便条把剩下的事都解释清楚了......

original: That's a damn shame... I guess that only leaves me now....
translation: 这真是个坏消息......我猜这儿现在只剩下我了......

original: The last of the DC Khans... Thanks for letting me know anyway. Here's your caps...
translation: 最后的特区可汗帮......无论如何，谢谢你让我知道。这是你的瓶盖......

original: I found Chelk and Doomfist but I was too late to save them. They had this note.
translation: 我找到了＂查克＂和＂毁灭拳＂，不过已经太迟了。这是他们的便条。

original: Basically I'm virtually out of Turpentine...
translation: 简单地说，我现在奇缺松节油......

original: I get through tons of the stuff in my line of work so I'll pay 40 caps for any you can bring me.
translation: 工作中我做了成吨的材料，因此无论你拿多少，我会付40瓶盖一个给你。

original: I'll even throw in a few extras if you bring it back to me in bulk.
translation: 要是你能整批地给我带来，我还有额外的奖励。

original: Glad to hear it, how many?
I have some Turps for you.
Well, it's better than nothing. Thanks.
Not bad, this shoud help but I still need a lot more.
translation: 不错，这很有用，不过我还需要更多。

original: Excellent, have this as an extra token of my appreciation.
translation: 好极了，拿上这个，这是额外的奖励。

original: 8! That's great. Have this as a bonus.
Do you have anything for sale?
Yeah, I have some random stuff lying around if you wanna trade...
translation: 是的，我有一些杂货，要是你想买的话......
这个＂剥皮师＂......是你唯一的名字？

original: No, as it goes I have lots of names. There's "Chancellor Taxo", that was a good one...
translation: 不，我曾经有过一长串名字。比如＂整理大法官＂，这个不错......

original: "The Tax Inspector" was quite popular for a while, err... "The Taxophonist"...
translation: ＂税务稽查员＂有一段时间挺流行，呃......＂税务播音员＂......

original: Yet more people used to refer to me as "Captain Taxonite" and some folk called me "Tax Paine"...
translation: 但是更多人那时喜欢叫我＂税石队长＂，还有一些家伙叫我＂税巴佬＂......

original: ...whilst other popular monikers included "Taximum Overdrive","Jimmy The Tin" and "Spudland"...
translation: ......同时流行的绰号有＂最高档＂、＂杰米·罐头＂，还有＂马铃薯地＂......

original: Hmmm ... let me think.... oh yeah there was also one guy who kept referring to me as...
translation: 唔......让我想想......哦对了还有一个家伙，坚持叫我......

original: "The Chislington Army Accounts Department Coffee Substitute Addicts Convention"...
translation: ＂希灵顿陆军财务部咖啡替代品成瘾者大会＂......

original: ...but he was a bit strange, know what I mean?
translation: .....但他有点奇怪，你懂我的意思吧？

original: Can you repair something for me?
Guilty by association is what you are.
All right, I'm not in the mood for this shit. You wanna fight, bring it on!
translation: 很好，我没心情管你的狗屁。你想打，就来吧！

original: Awesome work! This deserves of a big reward.
translation: 了不起的成就！这个大奖是你应得的。

original: What!? Piss off... oh shit, you actually do. No wonder you smell like a workbench...
translation: 什么！滚蛋......哦不，你、你真的做到了。我说你怎么闻起来像个工作台似的......

original: Well I think this kind of monumental effort deserves some sort of special reward...
translation: 好吧，我想这种不朽的成就应与一个特殊的巨奖相配......

original: You have proved yourself useful, I think it would be in our mutual interest to join forces.
translation: 您已经证明自己很有用，我想我们联手符合我们双方的利益。

original: Can I see what you have for sale?
translation: 我能看看你出售的东西吗？

original: I'm Maxwell. I used to be the priest here. That is until the Warden started his sick rituals.
translation: 我是麦斯威尔。我以前是这里的牧师。直到典狱长开始他那邪恶的仪式。

original: Now I look after the Asylum's inventory. I don't stock much in the way of weapons though.
translation: 现在我负责照看避难所的物资。不过我这里没有多少武器。

original: Did you plant the flowers outside?
Flowers? What the heck are you talkin' about? Nothin' has grown in that yard for nearly 200 years.
translation: 花？你在说什么？那个院子里近200年来什么都没长过。

original: OK. May The Lord go with you.
Did you undergo the Warden's ritual?
translation: 你经历过典狱长的仪式吗？

original: Nope. I chose to die normally. The only problem is I never did.
translation: 没有。我选择正常死亡。但问题是，我从没真正死过。

original: After undergoing The Warden's ritual you feel indestructable (+250HP) and you now regain health in combat.
translation: 经受住了＂典狱长＂仪式的考验，你现在变得坚不可摧（+250HP），并会在战斗中缓慢恢复生命。

original: When Vonda is a companion you gain a +10 bonus to Damage Resistance and a +5 bonus to Damage Threshold.
translation: 当旺达成为同伴时，您的DR获得+10，DT获得+5。
4D 存储开启。你的负重增加了。
4D 存储关闭。你的负重恢复常态。

original: WARNING: STORAGE DATA BANK DISABLED. CONTENT RETRIEVAL INTERFACE OFFLINE.\n\nThis container appears to be non-functional, however on closer inspection it appears that one of the backup storage drives could be removed with the correct skills [80 Science or Repair].
translation: 警告：存储系统资料库失灵。内容检索界面离线。\n\n这个容器似乎已经失去了功能，然而靠近观察，其中一个备份的驱动看上去还能可以被覆盖，要是你有足够的技能的话。[80 科学或修理]

original: Attempt to eject the backup unit using a software override.
translation: 尝试软件覆盖弹出后备单元。

original: As you approach Friendship Asylum a vague sense of dread and déjà-vu starts to set in. \nSomething tells you to stop and think carefully about what you are about to do.\n[MAKE A NUMBERED SAVE NOW - YOU MAY WELL NEED IT!]
translation: 当你接近友谊疯人院，一种隐隐的恐惧突然开始笼罩你的心头。\n似乎有什么东西在阻止你进入，叫你三思而后行。\n请立刻作一个独立的存档 --- 我相信你将会非常需要它！]

original: As the elevator stops back in the basement, the local time portal vanishes with an echoing pop. You will now be able to reuse to elevator to access the same area in present day.
translation: 当电梯再次停到地下室时，当地的时间传送平台随着一声回响的爆响消失了。你现在可以再次使用这部电梯前往当今时代的同一区域。

original: You undergo the Warden's ritual and gain the Pain Lord perk, substantially increasing your hit points and allowing you to regain lost health by harming others in combat.
translation: 你经受住了＂典狱长＂仪式的考验，获得了痛苦勋爵的能力，大大增加了你的打击点，允许你通过战斗中打击对手来恢复健康。

original: Vonda has departed for the Muddy Rudder
translation: 沃达出发前往泥舵酒吧

original: Vonda has departed for the Atomic Wrangler
translation: 沃达已出发前往原子牧马人

original: The Warden has departed for the Muddy Rudder
translation: 守望者已出发前往泥泞的舵

original: The Warden has departed for the Atomic Wrangler
translation: 守望者已出发前往原子牧马人

original: You accept Vonda's training and gain the Hardened Survivalist perk, making you much tougher and increasing your survivability.
translation: 你接受了沃达的训练，获得了强化生存者特长，使你更加坚强，提高了你的生存能力。

original: You no longer have the Hardened Survivalist perk.
translation: 您不再具有“强化生存者”特长。
强化生存者特长已被移除

original: You no longer have the Pain Lord perk.
translation: 您不再有痛苦勋爵振作。
痛苦勋爵特长已被移除

original: WARNING: STORAGE DATA BANKS CURRENTLY OFFLINE.\n\nThis 4D weapon container appears to be non-functional, however on closer inspection it appears that one of the backup storage drives could be removed with the correct skills [45 Science or Repair].
translation: 警告：存储系统资料库失灵。\n\n这个武器存储器似乎已经失去了功能，然而靠近观察，其中一个备份的驱动看上去还能可以被覆盖，要是你有足够的技能的话。[45 科学或修理]

original: Attempt to eject the backup unit using a software override.
translation: 尝试软件覆盖弹出后备单元。

original: AWOP Starter Terminal\nChoose from a variety of starting loadouts.\nYou may only choose once.
translation:
AWOP 启动终端
选择一个不同的开始.
你只能选择一次.
原汉化: 左转成魔
上任汉化: Thekingdom
本次汉化：无疆zinc

original: You are now trained in the use of Power Armor.
translation: 现在，您已经接受了动力甲使用的培训。

original: The air is different here, fresher and the surfaces appear to be newer. It appears you have travelled back in time and the elevator has locked behind you. You may have to re-use it to travel back but you need a key first.
translation: 这里的空气不一样，更新鲜，表面看起来也更新鲜。你似乎回到了过去，电梯在你身后被锁上了。你可能需要重新使用它来返回，但你首先需要一把钥匙。
努卡可乐工人的防空洞
费斯廷格峡谷 - 第3层
国会大厦研究高层废墟
费斯廷格峡谷 - 第1层
避难所科技集团办公室
灰渠汽车服务部地下室
格雷迪奇图书馆地下室
德特里克要塞通用通道
友谊疯人院警卫办公室
费斯廷格峡谷 - 第2层
宾夕法尼亚大街商业地产
核子可乐工人的防空洞
